text:
Today they are betraying the principles of Dr. Ram Manohar Lohia, tomorrow they will also betray the people of India. 

My thoughts on why those who claim to follow Dr. Lohia have let him down. Do read.
author: narendramodi

text:
जो लोग आज डॉ. लोहिया के सिद्धांतों से छल कर रहे हैं, वही कल देशवासियों के साथ भी छल करेंगे।
 
जो लोग डॉ. लोहिया के दिखाए रास्ते पर चलने का दावा करते हैं, वही क्यों उन्हें अपमानित करने में लगे हैं? पढ़िए मेरे विचार...
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings to @smritiirani Ji on her birthday. She has made valuable contributions towards strengthening the BJP and in the working of key sectors of the Government. I pray for her long life and good health. I also convey my best wishes to her for the upcoming election in Amethi.
author: narendramodi

text: आजादी के अमर सेनानी वीर भगत सिंह, सुखदेव और राजगुरु को शहीद दिवस पर शत-शत नमन। भारत माता के इन पराक्रमी सपूतों के त्याग, संघर्ष और आदर्श की कहानी इस देश को हमेशा प्रेरित करती रहेगी। जय हिंद!
author: narendramodi

text:
My condolences to the family and supporters of Karnataka Minister Shri CS Shivalli. 

Shri Shivalli will be remembered for his service to Karnataka. May his soul rest in peace.
author: narendramodi

text:
Opposition insults our forces time and again.

I appeal to my fellow Indians- question Opposition leaders on their statements.

Tell them- 130 crore Indians will not forgive or forget the Opposition for their antics. 

India stands firmly with our forces. 

#JantaMaafNahiKaregi
author: narendramodi

text:
Opposition is the natural habitat of terror apologists and questioners of our armed forces. 

This reprehensible statement by a senior leader like Ram Gopal Ji insults all those who have given their lives in protecting Kashmir. It humiliates the families of our martyrs.
author: narendramodi

text:
Loyal courtier of Congress’ royal dynasty admits what the nation already knew- Congress was unwilling to respond to forces of terror.

This is a New India- we will answer terrorists in a language they understand and with interest!
author: narendramodi

text:
The most trusted advisor and guide of the Congress President has kick-started the Pakistan National Day celebrations on behalf of the Congress, ironically by demeaning India’s armed forces.

Shame!
author: narendramodi

text: वीरों और महापुरुषों की धरती बिहार के निवासियों को राज्य के स्थापना दिवस पर मेरी बहुत-बहुत शुभकामनाएं। मेरी कामना है कि प्रगति के पथ पर बढ़ चला यह प्रदेश विकास के नित नए मानदंड स्थापित करता रहे।
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to Shri @jualoram Ji on his birthday. He has been working assiduously towards improving the lives of tribal communities across India. I pray for his long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text: The success of every athlete who participated in the Special Olympics World Games will motivate countless other sportpersons to pursue and excel on the sports field. I would also like to congratulate the families and coaches of the medal winners for their invaluable support.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today is a proud day for India! 

Our contingent at the Special Olympics World Games Abu Dhabi has won a historic 368 medals including 85 Golds. 

Congratulations to all the medalists. Their fortitude and accomplishments inspire millions. @WorldGamesAD #MeetTheDetermined
author: narendramodi

text:
The truth always prevails. 

Fake news driven by mischief and fake narratives driven by votebank politics stand shattered.
author: narendramodi

text: Colours of Holi, flavours of music, a catchy tune and lots of Chowkidars...delight to watch!
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy Holi to the energetic Chowkidars in Banda. 

My best wishes to you all.
author: narendramodi

text:
Extremely adorable! 

Exuberant young Chowkidars these...
author: narendramodi

text:
Navroz Mubarak! 

Praying for a year filled with peace and prosperity. 

May everyone be happy and be blessed with good health.
author: narendramodi

text: होली के पावन पर्व की सभी देशवासियों को ढेरों शुभकामनाएं। हर्ष और उल्लास का यह त्योहार हमारी एकता और सद्भावना के रंग को और प्रगाढ़ करे।
author: narendramodi

text:
‘’आप भी चौकीदार, मैं भी चौकीदार’’

आंध्र प्रदेश से एक मेहनती चौकीदार की यह स्वर्णिम सौगात है, जिसे मैं कभी नहीं भूल पाऊंगा।

देश का हर व्यक्ति जो अपनी जिम्मेदारी पूरी निष्ठा से निभाता या निभाती है, वह चौकीदार है।
author: narendramodi

text:
ओडिशा से एक कर्मठ चौकीदार संतोष जी के आशीर्वाद ने मन को छू लिया।

सेना के प्रति उनके सम्मान और गर्व के बारे में सुनकर अच्छा लगा।
author: narendramodi

text:
आज अनेक कर्मठ चौकीदारों के साथ टेक्नोलॉजी के माध्यम से होली मनाने का सौभाग्य मिला।

राजनीतिक स्वार्थ के चलते परिश्रमी चौकीदारों को अपमानित किया गया।

लेकिन 130 करोड़ भारतीय उनके साथ खड़े हैं और कह रहे हैं - मैं भी चौकीदार!
author: narendramodi

text:
चौकीदार भाइयो और बहनो, पूरे देश को आप पर गर्व है। 

हम सब आपके साथ हैं।

Rockstar Chowkidars! Happy to see this.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you for the unwavering faith.
author: narendramodi

text: Having a wonderful interaction with Chowkidars from across India. Join.
author: narendramodi

text: Looking forward to interacting with over 25 lakh Chowkidars via audio bridge. The interaction begins at 4:30. Join the interaction on the NaMo App.
author: narendramodi

text:
इन्होंने चौकीदारों का अपमान किया, आज पूरा देश चौकीदार बनकर खड़ा हो गया है। 

चौकीदार शब्द देशभक्ति का पर्याय बन गया है।
author: narendramodi

text:
The biggest casualty of dynastic politics are institutions. 

From the press to Parliament.

From soldiers to free speech.

From the Constitution to the courts.

Nothing is spared. 

Sharing some thoughts.
author: narendramodi

text:
वंशवाद की राजनीति से सबसे अधिक नुकसान संस्थाओं को हुआ है।

प्रेस से पार्लियामेंट तक।
 
सोल्जर्स से लेकर फ्री स्पीच तक।
 
कॉन्स्टिट्यूशन से लेकर कोर्ट तक।

कुछ भी नहीं छोड़ा।

कुछ विचार साझा कर रहा हूं...
author: narendramodi

text:
Rich in facts and high on detail, this sharp and insightful piece by @arunjaitley Ji presents an accurate picture of the transformation in the last five years.

It also gives a befitting reply to the spreaders of fake news and narratives. 

Do read and share.
author: narendramodi

text:
Gallantry Awards and Distinguished Service Decorations were conferred upon outstanding people who have been serving India with utmost courage. 

Here are pictures from today’s ceremony.
author: narendramodi

text:
When the nation's Nari Shakti pledges support, rest assured India is in safe hands.

Looking forward to seeing you all during the interaction with Chowkidars on the 31st of this month at 5 PM.
author: narendramodi

text:
This made my day! 

Humbled, and grateful to Sheila Ji.
author: narendramodi

text: I salute your mother's will power and thank her for the blessings, which give us great strength.
author: narendramodi

text: Admire the spirit and confidence! Please convey my regards to your mother.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to Dr. Pramod Sawant and his team as they begin their journey towards fulfilling the dreams of the people of Goa. I am sure they will build on the work done in the last few years and boost Goa’s growth trajectory.
author: narendramodi

text:
Well done Hari! Thank you for sharing this.

Wishing you a happy birthday as well! :)
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to see young Chowkidar Navya take the lead and show remarkable passion towards India's development.
author: narendramodi

text:
Great! 

Best wishes to the youngsters.
author: narendramodi

text:
Saksham is full of vibrancy! 

Happy to see the energy.
author: narendramodi

text: Guided by the Mantra of ‘Reform to Transform’, the NDA Government has taken bold and futuristic decisions that have boosted the economy and rewarded the honest citizens of India.
author: narendramodi

text:
Paid tributes to my friend Shri Manohar Parrikar. 

He personified humility, simplicity and compassion. 

The good work he has done will be remembered for years to come.
author: narendramodi

text: India will be eternally grateful to Shri Manohar Parrikar for his tenure as our Defence Minister. When he was RM, India witnessed a series of decisions that enhanced India’s security capacities, boosted indigenous defence production and bettered the lives of ex-servicemen.
author: narendramodi

text: Shri Manohar Parrikar was the builder of modern Goa. Thanks to his affable personality and accessible nature, he remained the preferred leader of the state for years. His pro-people policies ensured Goa scales remarkable heights of progress.
author: narendramodi

text:
Shri Manohar Parrikar was an unparalleled leader. 

A true patriot and exceptional administrator, he was admired by all. His impeccable service to the nation will be remembered by generations. 

Deeply saddened by his demise. Condolences to his family and supporters. 

Om Shanti.
author: narendramodi

text:
आप सभी चौकीदारों को मेरी शुभकामनाएं। 

इतना उत्साह देखकर अच्छा लगा। 

आपकी चौकीदारी के कारण भ्रष्टाचार नष्ट हो रहा है और चोरों को कष्ट हो रहा है।
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you! Eternally vigilant Yuva Shakti augurs well for India.
author: narendramodi

text:
My best wishes to these adorable young Chowkidars! 

Happy to see their Josh.
author: narendramodi

text:
Fantastic effort! 

With Chowkidars like you, dirt can never have a place in India. 

Keep up the good work.
author: narendramodi

text:
बिल्कुल हैं।

प्रेस और पत्रकार लोकतंत्र को मजबूत करते हैं।

Media makes our democratic spirit stronger. 

They fearlessly bring to the forefront important issues and raise public awareness.
author: narendramodi

text:
Mahamilawat or adulteration alliance has many Prime Ministerial candidates but they offer neither stability nor coherence in policy.

The opportunism of the Mahamilawat will not fulfil the aspirations of the people of India.
author: narendramodi

text:
Issueless, aimless and visionless, the Opposition has no option left but to create and spread fake news.

130 crore Indians have seen through the lies of the Opposition and will never believe their fake narratives.
author: narendramodi

text:
Fellow Indians,

Happy that #MainBhiChowkidar has ignited the Chowkidar within all of us. Great fervour! 

Ecstatic to see the passion and commitment to protect India from corrupt, criminal and anti-social elements. 

Let us keep working together for a developed India.
author: narendramodi

text:
Your Chowkidar is standing firm & serving the nation.

But, I am not alone.

Everyone who is fighting corruption, dirt, social evils is a Chowkidar.

Everyone working hard for the progress of India is a Chowkidar.

Today, every Indian is saying-#MainBhiChowkidar
author: narendramodi

text:
This is a New India, where a person’s performance matters, not pedigree. 

No longer will dynastic politics act as a barrier to meritorious people joining the system & working for society. 

Doors and opportunities are open for 130 crore Indians, not just a few powerful families.
author: narendramodi

text:
Public transport is convenient and comfortable. 

In the last five years, Metro projects in many cities have begun and work is underway in many more. 

This will further 'Ease of Living' for people.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to see this!
author: narendramodi

text:
Honoured that we have got the opportunity to work for Pune's development. 

We are committed to doing even more for the city and surrounding areas.
author: narendramodi

text: Thanks for the faith in our work.
author: narendramodi

text: Deeply anguished by the loss of lives due to the foot overbridge accident in Mumbai. My thoughts are with the bereaved families. Wishing that the injured recover at the earliest. The Maharashtra Government is providing all possible assistance to those affected.
author: narendramodi

text:
Joined the ceremony to mark the presentation of the Gallantry Awards and Distinguished Service Decorations.

India is proud of all those who protect the nation. 

Their courage will be remembered for generations to come.
author: narendramodi

text: India First, India always!
author: narendramodi

text:
Great gesture! 

Also, Kudos to the great Dabbawalas, whose notable work ensures lakhs of people are fed.
author: narendramodi

text: Voting in high numbers is not about politics but about national interest, for which 130 crore Indians must work together.
author: narendramodi

text:
Good effort! 

Keep doing so till the elections.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to know that Jan Aushadhi stores are reducing medical expenses and providing good quality medicines.
author: narendramodi

text:
With the blessings of 130 crore Indians, what was deemed impossible for decades, by successive governments, is now possible.

Our unwavering commitment to public welfare has ensured outstanding results for all sections of society. 

A lot has been done and we aim to do much more!
author: narendramodi

text:
No place for middlemen.

No tolerance for corruption. 

No fake beneficiaries swindling away recourses. 

This is a New India. We have worked hard to remove corruption and punish the corrupt.

Do read this fine piece by @arunjaitley Ji.
author: narendramodi

text:
My fellow Indians, 

Urging you all to strengthen voter awareness efforts across India. 

Let us all ensure maximum number of Indians come out to vote in the 2019 Lok Sabha elections.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @mathrubhumieng, @dinathanthi and Eenadu, 

You have worked to give voice to people's aspirations.

Increased voter awareness is key to a strong democracy. 

I appeal to you to motivate people to vote in large numbers.
author: narendramodi

text:
The media plays a vital role in a democracy. 

It is also a strong influence on people's minds.

I request @Sanjaygupta0702, @aroonpurie and @18RahulJoshi to work towards greater voter awareness and registration that ensures an impressive turnout at the hustings.
author: narendramodi

text:
Urging @SrBachchan, @iamsrk and @karanjohar to creatively ensure high voter awareness and participation in the coming elections. 

Because...its all about loving your democracy (and strengthening it). :)
author: narendramodi

text:
Voting is not only a right but it’s also a duty. 

Dear @BeingSalmanKhan and @aamir_khan, 

It is time to inspire and motivate youth in your own Andaz to vote so that we can strengthen Apna Democracy & Apna country.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @akshaykumar, @bhumipednekar and @ayushmannk, 

The power of a vote is immense and we all need to improve awareness on its importance. 

Thoda Dum Lagaiye aur Voting ko Ek Superhit Katha banaiye.
author: narendramodi

text: I call upon veterans of the media world, @RajatSharmaLive, @subhashchandra and @vineetjaintimes to take the lead in highlighting the need to vote in large numbers. Doing so would ensure greater participation in democratic processes and strengthen our nation's development.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @msdhoni, @imVkohli and @ImRo45, 
You are always setting outstanding records on the cricketing field but this time, do inspire the 130 crore people of India to set a new record of high voter turnout in the upcoming elections. 
When this happens, democracy will be the winner!
author: narendramodi

text: I appeal to @RSSorg, NCC, NSS, Nehru Yuva Kendra and @Brahmakumaris to help increase voter awareness and tap the power of society for democracy.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @anilkumble1074, @VVSLaxman281 and @virendersehwag - your heroic deeds on the cricket pitch have inspired millions. 

Come, it is time to inspire people once again, this time to vote in record numbers.
author: narendramodi

text:
I appeal to @RubikaLiyaquat, @anjanaomkashyap, @sudhirchaudhary, @rahulkanwal and the team of @republic to spread awareness on voter registration, and why every Indian, particularly the youth should vote. 

Your support can ensure more people exercise their franchise.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @BajrangPunia, @shankar_live and @BajpayeeManoj, 

Your talent and skill has entertained millions, and made India proud. 

Your voice is respected widely. 

Please lend strength to our democracy by increasing voter awareness and inspiring people to vote.
author: narendramodi

text:
The prolific Phogat sisters, @geeta_phogat, @BabitaPhogat, @PhogatRitu and @Phogat_Vinesh manifest the best of Indian sporting talent. 

We've seen you in the wrestling world. 

I urge you all to support the movement to ensure greater voter participation in the 'Chunavi Dangal.'
author: narendramodi

text:
Requesting @deepikapadukone, @aliaa08 and @AnushkaSharma to urge people to vote in large numbers for the coming elections. 

As renowned film personalities whose work is admired by many, I am sure their message will have a positive impact on our citizens.
author: narendramodi

text:
Respected @CitiznMukherjee, 
Being among India's most prolific statesmen and someone who has been active in politics for decades, you would understand the power of a vote. I request you to appeal to the people to enrich the festival of democracy by participating in large numbers.
author: narendramodi

text:
When @mangeshkarlata Didi, @sachin_rt and @arrahman say something, the nation takes note!

I humbly request these remarkable personalities to inspire more citizens to come out and vote in the 2019 elections. 

A vote is a great way to make the people's voice heard.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @sarbanandsonwal, @himantabiswa, @SangmaConrad and @Neiphiu_Rio,  

I request you to work towards increasing vote awareness in the Northeast. 

A vote is a powerful way for people to express and become active participants in India's growth trajectory.
author: narendramodi

text: Requesting @smitaprakash, @PTI_News, @navikakumar and @prasannavishy to embolden the cause of high voter turnout in the 2019 polls. As leading public voices associated with important platforms, your support on voter awareness will be valuable and beneficial for 130 crore Indians.
author: narendramodi

text:
My young friends @RanveerOfficial, @Varun_dvn & @vickykaushal09, 

Many youngsters admire you. 

It is time to tell them: Apna Time Aa Gaya Hai and that it is time to turn up with high Josh to a voting centre near you.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @RNTata2000, @anandmahindra and @ashishchauhan, 

India wins when our democracy gets strengthened. 

Ensuring maximum participation in voting is the perfect way to strengthen democracy. 

Can we all make this happen?
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @srikidambi, @Pvsindhu1 & @NSaina, 

The core of badminton is the court and the core of democracy is the vote. 

Just like you smash records, do also inspire a record-breaking voter turnout. I request you to increase voter awareness & motivate youth to vote in large numbers.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is proud of @Neeraj_chopra1, @DuttYogi and @WrestlerSushil. 
However, they made India win because they participated. I request Neeraj, Yogeshwar and Sushil to encourage people to participate in the elections and vote so that India wins here too!
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @SriSri ji, @SadhguruJV ji, @yogrishiramdev ji and Sri M, 

Spiritual leaders like you inspire many through words and work. 

I request you to also inspire people towards greater democratic participation. 

Please encourage greater voter awareness.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @k_satyarthi, @thekiranbedi and @sudarsansand, 

A vote gives voice to people's aspirations. 

As widely respected personalities, your efforts towards increasing voter awareness will strengthen India's democracy. 

I request you to lend your voice for the same.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @Mohanlal and @iamnagarjuna, 

Your performances have entertained millions over the years and you have also won many awards. I request you to create greater voter awareness and urge people to vote in large numbers.

The award here is, a vibrant democracy.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @HarsimratBadal_ , @ichiragpaswan and @AUThackeray, increasing awareness among the youth on the importance of voting is a paramount task in front of us. 

Urging you to do your best to ensure high public participation in the upcoming elections.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @NitishKumar, @irvpaswan and @pawanchamling5, soliciting your support and active participation in improving voting across the country in the coming elections. 

Let us strive to create an atmosphere where maximum voting can take place.
author: narendramodi

text: I call upon KCR Garu, @Naveen_Odisha, @hd_kumaraswamy, @ncbn and @ysjagan to work towards bringing maximum Indians to the polling booths in the upcoming elections. May voter awareness efforts be strengthened across the length and breadth of India.
author: narendramodi

text: I appeal to @RahulGandhi, @MamataOfficial, @PawarSpeaks, @Mayawati, @yadavakhilesh, @yadavtejashwi and @mkstalin to encourage increased voter participation in the upcoming Lok Sabha polls. A high turnout augurs well for our democratic fabric.
author: narendramodi

text:
मजबूत लोकतंत्र के लिए चार अनुरोध। 

भारत के मतदाताओं, विशेषकर युवा साथियों से एक अपील।
author: narendramodi

text:
Four requests for a stronger democracy.

An appeal to the voters of India, especially my young friends.
author: narendramodi

text: जब एक मुट्ठी नमक ने अंग्रेजी साम्राज्य को हिला दिया !
author: narendramodi

text:
Tributes to Bapu and all those who marched with him to Dandi in pursuit of justice and equality. 

Sharing a few thoughts on the Dandi March, the ideals of Bapu and his disdain for the Congress culture in my blog.
author: narendramodi

text: Earlier today, had a wonderful interaction with a delegation of Parliamentarians from Bangladesh.
author: narendramodi

text:
Joined the ceremony in which Padma Awards were conferred on various distinguished citizens. 

Congratulations to all those who received the awards. 

India is proud of their exemplary service and accomplishments.
author: narendramodi

text: There was always a desire to serve Baba Bholenath and I am happy to have got that opportunity in the form of the Vishwanath Dham Project.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you! The Jan Aushadhi Kendras have helped crores of citizens across all age groups. It is a vital part of our efforts to ensure that healthcare is affordable and is of good quality.
author: narendramodi

text: Absolutely! The idea of 'One Nation, One Card' will further 'Ease of Living' and ensure a better quality of life, especially for those living in cities.
author: narendramodi

text: Kannada is a beautiful language.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you. Hopefully more youngsters will know about the sacrifices of the great women and men who ensured we breathe the air of freedom.
author: narendramodi

text:
Nari Shakti has a central role in national progress. 

We have always worked to create opportunities in various fields that empower women and ensure a life of dignity for them.
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings to Captain Amarinder Singh Ji on his birthday. Praying for his long and healthy life. @capt_amarinder
author: narendramodi

text: Boosting India and Bangladesh ties. Inaugurating key projects with PM Sheikh Hasina. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Majestic Gir Lion....Lovely picture!
author: narendramodi

text:
Guided by ‘Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas’, NDA seeks your blessings again. 
We spent the last five years fulfilling basic necessities that were left unfulfilled for 70 long years. Now, time has come to build on that and create a strong, prosperous & secure India. #PhirEkBaarModiSarkar
author: narendramodi

text:
India is proud that:

2.5 crore families have electricity for the first time.

7 crore households have smoke-free kitchens. 

1.5 crore Indians got their own homes.

These, and many other instances show that with the right approach and futuristic policies, nothing is impossible!
author: narendramodi

text:
Today:

50 crore Indians have access to good quality and free healthcare. 

42 crore people of unorganised sector have access to old-age pension.

12 crore farmer households get yearly monetary support of Rs. 6000.

Crores of middle class families are exempt from income tax.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, the people of India know that it is possible to:

Become the fastest growing economy.

Give a befitting reply to terror. 

Eliminate poverty at a record pace. 

Make India Swachh.

Remove corruption and punish the corrupt. 

Ensure inclusive and extensive development.
author: narendramodi

text:
The last five years have shown that with the blessings and participation of 130 crore Indians, what was earlier deemed impossible has now become possible. 

2019 polls are about a spirit of confidence and positivity with which India is fulfilling the aspirations of its people.
author: narendramodi

text:
Wishing all political parties and candidates the very best for the 2019 Lok Sabha elections. 

We may belong to different parties but our aim must be the same- the development of India and empowerment of every Indian!
author: narendramodi

text: In 2014, the people comprehensively rejected the UPA. There was unprecedented anger over the UPA’s corruption, nepotism and policy paralysis. India’s self-confidence was at an all-time low and the people of India wanted to rid the nation of such decay and pessimism.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to the Election Commission, all those officials and security personnel who will be on the field, across the length and breadth of India assuring smooth elections. India is very proud of the EC for assiduously organising elections for several years.
author: narendramodi

text:
The festival of democracy, Elections are here. 

I urge my fellow Indians to enrich the 2019 Lok Sabha elections with their active participation. I hope this election witnesses a historic turnout. 

I particularly call upon first time voters to vote in record numbers.
author: narendramodi

text:
We are all proud of @CISFHQrs's service to the nation. 

They protect vital development infrastructure and thus, play a crucial role in India’s growth.

Today, on the 50th Raising Day of CISF, joined their programme and interacted with CISF personnel.
author: narendramodi

text: Paid tributes to the martyrs of @CISFHQrs for their outstanding service to the nation.
author: narendramodi

text: India is proud of CISF! Watch my speech at their Raising Day programme.
author: narendramodi

text: दिव्य काशी विश्वनाथ की भव्यता बढ़ाने का एक अनूठा प्रयास। देखिए...
author: narendramodi

text:
Ayushman Bharat has transformed lakhs of lives across India.

Here is a book that chronicles a hundred such stories, of those who lead a healthier life thanks to Ayushman Bharat.

Read, get inspired and share widely with others. 

https://www.pmjay.gov.in/sites/default/files/2019-03/100_Stories_PM_JAY.pdf …
author: narendramodi

text:
Had a wonderful interaction with recipients of the Nari Shakti Puraskar. 

http://nm-4.com/v8h8 

via NaMo App
author: narendramodi

text:
Today’s India will not be helpless in front of terror.

We will give a befitting reply to those forces who ruin the atmosphere of peace and harmony.
author: narendramodi

text: The Pandit Deendayal Upadhyaya Institute of Archaeology is a wonderful attempt towards connecting our coming generations with our glorious past. Happy to have inaugurated this institute today.
author: narendramodi

text:
Laid the foundation stones for thermal power plants in Buxar and Khurja. 

By focussing on production, transmission, distribution and connection, the NDA Government has transformed the power sector.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thank you Noida, for joining today's public meeting in such record numbers.

I derive great strength from the blessings of the people.
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulations to the people of Chhattisgarh, Goa, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Jharkhand, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland, Tripura and Uttarakhand for getting their own Doordarshan channels on DD Free Dish for the first time!
author: narendramodi

text: Glad to note that Prasar Bharati has brought 11 more State DD Channels on the Satellite footprint of India through DD Free Dish. This includes five channels for Northeastern states. This will go a long way in strengthening regional cultures and fulfilling people's aspirations.
author: narendramodi

text: Inaugurating projects that will further ‘Ease of Living’ for people of Greater Noida. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: With Party colleagues at the @BJP4India Parliamentary Board meeting.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is united when it comes to fighting terrorism.

India is proud of our armed forces and the nation trusts the forces.

130 crore Indians have seen through the dirty politics of a handful of Opposition parties on national security!
author: narendramodi

text:
Came back to Delhi from Ghaziabad via the Metro. 

Had delightful interactions with fellow passengers.
author: narendramodi

text: Euphoric atmosphere at the public meeting in Ghaziabad, where multiple projects were inaugurated. Have a look at these pictures.
author: narendramodi

text: Do hear about the work happening in the Namami Gange Mission, and how it is positively impacting the people of Uttar Pradesh.
author: narendramodi

text: The case of the Panki Power Plant shows best how BJP has worked on the energy sector in Uttar Pradesh while Congress, SP and BSP did simply nothing during their long tenures.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thoughtful and wonderful rendition, @ArkoPravo19! The song captures very well the accomplishments of India’s Nari Shakti. 

My best wishes.
author: narendramodi

text: Yesterday, I had a great time with Divyang friends at my residence. Sharing some memorable moments.
author: narendramodi

text: बीते 15 दिनों में दो ऐसे निर्णय लिए गए हैं, जिनका सीधा लाभ महिलाओं और गांवों को होने वाला है।
author: narendramodi

text: Self Help Groups play an important role in our society. During our tenure, new vigour has been added in the working of SHGs, which will further empowerment of women.
author: narendramodi

text: Inaugurating multiple development works in Ghaziabad. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: केंद्र सरकार महिला सशक्तिकरण के लिए पूरी तरह समर्पित है। बेटियों के जन्म से लेकर जीवन के हर चरण के लिए महिला सशक्तिकरण की योजनाएं चल रही हैं।
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, on International Women’s Day, interacted with over 65 lakh women from 75,000 locations all over India. 

Sharing some glimpses.
author: narendramodi

text: Overwhelmed by the warmth and support in Kanpur. Watch my speech.
author: narendramodi

text:
Vishwanath Dham is an exercise happening at a scale unseen for many years. Among the notable aspects of the project is that Maa Ganga’s Darshan from Kashi Vishwanath Temple will be possible. 

I would like to thank the people of Kashi for enthusiastically supporting the project.
author: narendramodi

text: Began my Kashi visit by praying at the Kashi Vishwanath Temple, a symbol of our culture’s pride. In the Temple complex, performed the Bhumipujan of Vishwanath Dham project, a futuristic corridor around the Temple that will benefit several pilgrims and tourists coming to Kashi.
author: narendramodi

text: काशी में राष्ट्रीय आजीविका सम्मेलन संबोधित कर रहा हूं। देखिए... #NewIndia4NariShakti
author: narendramodi

text:
हर हर महादेव! 

आज बाबा भोलेनाथ के आशीर्वाद से श्री काशी विश्वनाथ धाम के शिलान्यास का सौभाग्य प्राप्त हुआ है।
author: narendramodi

text: Birthday greetings to @VasundharaBJP Ji. Vasundhara Ji’s good work in Rajasthan ensured substantial progress in the state. Praying for her long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text:
On International Women's Day, we salute our indomitable Nari Shakti.

We are proud to have taken numerous decisions that have furthered women empowerment.

Every Indian is proud of the stupendous accomplishments of women in various spheres. #NewIndia4NariShakti
author: narendramodi

text:
The Dictionary of Martyrs of India’s Freedom Struggle is a humble tribute to the great personalities who sacrificed their present for the glorious future of India. 
I compliment all those who have been working assiduously on this exercise, which is remarkable and one of its kind.
author: narendramodi

text:
We had a memorable programme at 7, Lok Kalyan Marg today. 

In the presence of young Divyang friends, a new series of visually impaired friendly coins were launched. 

These coins will help the visually impaired greatly.
author: narendramodi

text: Janaushadhi Kendras across India are at the forefront of providing affordable medicines to the poor. This initiative has added significant strength to the efforts of the Central Government to ensure every Indian has access to healthcare that is of good quality and is affordable.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thanks to Janaushadhi Kendras, there is no need to go back from a medical store just because medicines are exorbitantly priced.

Ours is a Government that cares and is ensuring affordable medicines for India's hardworking people.
author: narendramodi

text: Healthcare costs in urban areas are rising considerably. In such times, Janaushadhi Kendras offer a ray of hope. Here is an interaction with people in Delhi.
author: narendramodi

text:
In addition to creating a healthier India, the Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana has created economic opportunities for many. 

Dharmesh Bhai from Surat told me about his switch from a career in marketing to running a store under PMBJP. Have a look.
author: narendramodi

text: The Rathore family from Rajasthan's Bikaner is more than satisfied with the quality of medicines thanks to Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana. I thank young Lokendra for his kind words too.
author: narendramodi

text: India salutes all those greats who took part in the freedom struggle.
author: narendramodi

text: A historic occasion for Maharashtra! Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Steps that will improve governance in the Northeast. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: A great interaction with Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana beneficiaries. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: At 1 PM this afternoon, I will interact with beneficiaries and entrepreneurs associated with the Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana, from over 5000 locations. During the interaction, beneficiaries will share their own experiences. Do watch live!
author: narendramodi

text:
NDA’s priorities are India First.

NDA’s policies put people first.

Our decisiveness, work culture and track record are known to everyone.

Opposition lacks proper leadership and a vision to take the country forward.
author: narendramodi

text:
The NDA is best suited to fulfil regional aspirations. 

Congress has always trampled over regional aspirations, pride and insulted any leader who does not bow to their High Command.
author: narendramodi

text:
Son of the soil, Bharat Ratna MGR lives on in the hearts of crores of people.

Inaugurated a statue in his honour and also announced the decision to rename Chennai Central Station after him.

NDA will always work hard to fulfil the dreams of MGR.
author: narendramodi

text:
I thank all those who joined the NDA rally in Kancheepuram, Tamil Nadu.

NDA in Tamil Nadu is a wide ranging coalition, which will always work for the people of the state. 

I urge my sisters and brothers of Tamil Nadu to bless NDA in the upcoming elections.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is home to the world’s largest healthcare programme, Ayushman Bharat.

Today in Kalaburagi, I met beneficiaries of the flagship healthcare scheme and heard their experiences.
author: narendramodi

text:
The NDA Government at the Centre has come down heavily on corruption. 

Middlemen no longer get access to the corridors of power.

That is why, those who thrived in the earlier times dislike me and are getting together to form a ‘Maha Milawat’ or adulterated alliance.
author: narendramodi

text: In Kalaburagi, highlighted steps taken by the Central Government for those associated with the sugarcane sector.
author: narendramodi

text:
These pictures from Kalaburagi show the strong support for @BJP4India.

Karnataka is tired of the opportunistic alliance between Congress and JD(S).

They promised to waive loans but ended up harassing farmers and filing cases against them.
author: narendramodi

text: Vanakkam Kancheepuram. Happy to be here. Watch my speech at the NDA rally.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a huge public meeting in Kalaburagi. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: The @PrayagrajKumbh set notable records. Emphasis on cleanliness & sanitation was visible. A record was set for most number of people sweeping the floors. Records were also set in the fields of transportation and art. Use of technology for administering the Kumbh was commendable.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congratulations to the people of UP, especially Prayagraj, and the entire State Government under CM @myogiadityanath Ji for the exceptional organisation of @PrayagrajKumbh. 

This Kumbh showcased the best of our culture, spirituality and will be remembered for years to come.
author: narendramodi

text:
Looking forward to being in Kancheepuram for the launch of many development works relating to road and railways sector. 

The Ennore LNG Terminal will be dedicated to the nation. 

A statue of the great MGR will be unveiled at Dr. MGR Janaki College of Arts & Science for Women.
author: narendramodi

text:
The foundation stone for the resitement of BPCL Depot Raichur to Kalaburagi will be laid. 

A women’s hostel for students from the Northeast at Bangalore University will also be dedicated to the nation. 

Later, I shall address a @BJP4Karnataka gathering in Kalaburagi.
author: narendramodi

text:
I will be in Kalaburagi today to launch key development projects. 

ESIC Hospital and Medical College, Bengaluru, and the Super Specialty Block of KIMS, Hubballi will be dedicated to the nation. 

There will also be an interaction with Ayushman Bharat beneficiaries.
author: narendramodi

text: Last month, I had the honour of seeking the blessings of Boro Ma Binapani Thakur at Thakurnagar. I will always cherish the interaction I had with her. We stand in solidarity with the Matua community in this hour of sadness.
author: narendramodi

text: Boro Ma Binapani Thakur was an icon of our times. A source of great strength and inspiration for several people, Boro Ma’s rich ideals will continue to influence generations. Her emphasis on social justice and harmony will never be forgotten.
author: narendramodi

text: Earlier today, prayed at Shree Annapurna Dham in Adalaj, Gujarat.
author: narendramodi

text: आदिवासी भाइयों और बहनों के हित में लिए गए एनडीए सरकार के महत्वपूर्ण फैसले...
author: narendramodi

text:
कई बड़े वादे किए थे कांग्रेस ने।

10 दिन में कर्ज माफ करेंगे, नहीं तो मुख्यमंत्री बदलेंगे।

मध्य प्रदेश में नई सरकार बने महीनों हो गए। ना कर्ज माफ हुआ, ना ही मुख्यमंत्री बदले गए।
author: narendramodi

text: भारत भर में महामिलावट करने वाले लोग अब अंतर्राष्ट्रीय महामिलावट करने में लगे हैं।
author: narendramodi

text:
In Dhar, interacted with beneficiaries of Ayushman Bharat. 

Glad that this initiative has transformed the lives of many by providing top quality and affordable healthcare.
author: narendramodi

text: Sharing some pictures from the massive rally in Dhar, Madhya Pradesh. @BJP4MP
author: narendramodi

text: Empowering every citizen. Launching the PM Shram Yogi Maan Dhan Yojana.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear @ChouhanShivraj Ji, best wishes on your birthday. Your energy and humility have endeared you to all sections of society. Madhya Pradesh always remembers your outstanding governance. 

Looking forward to being in Dhar later today and being with @BJP4MP Karyakartas.
author: narendramodi

text: Remembering Biju Babu on his Jayanti. His noteworthy efforts for Odisha’s development continue to be cherished by generations. He undertook numerous measures for empowerment of the poor and marginalised during his long years in public service.
author: narendramodi

text:
On the auspicious occasion of Mahashivratri, prayed at the Dholeshwar Mahadev Temple in Gandhinagar. 

Har Har Mahadev!
author: narendramodi

text: Here is how the dream of ‘One Nation, One Card’ was fulfilled today, furthering ‘Ease of Living’ for several citizens.
author: narendramodi

text:
It’s a memorable day in Ahmedabad’s history. 

Our beloved Ahmedabad gets a Metro! 

Inaugurated Phase-1, travelled on the metro and laid the foundation stone for Phase-2. 

We want to provide convenient, and cost effective transportation in our cities.
author: narendramodi

text:
यह नया भारत है। 

आतंक के सामने कभी नहीं झुकेगा, चुन-चुन कर बदला लेगा और जरूरत पड़ी तो दुश्मन के घर जाकर भी हिसाब चुकता करेगा।
author: narendramodi

text: We are committed to building a society where gender sensitivity and gender equality are vital cornerstones
author: narendramodi

text: With the blessings of Maa Umiya, the Bhumipujan of Vishv Umiyadham took place amidst unparalleled enthusiasm. Here are some glimpses.
author: narendramodi

text: The Guru Gobind Singh Hospital is a state-of-the-art centre that will improve healthcare infrastructure in Jamnagar and surrounding areas. Glad to have inaugurated it today.
author: narendramodi

text:
People from all walks of life joined the public meeting at Jamnagar.

Spoke about Gujarat's outstanding growth trajectory. Also highlighted the importance of water conservation and discussed the important steps taken by the NDA Government for farmer welfare.
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking at the inauguration of New Civil Hospital in Ahmedabad..Join Live!
author: narendramodi

text: Jai Umiya Mata! At the Bhumipujan of Vishv Umiyadham.
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted to be in Jamnagar. Inaugurating various development works. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
#Mahashivratri greetings to everyone. 

#महाशिवरात्रि के पावन अवसर पर सभी देशवासियों को बहुत-बहुत शुभकामनाएं। 

ऊँ नम: शिवाय!
author: narendramodi

text: In Ahmedabad, will inaugurate the New Civil Hospital. Shall also dedicate to the nation, a Women Children & Super Specialty Hospital, Cancer Hospital, Eye Hospital and Dental Hospital. This health infrastructure will greatly help people get affordable & quality healthcare.
author: narendramodi

text: In Ahmedabad, various projects relating to healthcare and the railways will also be dedicated to the nation.
author: narendramodi

text:
4th March 2019- a historic day for the wonderful people of Ahmedabad. 

Phase-1 of the Ahmedabad Metro is going to be inaugurated. This project will further ‘Ease of Living’ for the people of Ahmedabad. 

The foundation stone for Phase-2 of the Metro will also be laid.
author: narendramodi

text:
At Jaspur, I will lay the foundation stone for the Vishva Umiyadham Complex. 

After that, I would be going to Ahmedabad to inaugurate vital infrastructure projects for the city.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Bandra-Jamnagar Humsafar Express will be flagged off tomorrow. 

A 51 km long pipeline from Aaji-3 to Khijadiya will be dedicated to the nation. 

The foundation stone to double the Rajkot-Kanalus Railway line will also be laid.
author: narendramodi

text:
I look forward to visiting Gujarat tomorrow and the day after. I will be joining programmes in various parts of the state. 

In Jamnagar, I will dedicate to the nation the Annexe of the Guru Gobind Singh Hospital. Various works relating to the SAUNI Yojana will also be unveiled.
author: narendramodi

text:
The NDA Government is proud of our Defence Forces and will do everything possible to strengthen the forces.

Those who ruled India for years neglected the forces when in power and now, when they are out of power these people are busy questioning our forces. 

Shame!
author: narendramodi

text:
The work done by the NDA Government for Amethi should have been done years ago.

Sadly, it was not done.
author: narendramodi

text:
A boost to ‘Make in India’ and India-Russia friendship. 

The AK-203, that will be manufactured in Amethi will strengthen our armed forces and help them fight terrorists.
author: narendramodi

text:
Gratitude to the people of Amethi for blessing us today.

Those in whom the people of Amethi placed their faith have ignored this great place for several years. 

In the 2019 elections, history will be created in Amethi!
author: narendramodi

text: Great atmosphere at the NDA rally in Patna. I thank all those who joined the rally at the historic Gandhi Maidan.
author: narendramodi

text:
वो कहते हैं, आओ मिलकर मोदी को खत्म करें। 

मैं कहता हूं, आओ मिलकर गरीबी, भ्रष्टाचार, कुपोषण दूर करें। 

आओ मिलकर देश का विकास करें।
author: narendramodi

text:
देश को सेना पर गर्व है, पर कुछ राजनीतिक दल ऐसी बातें करते हैं, जिससे दुश्मनों के चेहरे खिलते हैं। 

उनका यह तरीका दुर्भाग्यपूर्ण और शर्मनाक है।
author: narendramodi

text: केंद्र और बिहार की एनडीए सरकारें मिलकर बिहार के विकास को प्राथमिकता दे रही हैं।
author: narendramodi

text: NDA Government is committed to Amethi’s progress. Addressing a public meeting in Amethi. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: पटना के ऐतिहासिक गांधी मैदान से एनडीए की रैली संबोधित कर रहा हूं। देखिए...
author: narendramodi

text:
Looking forward to being among my sisters and brothers of Amethi today. 
http://nm-4.com/5jh8 

via NaMo App
author: narendramodi

text:
This afternoon, I would be joining the NDA rally at Patna’s iconic Gandhi Maidan. 

Watch my address at the rally live on the NaMo App.
author: narendramodi

text: सबसे तेज भारत...
author: narendramodi

text: आज तक क्यों?
author: narendramodi

text: Their token approach versus our total approach...here is a glimpse of which approach has been more effective.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress' approach of doles and deals harmed our Jawans and Kisans the most.

Now, times have changed. Public welfare and poverty alleviation matter over everything else.
author: narendramodi

text:
This is a New India. 

We are fully capable of protecting our nation and giving a befitting reply to those who disturb the atmosphere of peace.
author: narendramodi

text: Interacting with bright youngsters at the Grand Finale of Smart India Hackathon.
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking at the India Today Conclave on a wide range of issues. Watch!
author: narendramodi

text: At 8 PM, will be addressing the @IndiaToday Conclave 2019. Watch my address on channels of the India Today group. #LetsConclave19
author: narendramodi

text:
Looking forward to interacting with young innovators during the Grand Finale of Smart India Hackathon 2019 at 10 PM via video conferencing. 

The 36 hour long Hackathon would surely lead to pioneering research and innovations that would help solve several national challenges.
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulations to @BJP4India family for the successful organisation of the #BJPVijaySankalpBikeRally in various parts of India. I thank people from all walks of life, particularly my young friends for joining the rallies in large numbers. Great seeing such energy and positivity.
author: narendramodi

text: Handed over a “Chadar” that would be presented at the Ajmer Sharif Dargah on the 807th Urs in the coming days.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the Construction Technology India 2019 conference in Delhi. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Welcome Home Wing Commander Abhinandan!

The nation is proud of your exemplary courage.

Our armed forces are an inspiration for 130 crore Indians.

Vande Mataram!
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you Andhra Pradesh for the phenomenal support. Addressing a rally in Visakhapatnam.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a rally in Kanyakumari, Tamil Nadu. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings to my friend and Bihar’s hardworking Chief Minister, @NitishKumar Ji. Nitish Ji’s persistence ensured Bihar emerged out of the shadows of years of misrule. His pro-people governance has touched the lives of many. I pray for Nitish Ji’s long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text: Interacting with crores of BJP Karyakartas across several locations. Watch. #MeraBoothSabseMazboot
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking at the National Youth Parliament Festival 2019. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Travelled to the ISKCON temple and back via the Delhi Metro. 

Had delightful interactions with fellow passengers.
author: narendramodi

text:
Here are some images from the Gita Aradhana Mahotsav at Delhi’s iconic ISKCON temple. 

Unveiled a Bhagwad Gita that is 2.8 meters high and weighs over 800 kg.

The Gita’s prolific teachings have touched the lives of millions of people across the world.
author: narendramodi

text:
May the lamp of progress and prosperity shine brighter and brighter in every home. 

Join crores of beneficiaries of people-centric schemes of the NDA Government and hardworking @BJP4India Karyakartas in the ongoing #BJPKamalJyoti Sankalp Abhiyan.

Come, let us spread brightness.
author: narendramodi

text: The Gita teaches us harmony and brotherhood. Addressing a programme at Delhi’s ISKCON temple.
author: narendramodi

text: सौगंध मुझे इस मिट्टी की, मैं देश नहीं झुकने दूंगा...
author: narendramodi

text: वीरों की भूमि, राजस्थान के चुरू से देखिए मेरा संबोधन...
author: narendramodi

text: Honouring those who have been conferred the Gandhi Peace Prize. Watch my remarks.

text: Spoke on a widely discussed topic - jobs...
author: narendramodi

text: I found it surprising that the Congress would oppose Aadhaar but the reasons are now clear. Know why...
author: narendramodi

text: These two examples, one each from UP and Jharkhand, will show you how delayed projects adversely impact the development trajectory of our nation.
author: narendramodi

text:
NDA's priorities are people centric. Which is why, what must rise, like GDP growth & Ease of Doing Business have risen in our tenure & what should fall, like corruption & prices are falling.
In UPA, GDP growth rate was falling, business was tough, prices & corruption were high!
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking at the #News18RisingIndia Summit. Watch.

text:
Sharing some more glimpses from the Rashtriya Samar Smaarak, located in the heart of Delhi, near India Gate. 

Do visit the Smaarak whenever you can.
author: narendramodi

text:
Rashtriya Samar Smaarak, the #NationalWarMemorial has been dedicated to the nation.

India is eternally grateful to all those who have served the nation with utmost bravery and vigour. It is due to them that our nation is safe, secure and can reach new heights of progress.
author: narendramodi

text:
People have seen the difference between a Government guided by India First and a Government guided by ‘Family First.’

Those who focused on ‘Family First’ were bothered about naming everything under the sun after one family.

Our way is different, we care for 130 crore Indians!
author: narendramodi

text:
Those who ruled the nation for decades were not serious about the welfare of our armed forces. There are several examples to illustrate this point. 

From Bofors to Helicopter Scam, why is it that the same people’s names come up?
author: narendramodi

text: Making India self-sufficient as far as defence production is concerned.
author: narendramodi

text:
With the blessings of the people of India, the four decade old demand for OROP was fulfilled during the tenure of the NDA government. 

Several ex-servicemen benefitted from this decision.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing ex-servicemen before the dedication of #NationalWarMemorial to the nation.
author: narendramodi

text:
In a short while from now, Rashtriya Samar Smaarak, the #NationalWarMemorial will be dedicated to the nation. 

Here are some glimpses of the Memorial, located near India Gate in Central Delhi.
author: narendramodi

text:
बीमार का मुफ्त उपचार...अब मुमकिन है।

नामुमकिन अब मुमकिन है!
author: narendramodi

text:
The people of Prayagraj must be congratulated for being exceptional hosts of the Kumbh in the city.

The efforts of the Naviks, local administration, police personnel have been noteworthy. 

Congratulations to the UP Government for their stupendous organisation of the Kumbh!
author: narendramodi

text: ‘Swachh Kumbh, Swachh Aabhaar’ was a great platform to honour those great women and men who have worked tirelessly to keep the Kumbh at Prayagraj clean. Here are some glimpses from the programme. @PrayagrajKumbh
author: narendramodi

text:
Moments I’ll cherish for my entire life! 

Honouring remarkable Safai Karamcharis, who have taken the lead when it comes to realising the dream of a Swachh Bharat! 

I salute each and every person making a contribution towards a Swachh Bharat
author: narendramodi

text:
Enrich the programme on 28th by:

Mobilising family & friends to join.

Filling People’s Pulse survey and giving ground level feedback from your constituency. 

Donate to BJP, boost morale of Karyakartas. 

Share thoughts on NaMo App or social media using #MeraBoothSabseMazboot.
author: narendramodi

text:
For @BJP4India, hardworking Karyakartas are the biggest assets of the party. 

They are serving society with great diligence. 

On 28th February, I look forward to interacting with crores of Karyakartas, spread across more than 15,000 locations. #MeraBoothSabseMazboot
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the ‘Swachh Kumbh, Swachh Aabhaar’ programme in Prayagraj.
author: narendramodi

text: Had the good fortune of taking a holy dip at the #Kumbh. Prayed for the well being of 130 Crore Indians.
author: narendramodi

text:
Long live India’s farmers!

#PMKisan Yojana enhances the dignity of farmers, brings prosperity in their lives and contributes to India’s agricultural transformation.
author: narendramodi

text: किसानों का जीवन आसान बनाने के लिए केंद्र सरकार के कुछ अनूठे प्रयास।
author: narendramodi

text: केंद्र सरकार की ‘बीज से बाजार’ एप्रोच के कारण, कृषि व्यवस्था में जो बातें लोग पहले नामुमकिन समझते थे, वो अब मुमकिन हो रही हैं।
author: narendramodi

text: ये नया भारत है। इसमें केंद्र सरकार, जितना पैसा किसी गरीब के लिए, किसी किसान के लिए भेजती है, वो पूरा पैसा सीधे उसके खाते में पहुंचता है। बिचौलियों की कोई जगह नहीं है।
author: narendramodi

text:
जब केंद्र में किसानों के कल्याण के कार्य करने वाली सरकार होती है, तो यह उसकी नीतियों से भी स्पष्ट होता है।

कांग्रेस की बेहद कमजोर कर्जमाफी की नीति का लाभ बहुत कम किसानों को मिला, #PMKisan योजना से करोड़ों किसानों पर सकारात्मक प्रभाव पड़ेगा।
author: narendramodi

text:
आज 1 करोड़ 1 लाख किसानों के बैंक खातों में #PMKisan की पहली किस्त ट्रांसफर करने का सौभाग्य मिला। यह मेरे लिए बहुत भावुक क्षण था।

हमारे अन्नदाता देशवासियों का पेट भरने के लिए दिन-रात परिश्रम करते हैं। उनके कल्याण के लिए काम करना हमारी सर्वोच्च प्राथमिकता है।
author: narendramodi

text:
आज बाबा गोरखनाथ की धरती गोरखपुर से 'प्रधानमंत्री किसान सम्मान निधि' योजना की शुरुआत हुई।

इस ऐतिहासिक अवसर पर मैं देशभर के करोड़ों किसान परिवारों को बधाई देता हूं। #PMKisan
author: narendramodi

text:
My fellow Indians, 

Do you wish to see an India where everyone has access to good quality and affordable healthcare?

If so, then here's an appeal from me about what you can do... #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text:
Popularising local paintings of Kutch,

Serving Divyang sisters and brothers,
 
Improving local irrigation networks,

Fighting timber mafia and Maoists,

Spoke about Padma Awardees and how the awards honour fine individuals working silently at the grassroots. #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text:
The wait for our own National War Memorial is over!

Tomorrow, India will get its own War Memorial, which will honour those who protect us with utmost valour.

I am sure visiting the war memorial will be no less than a pilgrimage! #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text:
The 44th Amendment made our democracy stronger and ensured authoritarian tendencies can't subvert our Constitution, like what was done during the Emergency. 

During #MannKiBaat today, we paid tributes to Morarjibhai Desai and his role in protecting our democratic fabric.
author: narendramodi

text: India stands with our farmers! Launching the #PMKisan Yojana from Gorakhpur. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Discussing several subjects during #MannKiBaat. Tune in.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today’s #MannKiBaat is special! Do tune in at 11 AM. 

Later on don’t say I didn’t tell you in advance :)
author: narendramodi

text: Tributes to Jayalalithaa Ji on her birth anniversary. Her contribution towards the development of Tamil Nadu will be remembered for generations. A fine administrator and compassionate leader, her welfare measures benefitted countless poor people.
author: narendramodi

text:
Tomorrow’s launch of PM Kisan Samman Nidhi demonstrates two things:

NDA's unwavering commitment to farmer welfare.

Speedy decision making- a scheme announced on 1st February has become a reality in such a short span. 

This is the new work culture of New India!
author: narendramodi

text: Tomorrow is a historic day! The Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi will be launched from Gorakhpur. This is a scheme that will give wings to the aspirations of crores of hardworking farmers of India who feed our nation.
author: narendramodi

text:
बीते साढ़े चार वर्षों में जनहित के अनेक काम हुए हैं। 

एक नया विश्वास जगा है ।
author: narendramodi

text:
बीजेपी के संस्कार कांग्रेस से अलग हैं। हमने किसान कल्याण के लिए कोई कसर नहीं छोड़ी।

राजस्थान की जनता कांग्रेस से पूछ रही है – कर्जमाफी के वादे का क्या हुआ?
author: narendramodi

text: आज टोंक में मुझे राजस्थान के लोगों का भरपूर स्नेह और आशीर्वाद मिला। मैदान भी छोटा पड़ गया था। इस स्नेह के लिए धन्यवाद। @BJP4Rajasthan
author: narendramodi

text:
A historic accomplishment by a stellar athlete! 

Congratulations to @apurvichandela for winning the Gold in the 10m Air Rifle event at the ISSF World Cup. Her success makes every Indian proud and motivates more youngsters to excel in various sports!
author: narendramodi

text: Lok Sabha MP Shri S Rajendran will be remembered for his community service initiatives. He diligently worked for the development of Viluppuram and Tamil Nadu. Saddened by his demise. My thoughts are with his family and supporters in this hour of grief.
author: narendramodi

text: राजस्थान की जनता को शत-शत नमन। टोंक में सभा को संबोधित कर रहा हूं। देखिए...
author: narendramodi

text: India missed the bus when it came to the first three industrial revolutions but as far as the Fourth Industrial Revolution is concerned, this is a bus we haven't simply boarded, but we will also drive it!
author: narendramodi

text: नामुमकिन अब मुमकिन है!
author: narendramodi

text:
There are competitions now and there were competitions before 2014. 

Which ones do you prefer?
author: narendramodi

text:
Over the last 4.5 years, 

Hesitations made way for hope. 

Obstacles have been replaced by optimism. 

Issues have been sorted out by initiatives. 

The results of the efforts can be seen in many global rankings too.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the @EconomicTimes Global Business Summit. Watch. #ETGBS
author: narendramodi

text: I would like to specially thank President @moonriver365 and FL Kim Jung-sook. It was wonderful to interact with them. President Moon and I will continue working together for stronger ties between India and the Republic of Korea.
author: narendramodi

text: Gratitude to the people and Government of the Republic of Korea for the exceptional warmth during my visit. This visit will lead to closer economic and cultural relations between our countries. Strong India-Korea ties benefit not only Asia but the entire world.
author: narendramodi

text: 문재인 대통령과 김정숙 여사 내외께 특별히 감사드림. 함께 멋진 시간을 보냈음. 문대통령과 함께 강력한 한-인도 협력관계를 위해 앞으로도 협력하겠음.
author: narendramodi

text: 한국 정부와 국민들이 보여준 환대에 감사. 이번 방문으로 양국간 경제 문화적 관계가 가까워질 것임. 강력한 한-인도 협력은 아시아뿐 아니라 전세계를 위해 좋은 일임.
author: narendramodi

text: India will always do everything possible to contribute to global peace and progress.
author: narendramodi

text:
The solution to hardships is in hard work. 

We are leaving no stone unturned to bring a transformative change in the lives of 130 crore Indians.
author: narendramodi

text: I would be giving the prize money of the #SeoulPeacePrize to the Namami Gange fund. It is our collective duty to ensure a clean Ganga, which is so central to our culture.
author: narendramodi

text:
Here are some glimpses from the ceremonial welcome at the 
@TheBlueHouseKR.
author: narendramodi

text: The Act East Policy of India and President @moonriver365’s New Southern Policy augur well for close friendship between India and the Republic of Korea. Today, President Moon and I talked about cooperation in areas like ports, food processing and the vital infrastructure sector.
author: narendramodi

text: Held productive discussions with President @moonriver365 on various aspects relating to India-Korea relations. Today’s discussions will add further vigour to bilateral relations between our nations.
author: narendramodi

text: 문재인 대통령과 한-인도 양국관계의 여러 측면에 대해 생산적인 대화를 가졌음. 오늘의 논의는 양국간 관계에 활력을 더해 줄 것임.
author: narendramodi

text: The Seoul Peace Prize is dedicated to the people of India & our country’s culture of peace and harmony.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the media after the productive talks with President @moonriver365. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Interacting with the Republic of Korea's dynamic Indian community. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Here are some glimpses from Yonsei University, where Mahatma Gandhi’s bust was unveiled. 

The august presence of President @moonriver365, FL Kim Jung-sook and my friend, Mr. Ban Ki-moon (former Secretary General of the United Nations) made the programme even more special.
author: narendramodi

text:
The start-up sector has the energy of youngsters as well as the zeal to create something unique and beneficial for fellow citizens. 

Both India and the Republic of Korea are giving topmost importance to this sector. Hence, it is natural to deepen cooperation in start-ups.
author: narendramodi

text:
Over the last four and a half years, the transformative changes have led to:

Sound economic fundamentals. 

Consistent growth. 

Pathbreaking reforms. 

Fruits of development reaching the poorest of the poor.

Fast paced creation of futuristic infrastructure.
author: narendramodi

text:
For the last four and a half years, India has witnessed unprecedented transformation. 

I hope companies from the Republic of Korea leverage the series of opportunities India offers.
author: narendramodi

text: Bapu’s voice reverberates globally! Unveiling a bust of Gandhi Ji in Seoul.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing Indian and Korean businesspersons in Seoul. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Subjects relating to world peace, security, the need to fight terrorism figured during the talks with HRH Mohammed Bin Salman.
author: narendramodi

text: HRH Mohammed Bin Salman and I discussed aspects relating to closer investment ties between our nations. We also had discussions relating to the oil and energy sector. I am glad that Saudi Arabia has decided to strengthen the International Solar Alliance with its participation.
author: narendramodi

text:
Held extensive talks with HRH Mohammed Bin Salman, the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia. 

India’s ties with Saudi Arabia are historical and time-tested. 

Saudi Arabia is a valued strategic partner of India in the 21st century.
author: narendramodi

text:
During our talks, President @moonriver365 and I will take forward our conversations from last year on how best to advance the India-ROK partnership. 

I will also meet business leaders,  the Indian community as well as eminent persons from all walks of life.
author: narendramodi

text:
As fellow democracies, India and ROK have shared values and a vision for world peace. 

As fellow market economies, our needs and strengths are complementary. 

ROK is an important partner for @makeinindia, @swachhbharat and @startupindia initiatives.
author: narendramodi

text:
This evening, I will be leaving for the Republic of Korea at the invitation of President @moonriver365. 

We regard the Republic of Korea as a valued friend with which we have a Special Strategic Partnership. 

The visit will boost bilateral cooperation.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the media after talks with HRH Mohammed Bin Salman, the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia.
author: narendramodi

text: हिन्दी साहित्य के शिखर पुरुष नामवर सिंह जी के निधन से गहरा दुख हुआ है। उन्होंने आलोचना के माध्यम से हिन्दी साहित्य को एक नई दिशा दी। ‘दूसरी परंपरा की खोज’ करने वाले नामवर जी का जाना साहित्य जगत के लिए अपूरणीय क्षति है। ईश्वर दिवंगत आत्मा को शांति दे और परिजनों को संबल प्रदान करे।
author: narendramodi

text:
Best wishes on Mizoram Statehood Day. 

The people of Mizoram are known for their valour and rich value systems. The entire nation is proud of the Mizo culture and the contribution of the state towards India’s progress. 

Praying for Mizoram’s growth in the coming years.
author: narendramodi

text:
Greetings to the people of Arunachal Pradesh on their Statehood Day. 

The culture of Arunachal Pradesh is special and its people are known for their wonderful nature as well as patriotic zeal. 

May the state continue to prosper in the years to come.
author: narendramodi

text: India is delighted to welcome HRH Mohammed Bin Salman, the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia.
author: narendramodi

text: Memorable moments from the public meeting in Varanasi.
author: narendramodi

text:
हमारी सरकार देश के विकास को दो पटरियों पर एक साथ आगे बढ़ा रही है।

पहली पटरी है इंफ्रास्ट्रक्चर।

दूसरी पटरी गरीब, किसान, श्रमिक, मध्यम वर्ग का जीवन आसान बनाने की है।
author: narendramodi

text: Remarkable strides in the IT and health sector, that will benefit Uttar Pradesh, especially Purvanchal.
author: narendramodi

text:
In Varanasi, flagged off the first ever Diesel to Electric Converted Locomotive. 

I congratulate the entire team that has worked on this historic accomplishment, which will enhance the efforts of the Railways towards electrification.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, on the auspicious occasion of Ravidas Jayanti, offered prayers at the Shri Guru Ravidass Janam Asthan. 

Guru Ravidas’ message of harmony, equality and efforts to empower the poor continue to motivate people across India.
author: narendramodi

text: काशी की जनता को शत-शत नमन। काशी के विकास के लिए हमारे प्रयास जारी रहेंगे। औढ़े गांव से देखिए लाइव...
author: narendramodi

text: काशी के संत रविदास जी के मंदिर में दर्शन करने का सौभाग्य मिला और विकास की परियोजनाओं की नींव रखी।
author: narendramodi

text: परम पूज्य संत रविदास जी को उनकी जयंती पर कोटि-कोटि नमन। सद्भाव, समानता और सामाजिक सशक्तिकरण के लिए उन्होंने जो अनमोल एवं अमिट संदेश दिया, वह हमें सदा प्रेरित करता रहेगा।
author: narendramodi

text:
I bow to Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj on his Jayanti. 

A warrior for truth and justice, he is revered as an ideal ruler, devout patriot and is particularly respected by the poor and downtrodden. Jai Shivaji!
author: narendramodi

text: Inspired by the vision of Atal Ji and Balasaheb Thackeray Ji, BJP-Shiv Sena alliance will continue working for the well-being of Maharashtra and ensuring the state once again elects representatives who are development oriented, non corrupt and proud of India’s cultural ethos.
author: narendramodi

text:
Our association with the @ShivSena goes beyond politics. We are bound by a desire to see a strong and developed India. 

The decision to contest together strengthens the NDA significantly. I am sure our alliance is going to be Maharashtra’s first and only choice!
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, ten MoUs were signed between India and Argentina. 

Covering sectors such as defence, tourism, pharmaceuticals, agriculture, IT and civil nuclear cooperation, these agreements will further cement relations between our nations. @mauriciomacri
author: narendramodi

text: During the talks today, President @mauriciomacri and I discussed ways to deepen trade ties. The coming of a large Argentinian business delegation to India augurs well for strong economic relations.
author: narendramodi

text:
President @mauriciomacri and I discussed aspects relating to security and terrorism. 

We agree that forces of terror pose a serious threat to world peace and it is important for humanitarian forces to join hands and fight the menace of terror.
author: narendramodi

text:
Delighted to welcome President @mauriciomacri. 

Today was our fifth meeting, indicating the priority we accord to close friendship between India and Argentina. 

We are meeting at a time when we complete 70 years of bilateral diplomatic ties between our countries.
author: narendramodi

text:
Joined the programme to mark the conferring of the 'Tagore Award For Cultural Harmony' for 2014, 2015 and 2016.

I congratulate Rajkumar Singhajit Singh Ji, Chhayanaut and Ram V. Sutar Ji on being conferred the Tagore Award for their rich contribution to culture, art and music.
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy to know about the successful operation. 

Best wishes for your good health Ashok Ji. @ashokgehlot51
author: narendramodi

text: स्वस्थ बिहार, विकसित बिहार।
author: narendramodi

text:
हमारा प्रयास:

उत्तम इन्फ्रास्ट्रक्चर

गरीब का पक्का घर

हर घर में बिजली

रसोई को धुएं से मुक्त करना- गैस कनेक्शन

पीने का साफ पानी।
author: narendramodi

text:
आज कई ट्रेनों को हरी झंडी दिखाई। इनसे कनेक्टिविटी में सुधार आएगा। 

पटना रिवरफ्रंट बनने से पर्यटन को बढ़ावा मिलेगा।
author: narendramodi

text: प्रधानमंत्री ऊर्जा गंगा योजना पूर्वी भारत के विकास में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभा रही है।
author: narendramodi

text: Ensuring ‘Ease of Living’ for my sisters and brothers of Jharkhand.
author: narendramodi

text: Boosting Bihar’s development. Inaugurating multiple projects in Barauni.
author: narendramodi

text:
This month’s #MannKiBaat programme will take place on the 24th. 

Dial 1800-11-7800 to record a message for the programme. 

Express your wonderful ideas on either the MyGov Open Forum or the NaMo App.
author: narendramodi

text:
Will be in Hazaribagh, Jharkhand today to inaugurate:

Three medical college buildings.

Four rural water supply schemes.

Sahibganj Sewerage Treatment Plant

Madhusudan Ghat.

Foundation stone for many projects will also be laid. 

Know more.
author: narendramodi

text:
I look forward to being in Bihar’s Barauni. 

The inauguration and laying of foundation stones for projects relating to urban development, sanitation, railways, oil and gas, healthcare as well as fertilisers will take place today.
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings to Telangana’s Chief Minister, Shri K. Chandrashekar Rao Garu on his birthday. May Almighty bless him with a long life filled with good health. @TelanganaCMO
author: narendramodi

text: In Yavatmal, talked about landmark decisions for the benefit of farmers and nomadic communities.
author: narendramodi

text:
Connecting people, furthering aspirations. 

The foundation stones and inaugurations took place for many connectivity related projects, which will improve convenience for people in Yavatmal and surrounding areas. 

Several people also got their own new homes.
author: narendramodi

text:
Ayushman Bharat is having a positive impact among the poor, SC and ST communities of Maharashtra. 

Thanks to Ayushman Bharat, good quality and affordable healthcare is no longer a dream…
author: narendramodi

text:
Dhule and Gau Mata have a glorious history. 

The proposed Kamdhenu Aayog will have a transformative impact as far as the animal husbandry sector is concerned.
author: narendramodi

text:
A significant effort has been made today to overcome the issue of water scarcity in Maharashtra. 

At the same time, there is emphasis on ensuring better irrigation and improving sewer systems.
author: narendramodi

text:
The dastardly attack in Pulwama has anguished the nation. 

Yes, this is a time of great sadness. 

But, I assure every family that a befitting reply will be given!
author: narendramodi

text:
It was good interacting with my sisters and brothers of Maharashtra during programmes at Yavatmal and Dhule. 

Here are some glimpses.
author: narendramodi

text: Improving irrigation and connectivity in Maharashtra.
author: narendramodi

text: Enhancing education, housing and financial inclusion for the poor.
author: narendramodi

text:
We salute you, brave sons of Mother India. 

You lived for the nation and served the country with unparalleled valour. 

We stand in solidarity with the bereaved families.
author: narendramodi

text:
A grateful nation bows to the martyrs of Pulwama. 

A befitting reply will be given to the perpetrators of the heinous attack and their patrons. 

No force will succeed in disturbing peace, progress and stability of India.
author: narendramodi

text: India gets the first Semi High Speed Train, 'Vande Bharat Express.'
author: narendramodi

text: Spoke to Home Minister Rajnath Singh Ji and other top officials regarding the situation in the wake of the attack in Pulwama.
author: narendramodi

text: Attack on CRPF personnel in Pulwama is despicable. I strongly condemn this dastardly attack. The sacrifices of our brave security personnel shall not go in vain. The entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with the families of the brave martyrs. May the injured recover quickly.
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings to @SushmaSwaraj Ji on her birthday. Sushma Ji is one of the most remarkable leaders of our nation. She has distinguished herself as an outstanding Minister and her oratory is par excellence. Her role in strengthening BJP is key. Praying for her long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text: Productivity of the 16th Lok Sabha is exceptionally high, with the average being over 85%. The House took landmark decisions in the interest of the poor, farmers, youth and in eliminating corruption. These will have a transformative impact on India’s growth in the years to come.
author: narendramodi

text:
Earlier today, spoke at the last sitting of the 16th Lok Sabha. 

I congratulate all my fellow Lok Sabha MPs who enriched the proceedings with their insights. 

I also congratulate Speaker Sumitra Mahajan Ji for her outstanding efforts as the Speaker of the House. @S_MahajanLS
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the #CREDAIYouthCon2019. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking in the Lok Sabha. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: I wholeheartedly support the #DrugFreeIndia movement organised by @SriSri Ji and his team. Their efforts will spread great awareness on the menace of substance abuse. Efforts like these reflect the collective will of our society towards a better and healthier future. @ArtofLiving
author: narendramodi

text:
In Kurukshetra today, I had the opportunity to see glimpses of some of the toilets that have been painted. 

I was impressed, both by the dexterity of the artists and the passion towards cleanliness. 

Such awareness and efforts add valuable strength to the Swachh Bharat Mission.
author: narendramodi

text: You’ve heard of many competitions but we’ve been having a unique one called the Swachh Sundar Shauchalaya, where toilets are to be painted. This fusion of art with cleanliness is commendable. In January, almost 1.3 crore toilets were painted. Well done to all those who took part!
author: narendramodi

text:
I am really happy to see @BJP4India leaders and Karyakartas strengthen the #MeraParivarBhajapaParivar movement across India. 

It is wonderful to see the BJP endearing itself to all sections of society and being at the forefront of raising issues of public welfare.
author: narendramodi

text:
On the way to Kurukshetra, captured a picture of the sacred Brahma Sarovar. 

Next time you are travelling to Haryana, do make it a point to see this iconic place and the other tourist places in the state. #IncredibleIndia
author: narendramodi

text: जो भ्रष्ट है, उसको मोदी से कष्ट है!
author: narendramodi

text: A commitment towards the development of Haryana, including better healthcare and education opportunities.
author: narendramodi

text:
Increased maternity leave.

Fulfilling entreprenurial dreams through Mudra Yojana.

Focus on maternal health. 

The efforts of the NDA Government are contributing towards empowerment of women.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Swachh Shakti- 2019 in Haryana’s Kurukshetra was a wonderful occasion to honour the outstanding people who are making the Swachh Bharat Movement stronger at the grassroots level. 

In Kurukshetra, also inaugurated and laid foundation stones for various development works.
author: narendramodi

text:
This morning, Atal Ji’s portrait at Parliament’s Central Hall was unveiled by Rashtrapati Ji.

India is proud of Atal Ji’s landmark contribution to the nation. His leadership took India to newer heights of progress. @rashtrapatibhvn
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a programme in the historic land of Kurukshetra in Haryana. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: A tribute to Atal Ji. His portrait has been unveiled at Central Hall.
author: narendramodi

text:
3 billion meals is a remarkable feat!

Happy to have joined the programme organised by the Akshaya Patra Foundation and interact with these wonderful youngsters.
author: narendramodi

text: अक्षय पात्र फाउंडेशन के प्रयास, ‘मैं से हम’ तक की यात्रा का सबसे अच्छा उदाहरण है।
author: narendramodi

text: Know more about some of the major reforms in the oil and gas sector in India during the last four years.
author: narendramodi

text: Prioritising energy justice.
author: narendramodi

text:
India has taken the lead when it comes to ensuring equality in energy access. 

We are also hopeful that the problems of energy availability globally will be suitably addressed.
author: narendramodi

text: Had the honour of serving food to children in Vrindavan today.
author: narendramodi

text: 3 billion meals and a commitment to serve society! At the Akshaya Patra Foundation programme.
author: narendramodi

text: Towards a vibrant oil and energy sector. Addressing @Petrotech2019.
author: narendramodi

text: Deen Dayal Ji emphasised on honesty in public life. Today on his Punya Tithi, BJP is starting a movement #SamarpanDivas to further transparency and clean money in politics. Urging you all to donate to the Party. The NaMo App is an easy way to do so. I too made my contribution.
author: narendramodi

text: Remembering Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Ji on his Punya Tithi. His emphasis on ‘Integral Humanism’ inspires millions of people. He was known as an exceptional organiser who mentored several patriotic and hardworking Karyakartas. His was a life devoted to nation building.
author: narendramodi

text:
I will be in Vrindavan today for a unique programme- to mark the serving of the 3rd billionth meal by the Akshaya Patra Foundation. 

Congratulations to all those associated with this mission. Their efforts towards eradicating hunger are exemplary.
author: narendramodi

text: Today, will inaugurate @Petrotech2019 and address the inaugural session of the conference.  #PETROTECH2019 brings together leading stakeholders of the oil and gas sectors. This conference will enhance investments in India in the oil and energy sectors. http://www.pmindia.gov.in/en/news_updates/pm-to-inaugurate-petrotech-2019-on-february-11-2019/?comment=disable …
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you Hubballi for the enthusiasm today! @BJP4Karnataka
author: narendramodi

text:
Karnataka offers the best trailer of a 'Maha Milawat' government. 

Opportunist alliance. 

Decisions taken by a few.

Constant bickering over portfolios. 

Internal fights. 

A helpless CM who becomes a punching bag for all coalition partners. 

Such a Government is disastrous.
author: narendramodi

text:
The people of India trust BJP. 

Our track record shows we can eliminate corruption and end the culture of middlemen roaming the corridors of power.
author: narendramodi
