text: Good to see the vibrant conversations, insightful facts, stories and videos around how cities are transforming. Do check out #MODIfiedCities & also share your observations.
author: narendramodi

text: Overwhelmed by the strong support in Hubballi. Speaking at a rally. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
There’s no place for adulteration in a healthy society as ours. 

The people are going to reject the ‘Maha Milawat’ taking shape among the Opposition parties.
author: narendramodi

text: There is a 'family pack' for bail and no prizes to guess who are the beneficiaries of this pack.
author: narendramodi

text:
Never forget how arrogant Congress ministers insulted the middle class. In all their years in power they didn’t do anything for the middle class. 

In our 55 months, the NDA has focused on ‘Ease of Living’ for the middle class.
author: narendramodi

text:
Here a deal, there a deal, everywhere a deal...this is how Congress views defence sector. Always wanting to make money. 

For us, what matters is a strong India and the welfare of those who serve the nation.
author: narendramodi

text: Wonderful to be in Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu. Watch my speech at the massive rally.
author: narendramodi

text:
The BJP has served, is serving and always will serve the people of Andhra Pradesh. 

In the last four and a half years, whatever had to be done to ensure justice for my sisters and brothers of Andhra Pradesh, we have done. 

We stand with Andra Pradesh and its great people.
author: narendramodi

text:
One must admire Chandrababu Naidu Garu’s honesty. 

He says he is a wealth creator! 

He’s obviously creating lots of wealth for him and his son while AP suffers. 

We are patriotic Indians...we are only thinking about the nation. Creating wealth is never on our minds.
author: narendramodi

text: I thank the TDP cadre and their leader for wishing what every patriotic Indian also wishes- that Modi goes back to Delhi and once again becomes the Prime Minister! I guess they have read the writing on the wall!
author: narendramodi

text:
My ‘senior’ in politics, Shri Chandrababu Naidu obviously has lots to hide. Else why won’t he give an account of what his miserable Government has done for Andhra Pradesh. 

Centre has left no stone unturned for the state’s progress but the priorities of the TDP are different.
author: narendramodi

text:
From fighting the Dushta Congress under the formidable NTR Garu to becoming a Dost of Congress, the TDP has come a long way. 

Andhra Pradesh has seen the TDP’s true colours.
author: narendramodi

text:
Chandrababu Naidu Garu keeps saying he is senior to Modi, he is senior to Modi. 

Of course he is...

Know how!
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking to my sisters and brothers of Andhra Pradesh. Watch the rally in Guntur.
author: narendramodi

text:
I would be visiting three states today. 

Shall be addressing rallies in Guntur (Andhra Pradesh), Tiruppur (Tamil Nadu) and Hubballi (Karnataka).

You can watch the programmes on the NaMo App.
author: narendramodi

text: नव उमंग, नई ऊर्जा एवं नव स्फूर्ति के प्रतीक-पर्व बसंत पंचमी की सभी देशवासियों को ढेर सारी शुभकामनाएं। मेरी कामना है कि विद्या की देवी मां सरस्वती सबको ज्ञान एवं सद्‌बुद्धि प्रदान करें।
author: narendramodi

text:
The BJP Government in Tripura is focussing on the education sector. 

During the Communist misrule, Government jobs were given on the basis of party loyalty. Now there is a culture of merit and transparency.
author: narendramodi

text: In less than a year, the BJP Government in Tripura has brought major changes in the state. There is pro-people governance and a hard crackdown on corruption.
author: narendramodi

text: Honoured to have unveiled a statue of the great Maharaja Bir Bikram Kishore Manikya Bahadur at the airport in Agartala.
author: narendramodi

text:
The strong bond between Assam and the BJP can be seen at the rally at Amingaon today. 

The Centre and Assam Government are taking numerous steps for the progress of the state. 

The recent Budget of the Assam Government will have a transformative impact too. @BJP4Assam
author: narendramodi

text:
During Congress rule, the headlines from the Northeast indicated sheer neglect and apathy. The headlines now reflect positivity and development. 

Congress has zero respect for Assam’s culture. They had no will to implement important parts of the Assam Accord.
author: narendramodi

text: Spoke to my sisters and brothers of Assam on aspects of the Citizenship (Amendment) Bill and also assured them that the interests of Assam and other parts of the Northeast will always be protected.
author: narendramodi

text: The BJP is committed to preserving the culture and ethos of Assam.
author: narendramodi

text:
When it comes to Bharat Ratnas, those who ruled the nation for 55 years had a fixed approach- the award for some was reserved the moment they were born while others were ignored. 

Atal Ji’s Government and the present NDA Government honoured two greats from Assam.
author: narendramodi

text: Hello Agartala! Delighted to address a massive programme in this city.
author: narendramodi

text:
One of the prime considerations behind the impetus towards Arunachal Pradesh’s all-round development is to make the state an even bigger hub for tourism. 

More people from India and across the world should come to Arunachal! 

Tourism also boosts the local economy.
author: narendramodi

text:
55 years of one party and 55 months of BJP... in all spheres of Arunachal Pradesh’s development, our work has been quicker and all-inclusive. 

The Congress ignored the youth of the state and their apathy towards the Jawans guarding our nation is anyway well known.
author: narendramodi

text:
Efforts are on, for not one, but two airports in Arunachal Pradesh!

Such focus on connectivity and affordable aviation is unheard of in Arunachal Pradesh’s history!
author: narendramodi

text:
Arunachal Pradesh...

A land associated with the rising Sun, brightness and a land that is home to courageous and warm-hearted people. 

Happy to have been in Itanagar. Several projects were initiated that will transform lives of the people of the state.
author: narendramodi

text: I bow to Assam’s great culture. Addressing a rally in Amingaon. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Boosting the development of Arunachal Pradesh. Watch the programme in Itanagar.
author: narendramodi

text:
Yesterday, had requested you all to share pictures of your visits to the Northeast on Instagram using #MagnificentNortheast. 

I shared some of the pictures in a Story on my page. Do have a look! 

https://www.instagram.com/narendramodi/?hl=en …
author: narendramodi

text: Looking forward being among the sisters and brothers of Arunachal Pradesh, Assam and Tripura today.
author: narendramodi

text: Pictures from the rally in Jalpaiguri. @BJP4Bengal
author: narendramodi

text:
In TMC rule the following are welcome: 

Illegal infiltrators. 

Chit fund looters. 

Leaders who face corruption charges. 

But, those believing in democracy are not welcome.

What TMC is doing is not the culture of West Bengal. They are trying to destroy the state’s culture.
author: narendramodi

text:
Have you ever seen a sitting CM doing Dharnas to defend those who looted the people in Chit Funds?

Well, it happened in West Bengal. It is deeply unfortunate.
author: narendramodi

text:
If we thought the Communists were bad, meet Communism Part 2- the TMC!

Didi is CM but someone else’s Dadagiri goes on in West Bengal.

Didi is in such a hurry to go to Delhi that she has left the state in the hands of middlemen and a syndicate.
author: narendramodi

text:
North Bengal and I, both have a deep association with tea.

But, Didi dislikes both the tea sector and the tea-seller.

No wonder she is not working for the development of North Bengal!
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस ने छत्तीसगढ़ में सरकार बनाते ही जो काम किए, उनमें से एक है, राज्य को आयुष्मान भारत योजना से अलग करना। 

उनके लिए राजनीति, राज्य की जनता के स्वास्थ्य से भी ऊपर है।
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress style of politics- every ten years promise a waiver that is poorly conceived and benefits only a handful of farmers. 

In Chhattisgarh Congress came to power promising waivers too but it’s been two months and the benefits have not reached the farmers. 

Shame.
author: narendramodi

text:
Pictures from the public meeting in Raigarh.

People of Chhattisgarh are already disappointed with the Congress government in the state. 

I talked about the steps taken by the Centre for the welfare of the farmers, middle class and unorganised sector. @BJP4CGState
author: narendramodi

text: Come to Jalpaiguri and see the support for BJP! Speaking at a huge rally.
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking to my sisters and brothers of Chhattisgarh. Watch the rally in Raigarh.
author: narendramodi

text:
The beauty of the Northeast is spectacular. 

Do you have pictures of your own Northeast visits or glimpses of the spectacular natural beauty of the region? 

Share them on Instagram using #MagnificentNortheast. I will share some of the posts on my page too!
author: narendramodi

text:
In the afternoon, I will address a public meeting in Mainaguri. 

During my recent visits to West Bengal, I have been seeing the massive support for BJP. 

The people of West Bengal realise that only BJP can fulfil their dreams and aspirations. @BJP4Bengal
author: narendramodi

text:
Various development projects will be initiated in Jalpaiguri today. 

These will greatly benefit the people of West Bengal. 

http://www.pmindia.gov.in/en/news_updates/pm-to-visit-jalpaiguri-west-bengal-tomorrow/?comment=disable …
author: narendramodi

text:
The first programme will be a public meeting in Chhattisgarh’s Raigarh. 

I would be sharing my thoughts on a wide range of subjects during the programme. You can watch the speech on the NaMo App. @BJP4CGState
author: narendramodi

text:
Today and tomorrow, I will be joining programmes in Chhattisgarh, West Bengal, Assam, Arunachal Pradesh and Tripura. 

Looking forward to interacting with the people of these states.
author: narendramodi

text:
देश ने एनडीए की मजबूत सरकार देखी और देश ने उनकी मजबूर एवं मिलावटी सरकार देखी।

अब ये लोग महामिलावटी सरकार की बात कर रहे हैं।

भारत जैसे देश में महामिलावटी सरकार बिल्कुल नहीं चलेगी।
author: narendramodi

text:
History, Congress style:

BC- Before Congress…the era where nothing happened.

AD- After dynasty…the era where everything happened and that too thanks to one family. 

This is reflective of the arrogance that got them from 400 to 44!
author: narendramodi

text: किसान कल्याण के लिए प्रतिबद्ध एनडीए सरकार...
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress imposed Emergency.
Congress insults the Armed Forces.
Congress goes on foreign soil and spreads lies about democratic processes.
Congress misuses Article 356.

Yet, they say Modi destroys institutions. 
How much do they lie?
author: narendramodi

text:
NDA’s efforts- strengthen national security. 

UPA’s efforts- weaken national security. 
On whose bidding are they opposing important defence deals?
Why have they always looted the defence sector?
author: narendramodi

text:
More opportunities for education.

Better healthcare.

Controlling the menace of rising prices.

Ours is a Government committed to ensuring a better quality of life for the middle class.
author: narendramodi

text: Here are some important details about the opportunities being created for India's Yuva Shakti.
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking in the Lok Sabha. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Anguished by the passing away of Lok Sabha MP from Aska, Odisha, Shri Ladu Kishore Swain Ji. He will be remembered for his rich service to society. His work towards rural development was noteworthy. Spoke to his son Nachiketa and expressed condolences.
author: narendramodi

text: NDA Government is honoured to have undertaken numerous steps for the wellbeing of the middle class. From a friendlier tax system to better healthcare, quality education to more opportunities, no stone is being left unturned to ensure ‘Ease of Living.' #MiddleClassWithModi
author: narendramodi

text: India is home to a dynamic middle class, which is making an outstanding contribution to the nation’s progress. The work ethic of the middle class is admirable and so is their honesty and compassion.
author: narendramodi

text: Today, on #WorldCancerDay we reiterate our commitment towards ensuring early detection and affordable treatment of cancer. Initiatives like Ayushman Bharat have a strong emphasis on providing quality healthcare and ensuring cancer-free lives.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congratulated @DrKrishanMiddha Ji for the remarkable win in Jind. 

Over the years, the people of Haryana have been continuously supporting BJP’s agenda of pro-people, inclusive and corruption-free development. @BJP4Haryana
author: narendramodi

text:
I salute all those who are valiantly fighting cancer. Millions are inspired by their remarkable zeal.

I also appreciate those researching on aspects of cancer treatment. Their efforts will go a long way in ensuring a healthier planet. #WorldCancerDay
author: narendramodi

text:
The iconic Dal Lake is mesmerising! 

Had the opportunity to visit the lake during my visit to Srinagar.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had the wonderful opportunity of interacting with Sarpanchs from across Jammu and Kashmir. 

I admire these remarkable men and women, who have shown great courage and are working to transform lives.
author: narendramodi

text:
The NDA Government has made sincere efforts to enhance the prosperity of farmers.

All the Congress could do for years is to think about poorly conceived loan waivers!

When the PM Kisan Samman Nidhi was announced, the Opposition was stunned.
author: narendramodi

text: People from all walks of life came to bless the BJP during the rally in Jammu. Here are some glimpses. @BJP4JnK
author: narendramodi

text:
Youth of Jammu and Kashmir want peace and development. 

The ethos of this land is all about harmony and brotherhood.

Any element who disturbs the developent journey of Jammu and Kashmir, spreads violence and hate will be given a strong answer! Terrorism will not be tolerated.
author: narendramodi

text: The Central Government attaches immense priority towards energy, education, healthcare and infrastructure related works in Jammu and Kashmir.
author: narendramodi

text:
The last few months have witnessed an increase in the pace of development in Jammu and Kashmir. 

Projects that were pending for years are being completed and this is helping the people of the state.
author: narendramodi

text: In Leh, talked at length about an important decision of the Government that will have a positive impact on the lives of the SC and ST communities.
author: narendramodi

text:
The beauty of Leh, Ladakh draws people from all over the world. 

Today, I had the opportunity to visit this vibrant part of India and interact with its wonderful people. 

The freezing temperature was inversely proportional to the people’s warmth!
author: narendramodi

text: Interacting with students from across the country from Srinagar. Join us!
author: narendramodi

text: BJP and Jammu have a strong bond. Addressing a rally. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Participative democracy is an article of faith for our party. We have always worked to be an effective voice for rights and well-being of each and every Indian and to build a strong and prosperous India.
#BharatKeMannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text:
Your voice is of utmost importance. 

Urging you all to take part in 'Bharat ke Mann ki Baat, Modi ke Saath’, a unique effort by @BJP4India to get citizen feedback.

What you all share will form the blueprint of our ‘Sankalp Patra’ for the 2019 elections. https://bharatkemannkibaat.com
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted to be in Leh. Addressing a public meeting.
author: narendramodi

text: Deeply anguished by the loss of lives due to the derailment of coaches of the Seemanchal Express. My thoughts are with the bereaved families. May the injured recover quickly. Railways, NDRF, and local authorities are providing all possible assistance in the wake of the accident.
author: narendramodi

text:
Even a large stadium was too small for the sisters and brothers who joined us in Durgapur.

Thank you, your blessings are appreciated and give me strength in the fight against corrupt and criminal elements ruining West Bengal.
author: narendramodi

text:
My battle against corruption has ruffled many feathers, including TMC.

So, they all assembled in Kolkata and collectively abused me.

They got together to save their own families and hide their corruption. 

I will not rest till the corrupt are punished.
author: narendramodi

text:
In West Bengal:

If one wants to study- Triple T.

If one wants a job- Triple T.

If one want to lead a life of peace and dignity- Triple T.

TMC’s syndicates are looting and harassing the state. 

But, their days in power are numbered, I assure you.
author: narendramodi

text:
Her own party’s health is failing, support is dwindling so Didi decides to disassociate West Bengal from Ayushman Bharat!

Why has compassion for the poor become a rarity in TMC?
author: narendramodi

text:
Ours is a Government that cares for each and every Indian.

For decades, those associated with the unorganised sector were left to their own fate. Not any longer!
author: narendramodi

text:
Through poorly conceived loan waiver schemes, parties that ruled India for decades kept farmers under poverty. Most farmers never even benefitted from those so called waivers.

NDA’s approach to prosperity of farmers is more inclusive, empowering and long term.
author: narendramodi

text: The #BudgetForNewIndia, which was presented yesterday has a clearly defined approach to enhance ‘Ease of Living’ for the hardworking middle class.
author: narendramodi

text:
Eastern India is at the core of our development agenda but projects in West Bengal either do not start on time or their speed is slow.

Do you know why? Because TMC refuses to work on any project where their syndicate cannot make money!
author: narendramodi

text:
The people of West Bengal are peace loving but the temperament of the Left and TMC is different. They thrive on violence and intimidation. 

I want to tell them- the people of the state will not be intimidated. 

And, the people will show their might by rejecting the TMC!
author: narendramodi

text:
I bow to the people of Thakurnagar. 

These pictures indicate the enthusiasm towards BJP. 

The people of West Bengal are speaking loud and clear- they want Parivartan, they want BJP. @BJP4Bengal
author: narendramodi

text: West Bengal and BJP have a strong bond! Speaking in Durgapur. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Amazing response at the rally in Thakurnagar. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
At a programme in Durgapur, the rail electrification of Andal-Sainthia-Pakur-Malda and Khana-Sainthia Sections, and the Hijli-Narayangarh third line will be dedicated to the nation.

These works will strengthen the transport sector in the East and Northeast.
author: narendramodi

text: Tomorrow, I look forward to being among my sisters and brothers of West Bengal. I will be addressing @BJP4Bengal rallies in Thakurnagar and Durgapur.
author: narendramodi

text: This is a #BudgetForNewIndia and for all Indians. Watch my take.
author: narendramodi

text:
In his address to Parliament today, Rashtrapati Ji highlighted the transformative changes that have taken place and presented a coherent roadmap for the times to come. @rashtrapatibhvn 

https://presidentofindia.nic.in/speeches-detail-hi.htm?645 …
author: narendramodi

text: I thank the people of Jind for blessing @BJP4Haryana. This is a seat where the Party has never won before. Glad to see the development agenda of BJP finding support among all sections of society. I congratulate the Haryana BJP and CM @mlkhattar for assiduously serving the people.
author: narendramodi

text: Euphoric New India Youth Conclave in Surat. Watch the interaction.
author: narendramodi

text: I will be interacting with youth and professionals in a town-hall programme at the New India Youth Conclave in Surat shortly. You can watch live on the NaMo App.
author: narendramodi

text: Venus Hospital will cater to Surat’s healthcare needs. I congratulate all those who worked towards the establishment of such a fine hospital. Inaugurated the hospital today.
author: narendramodi

text:
The NDA Government has transformed the housing sector and the beneficiaries are the poor and middle class. 

Be it urban or rural housing, our track record is exemplary. The numbers are more, the houses are bigger and the era of middlemen is over!
author: narendramodi

text:
More airports, bigger airports, better connectivity, affordable prices…know how the NDA Government is transforming the aviation sector.

A vibrant aviation sector augurs well for India’s development.
author: narendramodi

text:
Surat personifies hardwork and enterprise. It is also a city that has always respected Bapu’s ideals. 

The foundation stone laying and inauguration for many projects took place, including for a bigger airport. These projects will enhance ‘Ease of Living.’
author: narendramodi

text: Paid tributes to venerable Bapu at Rajghat.
author: narendramodi

text: In Dandi, a unique tribute to Bapu and brave Satyagrahis.
author: narendramodi

text: Inaugurating the state-of-the-art Venus Hospital in Surat. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Surat Airport to be expanded, leading to enhanced connectivity and prosperity. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to my colleague Shri @PrakashJavdekar Ji on his birthday. Praying for his long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text: We salute all the martyrs who laid down their lives for India. The country remains eternally grateful to them for their service and sacrifice.
author: narendramodi

text:
पूज्य बापू को उनकी पुण्यतिथि पर शत् शत् नमन।

Remembering Bapu on his Punya Tithi. We reiterate our commitment to follow the path shown by him and abide by the values he stood for.
author: narendramodi

text:
Tomorrow, on Bapu’s Punya Tithi, I will be in Dandi, the place from where Bapu challenged the might of colonialism.

In Dandi, the National Salt Satyagraha Memorial will be dedicated to the nation. This is a tribute to Satyagrahis led by Gandhi Ji, who worked for India’s freedom.
author: narendramodi

text: Tomorrow evening in Surat, I will join the New India Youth Conclave. This is a wonderful forum, bringing together youngsters and people from all sections of society. I look forward to a wonderful interaction!
author: narendramodi

text: In Surat, the Smt. Rasilaben Sevantilal Shah Venus Hospital will be inaugurated. This hospital will provide quality healthcare to citizens and strengthen the efforts to build a healthy India.
author: narendramodi

text:
I will be visiting Gujarat tomorrow to attend a wide range of programmes. 

In Surat, the foundation stone for extending the terminal building at Surat Airport will be laid. This will improve connectivity and economic growth in Surat and surrounding areas.
author: narendramodi

text: Glimpses from ‘Beating the Retreat’ ceremony.
author: narendramodi

text:
Depression and poor mental health are a cause of worry.

However, aspects relating to these can get solved. 

Watch out for early signs, discuss, support and if necessary, do not hesitate to visit a counsellor. 

We will always support our young friends!
author: narendramodi

text: Interesting questions by students from AMU and BHU on exams, subject choices and selecting careers.
author: narendramodi

text:
Youngsters asked me- should our goals be small or big. 

Here’s what we discussed.
author: narendramodi

text:
A common worry among parents- children spend too much time playing computer games... 

Young friends, enjoy the PlayStation but always remember the playground too!
author: narendramodi

text:
The report card of a child cannot become the visiting card of his or her parents. 

Every child is blessed with unique talents and deserves the right support to pursue them.
author: narendramodi

text:
I thank people from all walks of life, particularly student friends, parents and teachers for joining today’s Pariksha Pe Charcha 2.0 in large numbers. 

Here are some glimpses.
author: narendramodi

text: Join the Pariksha Pe Charcha 2.0 Town Hall! Delighted to be among our Yuva Shakti.
author: narendramodi

text: During his long years in public life, George Sahab never deviated from his political ideology. He resisted the Emergency tooth and nail. His simplicity and humility were noteworthy. My thoughts are with his family, friends and lakhs of people grieving. May his soul rest in peace.
author: narendramodi

text: When we think of Mr. George Fernandes, we remember most notably the fiery trade union leader who fought for justice, the leader who could humble the mightiest of politicians at the hustings, a visionary Railway Minister and a great Defence Minister who made India safe and strong.
author: narendramodi

text:
George Sahab represented the best of India’s political leadership. 

Frank and fearless, forthright and farsighted, he made a valuable contribution to our country. He was among the most effective voices for the rights of the poor and marginalised. 

Saddened by his passing away.
author: narendramodi

text:
The @BJP4India is fully committed towards the development and prosperity of Assam. 

We will always protect the interests of the state. 

Several initiatives of the Central and Assam Government have contributed towards transforming lives of the citizens of Assam. @BJP4Assam
author: narendramodi

text:
Gratitude to my sisters and brothers of Assam for the strong support to @BJP4Assam in polls to three Tribal Autonomous Councils in the state. 

I appreciate the local unit of the Party for their constant efforts to serve the people of the state.
author: narendramodi

text:
During my visit to Madurai yesterday, I had the honour of meeting a remarkable woman entrepreneur, Arulmozhi Saravanan. 

The Mudra Yojana brought a qualitative change in her life and she even sold products to the PMO!
author: narendramodi

text: Giri, your father is looking very good!
author: narendramodi

text: हमारी सेना ने ये स्पष्ट संदेश दिया है कि हम छेड़ते नहीं हैं, लेकिन किसी ने छेड़ा तो फिर छोड़ते भी नहीं हैं!
author: narendramodi

text: Rajeev, I hope this brings more guests to the restaurant too! :)
author: narendramodi

text: NDA Government is committed towards fulfilling the aspirations of the people of Tamil Nadu through a wide range of development projects.
author: narendramodi

text:
The people of Madurai welcomed me with great enthusiasm. 

It is my privilege that I have got the opportunity to work for the development of Tamil Nadu.
author: narendramodi

text: We have heard of many types of contests but a contest to beautify toilets is remarkable and an innovative way to strengthen the Swachh Bharat Mission.
author: narendramodi

text: Please convey my regards to Chandrakanth Ji. I am deeply touched by his gesture.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thank you! 

#MannKiBaat showcases the extraordinary aspects of India's past, present and future. I am merely a medium...it is the voice of 130 crore Indians.
author: narendramodi

text: Seeing the brilliant youngsters of the NCC reaffirms my belief that India's future is bright thanks to our talented Yuva Shakti.
author: narendramodi

text:
Sharing some pictures from the NCC Rally in Delhi today. 

I congratulate all those associated with the NCC family and wish them the very best for their future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thanks to the power of technology, Pariksha Pe Charcha Townhall Programme can be seen in several schools and colleges across India. 

This is an excellent opportunity to show solidarity with our hardworking and talented students who are preparing for exams.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear students, parents and teachers,

Tomorrow at 11 AM, we will be discussing stress free examinations during the Pariksha Pe Charcha 2.0 Townhall Programme. 

Looking forward to your presence!
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy to see this. 

These mementos I got during various programmes showcase the best of India’s diversity and artistic skills.
For years, the mementos I receive have been auctioned.

The proceeds of these mementoes will go towards Namami Gange. Know more.
author: narendramodi

text: Saluting India's Yuva Shakti. Addressing the NCC rally. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Glimpses from the public meeting at Thrissur. @BJP4Keralam
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you for the phenomenal support Madurai! @BJP4TamilNadu
author: narendramodi

text:
To settle personal scores, leaders of the Kerala Congress played with India’s strategic interests. 

Can such a Party ever think about the welfare of 130 crore Indians?
author: narendramodi

text: Elections will come and go, the nation will remain.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Opposition is bankrupt when it comes to a positive agenda for India’s development.

Their respect for institutions is minimal.

Congress leaders are also going abroad to insult people’s mandates.

130 crore Indians are seeing everything! They will punish such forces.
author: narendramodi

text:
Our endeavour is to make India a hub for the petrochemicals sector. 

‘Make in India’ offers many opportunities in this regard.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, various projects were initiated at the Kochi Refinery. 

These will go a long way in strengthening the petroleum and energy sector in India.
author: narendramodi

text: Ensuring social justice and inclusive growth for all sections of society.
author: narendramodi

text:
As far as Tamil Nadu is concerned, the NDA Government is working to make the state a hub for defence and aerospace sectors.

The State is also at the core of our vision of port-led development.
author: narendramodi

text:
Delighted to be in the ancient city of Madurai, which has a central place in the history and culture of Tamil Nadu. 

Laid the foundation stone for various projects relating to the health sector, including AIIMS. 

These projects will benefit the people of Tamil Nadu.
author: narendramodi

text: Come to Thrissur and see the enthusiasm towards BJP! Addressing a massive rally.
author: narendramodi

text: Tamil Nadu supports BJP! Watch the rally at Madurai.
author: narendramodi

text: 2019's first #MannKiBaat. Tune in.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to Meghalaya’s dynamic CM, Mr. @SangmaConrad on his birthday. He is energetically serving the people of the state. May Almighty bless him with a long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text: Tune in at 11 AM today. #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear Exam Warriors, 

People across India are standing shoulder to shoulder with you as you prepare for the exams.

Looking forward to seeing you all at a Pariksha Pe Charcha 2.0 Town Hall programme on the 29th! I hope you are sending your thoughts and ideas for the same as well.
author: narendramodi

text:
छोटा भीम का बड़ा समर्थन! 

Thank you Chhota Bheem, for strengthening the team that is fulfilling the dream of a Swachh Bharat.

This valuable support will surely motivate more youngsters to join the movement.
author: narendramodi

text: I had a great interaction with @YourStoryCo on aspects relating to startups, innovation, entrepreneurship, MSME sector and more. Have a look.
author: narendramodi

text:
The colours of India…

Have a look at the cultural diversity of our country shown at the #RepublicDay2019 celebrations.
author: narendramodi

text:
India’s military and security prowess at Rajpath.

Ours is a land of peace, which has shown the way when it comes to harmony and brotherhood. At the same time, we are fully prepared to give a strong answer to those elements who disturb the atmosphere of peace and spread violence.
author: narendramodi

text:
Our vibrant Republic! 

Here are some glimpses from the #RepublicDay2019 celebrations at Rajpath.
author: narendramodi

text:
At Amar Jawan Jyoti, a grateful nation pays homage to the brave soldiers who sacrificed their own lives for the nation. 

We salute their courage and patriotism.
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy Republic Day to all fellow Indians. 

सभी देशवासियों को #गणतंत्रदिवस की शुभकामनाएं।

जय हिन्द!
author: narendramodi

text:
Congratulations to all those who have been conferred the Padma Awards. 

India is proud of each and every awardee, for the rich contributions towards various fields. 

They have made our nation and the world a better place! https://mha.gov.in/sites/default/files/Padma_Awards_2019.pdf …
author: narendramodi

text:
Pranab Da is an outstanding statesman of our times. 

He has served the nation selflessly and tirelessly for decades, leaving a strong imprint on the nation's growth trajectory. 

His wisdom and intellect have few parallels. Delighted that he has been conferred the Bharat Ratna.
author: narendramodi

text:
The songs and music of Shri Bhupen Hazarika are admired by people across generations. From them radiates the message of justice, harmony and brotherhood. 

He popularised India's musical traditions globally. 

Happy that the Bharat Ratna has been conferred on Bhupen Da.
author: narendramodi

text:
Nanaji Deshmukh's stellar contribution towards rural development showed the way for a new paradigm of empowering those living in our villages. 

He personifies humility, compassion and service to the downtrodden. He is a Bharat Ratna in the truest sense!
author: narendramodi

text: Heard the insightful views of President @CyrilRamaphosa at the Gandhi-Mandela Memorial Freedom Lecture in New Delhi.
author: narendramodi

text:
Cooperation in areas such as agriculture, food processing, skill development, IT, gems and jewellery augurs well for the partnership between India and South Africa. 

President @CyrilRamaphosa and I also talked about steps to boost people-to-people ties.
author: narendramodi

text:
India and South Africa are shaped by the ideals of the great Mahatma Gandhi and the venerable Madiba. 

Guided by their thoughts, we are committed towards ensuring peace and prosperity for the people of our nations as well as deepening cooperation in various sectors.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is honoured to welcome President @CyrilRamaphosa. 

He is visiting us at a special time, when we are marking Bapu's 150th birth anniversary and have marked the birth centenary of beloved Madiba. 

This visit will have a positive impact on India-South Africa relations.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the India-South Africa Business Forum. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to the people of Himachal Pradesh on their Statehood Day. May this state, the land of natural beauty and bravery, attain even more prosperity in the years to come. I pray that the people of this state are blessed with joy and good health.
author: narendramodi

text: I urge people from all walks of life to create awareness on voter registration and especially request my young friends to register themselves as voters if they have not done so already. Every vote cast enhances our democratic fabric.
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings on #NationalVotersDay. This is a day to reaffirm our commitment towards further strengthening our democracy by unfailingly participating in democratic processes at the local, state and national levels. Your doing so will go a long way in building a New India.
author: narendramodi

text: With this launch, India also becomes the first country to use the fourth stage of a space rocket as an orbital platform for micro-gravity experiments. @isro
author: narendramodi

text:
Heartiest congratulations to our space scientists for yet another successful launch of PSLV. 

This launch has put in orbit Kalamsat, built by India's talented students.
author: narendramodi

text:
Under the leadership of Shri @myogiadityanath Ji and his team, Uttar Pradesh has been achieving remarkable success in several sectors. 

The Centre and UP Government will continue to do everything possible so that the youth of UP can fulfil their aspirations.
author: narendramodi

text:
On the special occasion of Uttar Pradesh Diwas I convey my greetings to the people of UP and pray for the continued progress of the state. 

This is a state whose contribution to India’s history is remarkable. People from UP have excelled in all spheres.
author: narendramodi

text: Had an excellent interaction with tableaux artistes, guests from tribal communities, NCC cadets and NSS volunteers at 7, Lok Kalyan Marg today.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is phenomenally proud of these young achievers, who have been distinguishing themselves in a wide range of areas. 

Wishing them the very best for their endeavours ahead. 

http://www.pmindia.gov.in/en/news_updates/pm-interacts-with-winners-of-rashtriya-bal-puraskar-2019/?comment=disable …
author: narendramodi

text:
Honouring a young genius! 

Raam M is a versatile music maestro. He is among the youngest Indians to have succeeded with distinction in final (8th) grade examination by Trinity College, London. He has also taken part in many Carnatic Music Concerts.
author: narendramodi

text: Dev Dushyantkumar Joshi has distinguished himself as an actor. His work in TV serials has been admired all over. Happy to have met this winner of the Bal Shakti Puraskar.
author: narendramodi

text: Vinayaka M belongs to Karnataka. He is a versatile artist and has given several stupendous performances. His musical talent has been appreciated nationally and globally.
author: narendramodi

text:
Meet Aryaman Agarwal.

He is a young magician, who presents interesting magic tricks. He has done shows not only for large audiences but also has done many workshops and demonstrations for the underprivileged.
author: narendramodi

text: Truptraj Atul Pandya is a master percussionist He is an established radio and TV artist as well, who has given more than several live performances. Proud that he has been conferred the Bal Shakti Puraskar.
author: narendramodi

text: Meeting and knowing brave Nikhil Jituri was a pleasure. He saved the life of a two-year-old who accidentally fell into a deep open well. Our young friend from Karnataka showed great courage and presence of mind. I congratulate Nikhil on winning the Bal Shakti Puraskar!
author: narendramodi

text: Kartik Kumar Goyal and Adrika Goyal from Madhya Pradesh showed courage and social consciousness in providing food, water, and first aid to panicked train passengers during an adverse situation. I congratulate my brave young friends on winning the Bal Shakti Puraskar!
author: narendramodi

text: Angel Vijay Deokule, from Maharashtra, is an inspiration for young girls. She is an Sqay martial artist and has brought laurels for India globally. Congratulations on winning the Bal Shakti Puraskar and all the best for the upcoming championships!
author: narendramodi

text: Anish, from Haryana, is great at aiming and achieving. He is an international Gold medalist young shooter who won at the Commonwealth Games in Gold Coast. I congratulate young Anish on winning the Bal Shakti Puraskar and wish him great success in the future!
author: narendramodi

text: It was a pleasure meeting young Priyam Tated. From Andhra Pradesh, he is a wonderful exponent of Roller or Figure Skating. He has made India proud by winning several awards on the world stage. Congratulations Priyam on winning the Bal Shakti Puraskar.
author: narendramodi

text:
My young friend Esow from Andaman and Nicobar islands has made us proud. He was awarded the Junior World No. 1 at the UCI Junior Track Cycling World Championship in Switzerland. 

Congratulations, Esow!
author: narendramodi

text:
Young Shivangi from Haryana is scaling the peaks of achievement, literally! 

She is the youngest girl from India to scale Mount Everest from the Nepal side. She has also climbed the highest peaks in Africa and Europe. 

I congratulate her on winning the Bal Shakti Puraskar.
author: narendramodi

text:
Nishant Dhankhar is an ace mathematician, who has won many accolades internationally. 

His project on Szemerédi's theorem has been internationally acknowledged and appreciated.
author: narendramodi

text: More power to Megha Bose’s scholastic zeal! She distinguished herself at several Olympiads and quizzes. It was wonderful to interact with her and discuss a wide range of issues. Happy that she has been conferred the Bal Shakti Puraskar.
author: narendramodi

text: Odisha's Ayushman Tripathy has won many accolades for his scholastic abilities at the National and International, level including at the International Junior Science Olympiad, 2016 held at Bali, Indonesia. He has represented India in Global Youth Leaders Conference, 2018 in USA.
author: narendramodi

text:
Ensuring a healthy India! 

Met Dr. Arunalla Sridhar Reddy from Andhra Pradesh, who has conducted free dental check-ups and treatment for thousands of children. He also runs 3 homes to take care of under-privileged children.
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulated the energetic Tashi Namgyal, who has been supporting the education of young children from poor economic backgrounds. He runs 5 schools in Himachal Pradesh through which many children have benefitted.
author: narendramodi

text: Youngsters like Eiha Dixit indicate that the Yuva Shakti of India will do outstanding things. She celebrated her 6th birthday by planting record 1008 saplings! She is extremely passionate about mitigating climate change. Proud that she has been conferred the Bal Shakti Puraskar.
author: narendramodi

text:
Through theatre, Prathyaksha B R has been spreading awareness about the importance of toilets in homes. 

She conducted plays in remote villages of Karnataka and inspired people to construct toilets in their home. 

Happy that she has got the Bal Shakti Puraskar.
author: narendramodi

text:
Meet Aryamaan Lakhotia from West Bengal. 

He founded ‘Toy Joy’ with the aim of collecting and distributing toys to the underprivileged children in Kolkata. 

The organisation has spread to seven cities and brightened the lives of thousands of children!
author: narendramodi

text:
Delhi’s Madhav Lavakare made an affordable wearable assistive device for the hearing impaired called ‘Transcribe.’ 
It aims to bridge the communication gap between hearing impaired persons and those with hearing ability but not knowing sign language.
Happy to have met him today.
author: narendramodi

text:
Innovative Yuva Shakti! 

A U Nachiketh Kumar prepared standard rubber sheets from a fruit named Bilimbi (Averrhoa bilimbi) as a sustainable and environment friendly substitute for rubber latex created from formic acid by farmers. 

Best wishes to him for his future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text:
Naisargik Lenka is 16 and at such a young age, he worked on innovative solutions for remediation of contaminated soil and water, a method of treating municipal waste water and a smart toilet model which has been named 'Swachh APT.’ 
A fitting recipient of the Bal Shakti Puraskar!
author: narendramodi

text:
Saluting the innovative zeal of young India.

The projects Aswath Suryanarayanan steered include ‘Magnetically operated Kinetic Car (MAGOKIN)’, and a mathematical model for managing space debris.

Congrats on being conferred the Bal Shakti Puraskar.
author: narendramodi

text:
Towering efforts, outstanding outcomes! 
Arunima Sen has done great work. She developed a model for energy efficient skyscrapers, solution to increase barley yield & a device determining micronutrient levels in a body using strands of hair. 
Glad she won the Bal Shakti Puraskar.
author: narendramodi

text:
My young friend Mohammed Suhail Chinya Salimpasha hails from Karnataka. 

He has been awarded the Bal Shakti Puraskar for his work in using technology to diagnose Pre-symptomatic Protein Energy Malnutrition non-invasively using paper. 

Congratulations to him!
author: narendramodi

text: Had a wonderful interaction with winners of Rashtriya Bal Puraskar 2019.
author: narendramodi

text: Having a great interaction with Karyakartas from Maharashtra. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
I am grateful to the Bose family for presenting me a cap worn by Netaji Bose himself. 

The cap has been immediately added to the display gallery at Kranti Mandir in the Red Fort complex. 

I hope more youngsters come to Kranti Mandir and get inspired by the life of Netaji Bose.
author: narendramodi

text: To see Gurudev Tagore’s works at Drishyakala is a treat for art lovers. We all know Gurudev Tagore as a prolific writer but he also had a strong link with the world of art. He produced lots of works, featuring multiple themes. Gurudev’s works were also exhibited internationally.
author: narendramodi

text: Works of eminent Indian artists like Raja Ravi Varma, Gurudev Tagore, Amrita Sher-Gil, Abanindranath Tagore, Nandlal Bose, Gaganendranath Tagore, Sailoz Mookherjea amd Jamini Roy are on display at the exhibition.
author: narendramodi

text:
I would specially urge art lovers to visit Drishyakala, which will take you through the finest aspects of Indian art and culture. 

There are 4 historical exhibitions, spanning three centuries, with over 450 works of art!
author: narendramodi

text: Museums on Netaji Bose and Azad Hind Fauj are a key part of Kranti Mandir. History echoes from these walls. In this very building, brave sons of India, Colonel Prem Sahgal, Colonel Gurbaksh Singh Dhillon and Major General Shah Nawaz Khan were put on trial by the colonial rulers.
author: narendramodi

text: This complex includes Museums on Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose and the Indian National Army, Yaad-e-Jallian Museum (on Jallianwala Bagh and World War 1), Museum on 1857- India’s First War of Independence and Drishyakala- Museum on Indian Art.
author: narendramodi

text:
It was extremely humbling to inaugurate four museums relating to India's rich history and culture. 

This entire complex of museums will be known as Kranti Mandir as a tribute to the revolutionary zeal and courage of our great freedom fighters.
author: narendramodi

text: These museums being inaugurated today will deepen the connect between our glorious history and our youth as well as add to the patriotic fervour among citizens.
author: narendramodi

text: I will also inaugurate the Yaad-e-Jallian Museum (on Jallianwala Bagh and World War 1), Museum on 1857- India’s First War of Independence and Drishyakala- Museum on Indian Art at the Red Fort.
author: narendramodi

text: In a short while from now, I will be inaugurating Museums on Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose and the Indian National Army at the iconic Red Fort in Delhi.
author: narendramodi

text: Remembering the courageous Balasaheb Thackeray on his Jayanti. Respected Balasaheb was unwavering in his commitment towards protecting the rights and wellbeing of people. He was bold and was blessed with a sharp intellect and wit. His oratory skills mesmerised lakhs of people.
author: narendramodi

text:
I bow to Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose on his Jayanti. 

He was a stalwart who committed himself towards ensuring India is free and leads a life of dignity. We are committed to fulfilling his ideals and creating a strong India.
author: narendramodi

text:
My first brush with a big city, organisational duties in the RSS and a yearly 5-day journey to a remote forest during Diwali…

Part 3 of the interaction with @HumansOfBombay takes you through experiences from my youth & a request for today’s youngsters. 

https://www.instagram.com/p/Bs79RG8hPNc/
author: narendramodi

text:
Celebrate, do not fear exams.

I am glad that people not only from India but also from overseas are going to be a part of the  Pariksha Pe Charcha 2.0 programme. 

Keep sharing your exam experiences on MyGov so that others read and get inspired.
author: narendramodi

text: Inaugurated Centers of Excellence at Deen Dayal Hastkala Sankul. These centres will give a boost to those associated with the textiles and handicrafts sector and contribute to India’s prosperity.
author: narendramodi

text: Made an announcement at the #PBD2019. Know what it is...
author: narendramodi

text:
At the peak of his party’s power, a former PM said that for every Rupee, only 15 paisa reaches the poor. Which was the hand that was siphoning off all funds?

NDA Government’s paradigm shift in Governance has ensured the fruits of development reach the intended beneficiaries.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is at the forefront of global leadership in various sectors. 

Our country is undertaking numerous initiatives to ensure a better tomorrow for the coming generations.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the Pravasi Bharatiya Divas programme in Varanasi. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Looking forward to being in beloved Kashi today for the Pravasi Bharatiya Divas. This is an excellent forum to engage with the Indian diaspora, which is distinguishing itself all over the world. #PBD2019 @PBDConvention
author: narendramodi

text:
I have had the privilege to visit the Sree Siddaganga Mutt and receive the blessings of His Holiness Dr. Sree Sree Sree Sivakumara Swamigalu. 

The wide range of community service initiatives being done there are outstanding and are at an unimaginably large scale.
author: narendramodi

text:
HH Dr. Sree Sree Sree Sivakumara Swamigalu remained at the forefront of ensuring better healthcare and education facilities for the marginalised. 

He represents the best of our traditions of compassionate service, spirituality and protecting the rights of the underprivileged.
author: narendramodi

text:
His Holiness Dr. Sree Sree Sree Sivakumara Swamigalu lived for the people, especially the poor and vulnerable.  He devoted himself towards alleviating ills like poverty, hunger and social injustice. 

Prayers and solidarity with his countless devotees spread all across the world.
author: narendramodi

text: Statehood Day greetings to the people of Tripura. In less than a year, the state has made remarkable progress. It is realising it’s true potential and people’s aspirations are being fulfilled at a record pace. May this spirit grow further in the coming years.
author: narendramodi

text:
Manipur is blessed with immense natural beauty and hardworking citizens. I can never forget the affection I have got in the state. 

On their Statehood Day, I greet my sisters and brothers of Manipur. 

May the state continue scaling new heights of development.
author: narendramodi

text:
On the special occasion of their Statehood Day, greetings to the people of Meghalaya. 

People from Meghalaya have made a notable contribution to our country. I pray for the state’s continuous progress.
author: narendramodi

text:
Not losers but Rockstars! 

No selfie Jab We Met but there will always be another occasion. :)
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to know! My best wishes.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you Divya Ji.
author: narendramodi

text: The entire nation admires Jeetendra Ji for his acting. And, as I said yesterday, he is full of energy!
author: narendramodi

text:
As far as the issue of mining in Goa is concerned, the Centre, State Government and BJP MPs from the state are looking at all possible ways to solve the matter.

BJP will always safeguard the rights and wellbeing of the poor.
author: narendramodi

text:
The NDA government in unwavering in our commitment to social justice. 

Those who ruled the nation for years had no vision or roadmap to ensure empowerment for all.
author: narendramodi

text:
NDA governments at the Centre and Maharashtra have undertaken record number of initiatives for the farmers. 

On the contrary, Congress and NCP’s notable contribution was irrigation scam and total apathy towards farmers.
author: narendramodi

text:
उनके पास धन शक्ति है, हमारे पास जन शक्ति है।

उनको अपना परिवार बचाना है, हमें देश बनाना है।
author: narendramodi

text:
This question by a @BJP4Maharashtra Karyakarta reminded me of the days when I worked in the party organisation. 

I also spoke about why BJP is different from other parties.
author: narendramodi

text: Interacting with BJP Karyakartas from Maharashtra and Goa. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Asha Ji, thank you for gracing the programme with your presence. The entire nation looks up to you for your stupendous contribution to the film world. @ashabhosle
author: narendramodi

text: Yes, I agree with you. @itsBhushanKumar
author: narendramodi

text: Looking happy as always, Manoj Bhai!
author: narendramodi

text:
In addition to preservation, I hope this museum emerges as a centre of inspiration, where people get to see the more minute aspects of acting, production, film making and more. 

It will further endear the film world to the people.
author: narendramodi

text: I enjoyed interacting with you and other members of the film fraternity. This community has been at the forefront of showcasing India's culture internationally. @kunalkohli
author: narendramodi

text:
When @KapilSharmaK9 appreciates somebody's humour, it sure makes that person happy and I am no exception. :)

Thank you for the kind words Kapil.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to have met you, @arrahman.
author: narendramodi

text:
We have several talented youngsters and we also have so many talented film personalities who can mentor these youth. 

Channelising this talent through such universities can be extremely beneficial.
author: narendramodi

text:
The wonderful city of Mumbai is now home to the excellent National Museum of Indian Cinema. 

Here are some pictures.
author: narendramodi

text:
They got together in Kolkata with no agenda but to stop BJP.

They talk of democracy in a state where the ruling party does not even allow local elections democratically. 

130 crore Indians are watching their games with great amusement. 

India will give them a befitting reply!
author: narendramodi

text:
Their day begins with Modi, ends with Modi.

All they want to do is further their own dynasties. 

They have zero vision for India. 

Our approach is different. 

For us, India is everything, 130 crore Indians are everything.
author: narendramodi

text:
Entire Opposition hates me because my ‘crimes’ are:

Waging the toughest war against corruption.

Stopping the reign of middlemen from the corridors of power.

Giving the poor what belongs to them in the first place but was denied for years.
author: narendramodi

text: The progress made by the Union Territories of Dadra and Nagar Haveli, as well as Daman and Diu in the last four years will make you very happy!
author: narendramodi

text: Celebrating cinema. Inaugurating National Museum of Indian Cinema in Mumbai.
author: narendramodi

text: Our only aim is development. We want to work for 130 crore Indians. Speaking in Silvassa. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had the privilege of inaugurating the Larsen and Toubro Armoured Systems Complex in Hazira, Gujarat. 

Boosting ‘Make in India’ in the defence sector is our endeavour. I am glad that the private sector too is supporting this pursuit and making a valuable contribution.
author: narendramodi

text:
I congratulate the entire team of Larsen & Toubro for building the state-of-the-art K-9 Vajra Self Propelled Howitzer. 

This is a significant contribution towards India’s defence sector and protecting the country.
author: narendramodi

text: Checking out the tanks at L&T’s Armoured Systems Complex in Hazira.
author: narendramodi

text:
The first #MannKiBaat of 2019 will take place on the 27th of this month. Share your ideas and suggestions for it. 

Dial 1800-11-7800 and record your message. You can also share inputs on the MyGov Open Forum or the NaMo App.
author: narendramodi

text:
Tomorrow evening, I will be in Mumbai to inaugurate the National Museum of Indian Cinema. 

This museum will showcase the rich history of Indian cinema and highlight the contribution of cinema in our country's progress.
author: narendramodi

text:
The laser show at Dandi Kutir is wonderful! 

Technology has merged with history and the show takes the viewers through the life of the great Bapu. 

Happy to have inaugurated the show today.
author: narendramodi

text:
The m-Arogya App will be launched tomorrow along with door to door waste collection, segregation and processing of solid waste facilities in Dadra and Nagar Haveli.

I would also be addressing a public meeting at Silvassa.
author: narendramodi

text:
An IT policy for Dadra and Nagar Haveli will be released tomorrow. I congratulate the local administration for emphasising on the power of technology. 

Through technology, effective service delivery is possible and transparency is furthered.
author: narendramodi

text: Several development projects for Daman and Diu, and Dadra and Nagar Haveli will be launched tomorrow. PM Jan Arogya Yojana certificates and Forest Rights certificates will be distributed to beneficiaries as well. Glad that the Centre's schemes are touching the lives of the poor.
author: narendramodi

text: I am happy to be visiting the Union Territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli tomorrow. The foundation stone for a medical college in Sayli will be laid. This institution is going to open many opportunities in the healthcare sector. Youngsters from nearby areas will benefit greatly.
author: narendramodi

text: I shall be visiting Hazira tomorrow. I would be dedicating L&T’s Armoured Systems Complex to the nation and also be laying the foundation stone for the Nirali Cancer hospital at Navsari.
author: narendramodi

text: Mr. Andrej Babiš, the Prime Minister of the Czech Republic and I held wide-ranging talks in Gandhinagar. His presence at the Vibrant Gujarat Summit is a great gesture. We discussed bilateral cooperation in defence, transportation and manufacturing.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had an excellent meeting with PM @larsloekke of Denmark.

Denmark is a valued friend and we discussed deepening cooperation in energy, trade, agriculture and other areas.
author: narendramodi

text:
The champion of chess! 

Young D Gukesh has made the country proud by his accomplishment. His diligence and perseverance are noteworthy!  

Congratulations to him and best wishes for his future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text:
Here is a unique contest that strengthens the Swachh Bharat Mission! 

In two weeks ten lakh rural toilets have already been painted.

Share your Swachh Sundar Shauchalaya using #MyIzzatGhar.
author: narendramodi

text: The Government of India is making every effort to ensure the fruits of development reach every citizen with ease and efficiency.
author: narendramodi

text:
New infrastructure for New India.

Transformative measures that are leading to transformative outcomes.
author: narendramodi

text: Doing business in India is easier, cheaper, faster and smarter.
author: narendramodi

text:
Those who have been visiting India in the last four years have seen first hand the series of transformations taking place. 

We are reducing government and enhancing governance.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Vibrant Gujarat Summit has:

Dignity of the presence of top political leaders.

Energy of CEOs and corporate leaders.

Gravitas of institutions and opinion makers.

Vitality of young enterprises and start-ups.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is honoured to host the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan, Mr. Shavkat Mirziyoyev. 

We had fruitful talks on the sidelines of the Vibrant Gujarat Summit in Gandhinagar. We discussed various aspects relating to India-Uzbekistan ties. @president_uz
author: narendramodi

text: Great meeting with PM @JosephMuscat_JM of Malta. Our talks will add tremendous strength to bilateral ties between our nations and benefit the people of our countries.
author: narendramodi

text: Vibrant Gujarat has emerged as a global forum. Addressing the Summit now. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
His Holiness Dr. Sree Sree Sree Sivakumara Swamigalu is a remarkable personality and has positively impacted crores of lives through his outstanding service. 

The entire nation is praying for his speedy recovery and good health.
author: narendramodi

text: ಪರಮಪೂಜ್ಯ ಡಾಕ್ಟರ್ ಶ್ರೀ ಶ್ರೀ ಶ್ರೀ ಶಿವಕುಮಾರ ಸ್ವಾಮಿಗಳವರದು ಅಮೋಘ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿತ್ವ . ಅವರ ಮಹೋನ್ನತ ಸೇವೆ ಕೋಟ್ಯಾಂತರ ಜನರ  ಜೀವನದ ಮೇಲೆ ಸಕಾರಾತ್ಮಕ ಪ್ರಭಾವ ಬೀರಿದೆ. ಶ್ರೀಗಳು ಬೇಗ ಗುಣ ಮುಖರಾಗಲಿ ಎಂದು ಹಾಗೂ ದೇವರು ಅವರಿಗೆ ಉತ್ತಮ ಆರೋಗ್ಯ ಕರುಣಿಸಲೆಂದು ಇಡೀ ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರ ಪ್ರಾರ್ಥಿಸುತ್ತಿದೆ.
author: narendramodi

text:
At the Ahmedabad Shopping Festival I too could not resist from shopping! Purchased some Khadi products using the RuPay card.

I urge you all- keep buying Khadi and contribute to the empowerment of lakhs of weavers associated with the industry. It is also a great tribute to Bapu!
author: narendramodi

text: At the inauguration of the Ahmedabad Shopping Festival, I talked at length about the numerous steps taken by the Central Government for the MSME sector. Our small entrepreneurs are exceptionally talented and we are committed to ensuring the right platform for them to prosper.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today is a big day for Ahmedabad! 

The city is hosting a first of its kind shopping festival. 

This festival is a great opportunity for entrepreneurs and consumers. It has a wide range of products, a good mix of the traditional and the modern.
author: narendramodi

text:
For a long time, access to proper healthcare was considered out of reach for the poor. Ayushman Bharat changed that. 

Ours is a Government that cares for the downtrodden and we want to ensure that they lead healthy lives.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Institute of Medical Sciences and Research is an excellent public hospital, which will strengthen the efforts to provide quality healthcare to the poor.

Am glad to have inaugurated the hospital and seen parts of it.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dr. Vikram Sarabhai was an outstanding scientist, whose contribution to the nation has been extremely rich.

Today in Ahmedabad, a statue of Dr. Sarabhai was inaugurated in the presence of his family.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thank you Mr. Bill Gates for your appreciation. 

Ayushman Bharat stems out of our commitment to provide top quality and affordable healthcare to the poor. 

The first 100 days have been remarkable! Large number of people benefited and lot more will in the coming days. @BillGates
author: narendramodi

text: The Ahmedabad Shopping Festival is amazing! Come visit.
author: narendramodi

text: Inaugurating the Sardar Patel hospital in Ahmedabad. Watch my speech.
author: narendramodi

text:
I commend the energetic @BJYM team for their #VijayLaksh2019 movement that will mobilise Yuva Shakti from all over India on a large scale for a strong mandate for the BJP. 
Our Party is fully committed to fulfilling the dreams and aspirations of our talented youngsters. #NaMoYuva
author: narendramodi

text:
Individuals like Mr. Yohei Sasakawa motivate millions of people. He is at the forefront of many philanthropic initiatives. 

His compassionate nature can be seen in the manner in which he’s worked to eliminate leprosy. 

Congratulations to him for the Gandhi Peace Prize, 2018.
author: narendramodi

text:
Education is a strong means to empowerment and Ekal Abhiyan Trust is working in remote areas, so that children from tribal families get the opportunity to study. 

Their role in furthering women empowerment is laudatory. 

Congratulations to them for the Gandhi Peace Prize, 2017.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Sulabh International family has added immense strength to the Swachh Bharat movement. 

This is a team that is working constantly at the grassroots level to realise Bapu’s dream of a clean India. 

I congratulate Sulabh International for the Gandhi Peace Prize, 2016.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Akshaya Patra Foundation’s determined efforts ensure nutritious meals for many. 

Their outstanding work has also ensured more children go to school. 

I congratulate them for the Gandhi Peace Prize, 2016. @AkshayaPatra
author: narendramodi

text:
The Vivekananda Kendra is doing commendable work towards the development of our villages. 

Their initiatives to improve education and community service have touched several lives, particularly youngsters. 

I congratulate @vkendra for the Gandhi Peace Prize, 2015.
author: narendramodi

text: The Ahmedabad Shopping Festival will also be inaugurated tomorrow. The Festival offers an exceptional opportunity for local entrepreneurs to showcase their products.
author: narendramodi

text:
Tomorrow in Ahmedabad, I will inaugurate the Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Institute of Medical Sciences and Research. 

This is state-of-the-art public hospital will provide top quality healthcare to the people of Gujarat.
author: narendramodi

text:
Over the next two days, I would be attending various programmes in Gujarat, including the Vibrant Gujarat Summit 2019. 

Since its inception in 2003, the Summit has played a key role in bringing more investment to Gujarat and enhancing the state’s progress.
author: narendramodi

text: Adorable picture! Such support is my biggest source of strength.
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy to know. There is always so much to learn from Karyakartas and volunteers. 

Their strong support is cherished by our Party.
author: narendramodi

text: It is a wonderful family! :)
author: narendramodi

text:
These interactions via the NM Mobile App are healthy and extensive discussions between the family of BJP Karyakartas. There is no formality. 

BJP is proud of each and every Karyakarta, who makes the party strong.
author: narendramodi

text:
India's progress is not complete till the eastern part of our nation grows. 

It is a privilege to work for the people of the region. 

Tremendous work is underway in all sectors that will further 'Ease of Living.'
author: narendramodi

text: Prayed for the development of India and the peace and happiness of 130 crore Indians at the Sree Padmanabhaswamy Temple.
author: narendramodi

text:
To the UDF and LDF I say: 

Do not under estimate the BJP Karyakarta.

Your taunts & your violence cannot break the morale of the BJP Karyakarta.

You should see what happened in Tripura.

What happened in Tripura, will happen in Kerala!
author: narendramodi

text: The UDF and the LDF are two sides of the same old coin.
author: narendramodi

text:
If there is one party that has been at the forefront of standing with Kerala and its culture, it is the BJP.

For us, the people of Kerala and their aspirations are not a matter of convenience but of conviction.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, India is growing rapidly. This is powered by the hard-work & talent of the people of our nation.

From economy to ease of doing business & from start-ups to satellites, we are achieving great progress in each sector.
author: narendramodi

text:
The tribal communities of Odisha are the pride of the state. We can learn lots from their culture and traditions. 

The NDA Government has taken numerous steps to improve education and sporting facilities, which will directly benefit tribal communities.
author: narendramodi

text:
We are happy that due to the efforts of the Centre, rail and air connectivity has improved across Odisha. 

With better connectivity, comes more opportunity and faster development.
author: narendramodi

text:
Making every effort for Odisha’s progress.

Inaugurated/laid the foundations for projects worth over Rs. 1500 crore. These projects will have a transformative impact on Odisha’s progress.

They will also draw more tourists, who can see the exceptional Odia culture.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you Kollam for the warm welcome and support. Addressing a rally. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a programme to mark the inauguration of Kollam bypass.
author: narendramodi

text: Pariksha Pe Charcha 2.0 will be an interesting conversation with students, parents and teachers on exams, life and more. Participate in this unique contest and get a chance to be there at the event in Delhi!
author: narendramodi

text:
Best wishes to all those taking part in #GAvS2019!

May the Summit witness extensive and insightful discussions relating to the aviation sector.

Our Government is actively working on enhancing aviation infrastructure, improving connectivity and making flying more affordable.
author: narendramodi

text: Euphoric atmosphere at the rally in Balangir. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Furthering ‘Ease of Living’ for Odisha’s citizens. Inaugurating development works in Balangir.
author: narendramodi

text:
प्रयागराज में आरंभ हो रहे पवित्र कुम्भ मेले की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं। 

मुझे आशा है कि इस अवसर पर देश-विदेश के श्रद्धालुओं को भारत की आध्यात्मिक, सांस्कृतिक एवं सामाजिक विविधताओं के दर्शन होंगे। 

मेरी कामना है कि अधिक से अधिक लोग इस दिव्य और भव्य आयोजन का हिस्सा बनें।
author: narendramodi

text: सेना दिवस के अवसर पर हमारे जवानों, पूर्व सैनिकों और उनके परिवारों को बहुत-बहुत शुभकामनाएं। हम सभी देशवासियों को अपने सैनिकों के दृढ़ संकल्प एवं समर्पण पर गर्व है। मैं उनके अदम्य साहस एवं वीरता को प्रणाम करता हूं।
author: narendramodi

text: In Thiruvananthapuram I would visit the  Sree Padmanabhaswamy Temple. A series of welfare measures for pilgrims would be inaugurated as well.
author: narendramodi

text:
I look forward to visiting Kerala tomorrow. I would be in Kollam and Thiruvananthapuram for various programmes.

The Kollam bypass on NH-66 would be inaugurated. This project improve the traffic situation and enhance connectivity.
author: narendramodi

text:
More development works that will be inaugurated are:

Bridge no. 588 between Therubali-Singapur road station.

Passport Sewa Kendras at Jagatsinghpur, Kendrapara, Puri, Kandhamal, Bargarh and Balangir.

Renovation and restoration works at Asurgarh Fort in Kalahandi.
author: narendramodi

text:
Projects that would be inaugurated include:

28.3 acre Multi Modal Logistics (MMLP) Jharsuguda.

Balangir-Bicchupalli new rail line. 

Electrification of 813 km of Jharsuguda-Vizinagaram and Sambalpur-Angul lines.

Doubling of Barpali-Dungaripali and Balangir-Deogaon road line.
author: narendramodi

text:
There is something special about Odisha, that draws me to the state so often! 

Tomorrow I will be in Balangir to inaugurate and lay the foundation stones for several development works, which will have a transformative impact on Odisha’s progress.
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy #Uttarayan. 

May you all scale new heights of progress in the times to come.
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings on the special occasion of Magh Bihu.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes on Pongal!
author: narendramodi

text: #HappyMakarSankranti to everyone!
author: narendramodi

text: I have often been a part of the anniversary celebrations of Thuglak but unfortunately, this time I have not been able to. However, I request the readers to send me their questions, which I would be glad to answer in the next issue. @sgurumurthy
author: narendramodi

text:
Greetings to the readers of Thuglak as the magazine marks its 49th anniversary. 

I also pay my tributes to the fearless and phenomenal Cho Ramaswamy, who nurtured Thuglak and took it to new heights.
author: narendramodi

text: I want your direct feedback on various issues…take part in the survey on the ‘Narendra Modi Mobile App.'
author: narendramodi

text: Have a great Lohri!
author: narendramodi

text:
The BJP is the party that can cater to the aspirations of the first time voter. 

Such a voter wants development and not dynasty. 

Such a voter wants performance and not promises. 

Hence, we seek their blessings.
author: narendramodi

text:
Tamil Nadu has a strong MSME sector and we are proud of the spirit of enterprise the state is blessed with. 

A BJP Karyakarta asked me about the NDA government’s efforts for the sector. 

Here’s what I said.
author: narendramodi

text: Made a request to BJP Karyakartas from all over India. Know what it is.
author: narendramodi

text: A fruitful interaction with Tamil Nadu BJP Karyakartas. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Releasing a commemorative coin in honour of Sri Guru Gobind Singh Ji.
author: narendramodi

text:
I bow to Sri Guru Gobind Singh Ji on his Jayanti.

ਮੈਂ ਸਾਹਿਬ-ਏ-ਕਮਾਲ ਸਰਬੰਸ ਦਾਨੀ ਸਾਹਿਬ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਗੁਰੂ ਗੋਬਿੰਦ ਸਿੰਘ ਮਹਾਰਾਜ ਜੀ ਦੇ ਪ੍ਰਕਾਸ਼ ਪੁਰਬ ਦੀ ਸਮੂਹ ਸੰਗਤਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਵਧਾਈ ਦਿੰਦਾ ਹਾਂ ਤੇ ਗੁਰੂ ਸਾਹਿਬ ਅੱਗੇ ਸੀਸ ਝੁਕਾਉਂਦਾ ਹਾਂ।
author: narendramodi

text: यह लड़ाई सल्तनत और संविधान में आस्था रखने वाले लोगों के बीच है। एक तरफ वे लोग हैं जिन्हें हर हाल में केवल अपनी सल्तनत बचाए रखनी है और दूसरी तरफ हम लोग हैं, जो बाबासाहेब अंबेडकर के संविधान को मानते हैं, उसके अनुसार चलते है।
author: narendramodi

text: देश मजबूत सरकार चाहता है, वो मजबूर सरकार चाहते हैं…
author: narendramodi

text:
We have come a long way.

Back in the day, aeroplanes would wait to escort middlemen who were close to one party and one family.

Now, middlemen are being forced to return to India.

What they looted will have to be returned and those for whom they looted will be punished.
author: narendramodi

text:
There is a Common Process, and there is a Congress Process.

The Congress Process encouraged favouritism, corruption, nepotism and compromised India’s welfare.

After coming to power, we transformed the processes and the results are for everyone to see.
author: narendramodi

text: हमें काम से मतलब है, विपक्ष को नाम से मतलब है। फर्क साफ है।
author: narendramodi

text:
भाजपा किसानों के साथ कंधे से कंधा मिलाकर खड़ी है। 

अपने अन्नदाता को हम नए भारत की नई ऊर्जा का वाहक बनाना चाहते हैं।
author: narendramodi

text:
We want India’s youth to express and excel. 

The Government is creating an environment that gives our Yuva Shakti the platform to showcase their skills as well as talents.
author: narendramodi

text:
भारतीय जनता पार्टी का एक ही मकसद है विकास। 

विकास के हमारे मंत्र का मूल है, सबका साथ, सबका विकास और एक भारत, श्रेष्ठ भारत।
author: narendramodi

text: बीते चार-साढ़े चार वर्षों में जिस तरह भाजपा ने केंद्र और राज्यों में सरकारें चलाई हैं, उसने जनमानस में यह स्थापित कर दिया है कि देश को अगर नई ऊँचाई पर कोई राजनीतिक दल ले जा सकता है, तो वो भारतीय जनता पार्टी ही है।
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the @BJP4India meeting in Delhi. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
The thoughts and ideals of #SwamiVivekananda inspire and energise crores of Indians, particularly our youth. 

It is from him that we draw the motivation of building an India that is strong, vibrant, inclusive and an India that takes global leadership in several areas.
author: narendramodi

text:
“Arise, awake and stop not till the goal is reached.”

Remembering these powerful words, and the rich thoughts of the venerable #SwamiVivekananda on his Jayanti.

He emphasised on the ideals of service and renunciation. 

His belief in Yuva Shakti was unwavering.
author: narendramodi

text: Attended the @BJP4India National Convention in Delhi today.
author: narendramodi

text:
A TN BJP Karyakarta asked me about the record corruption in the Congress years, which was implicitly admitted by a former PM of their party and the honest, pro-people governance under NDA.

This is what I said to him.
author: narendramodi

text:
UPA did not bother about our defence sector. 

They were always looking for deals, and so, naturally the nation suffered.
author: narendramodi

text:
I consider it my privilege that I got the opportunity to work for my sisters and brothers of Tamil Nadu.

Here are some of the efforts undertaken by the Central Government.
author: narendramodi

text:
Collect, verify and correct.

Know what I said about how more technology has made access to information easier but also places a great responsibility on us.
author: narendramodi

text:
A BJP Karyakarta asked me about possible alliances in Tamil Nadu.

Here is what I said.
author: narendramodi

text:
Commendable decisions taken by the GST council, which will greatly help MSMEs, traders and the services sector.

We remain committed to a simple and people-friendly GST.
author: narendramodi

text: Talking to BJP Karyakartas from Tamil Nadu. Watch the interaction.
author: narendramodi

text:
It is in the Himalayas that I learnt about oneness with nature. The mighty mountains also taught me the importance of humility.

Here is the second part of my chat with @HumansOfBombay, where I talk about an interesting phase of my life.

https://www.facebook.com/188056068070045/posts/1023812607827716/ …
author: narendramodi

text: By passing The Constitution (One Hundred And Twenty-Fourth Amendment) Bill, 2019, we pay tributes to the makers of our Constitution and the great freedom fighters, who envisioned an India that is strong and inclusive.
author: narendramodi

text:
Passage of The Constitution (One Hundred And Twenty-Fourth Amendment) Bill, 2019 in both Houses of Parliament is a victory for social justice.

It ensures a wider canvas for our Yuva Shakti to showcase their prowess and contribute towards India’s transformation.
author: narendramodi

text:
Delighted the Rajya Sabha has passed The Constitution (One Hundred And Twenty-Fourth Amendment) Bill, 2019. 

Glad to see such widespread support for the Bill. 

The House also witnessed a vibrant debate, where several members expressed their insightful opinions.
author: narendramodi

text:
These pictures from Agra indicate the affection towards BJP.

The working of the Central Government and UP Government have endeared our Party to the people. 

Opportunist alliances will never be accepted by people.
author: narendramodi

text:
भ्रष्टाचार के खिलाफ साढ़े चार साल पहले आपने मुझे जो जनादेश दिया था, उस पर मैं पूरी क्षमता से खरा उतरने का प्रयास कर रहा हूं। 

इस कारण कैसे इस चौकीदार के खिलाफ कुछ लोग इकट्ठा होना शुरू हो गए हैं।
author: narendramodi

text:
वर्षों से आगरा के लोगों की एक मांग थी, जिसे हमारी सरकार को पूरा करने का सौभाग्य मिला है। 

जानिए, मैं किस मांग की बात कर रहा हूं।
author: narendramodi

text:
We are not only cleaning our villages and cities but also the corridors of power from the dirt of corruption and middlemen. No wonder, those who think it’s their divine right to rule dislike me vehemently. 

I will continue to clean the system and ensure transparency.
author: narendramodi

text:
Those who remained in power for several decades never accorded priority to ensuring housing for all. 

On the contrary, their lack of concern forced people to be homeless. 

The last 4 years witnessed record construction of houses, guided by a people-centric approach.
author: narendramodi

text: Sharing some pictures from the massive gathering in Solapur.
author: narendramodi

text:
More sports, better health and a fitter nation! 

#5MinuteAur is a great effort that will further fitness levels across India. 

It’s also wonderful to see noted athletes talk about their own experiences vis-à-vis spending more time on the field. @kheloindia
author: narendramodi

text:
My best wishes to all young friends taking part in the Khelo India Youth Games, which are beginning in Pune today. 

May this tournament showcase the best sporting talent and give our youth a platform to fulfil their sporting dreams. @kheloindia
author: narendramodi

text: Furthering ‘Ease of Living’ for people of Agra through development works.   Watch my speech.
author: narendramodi

text: Hello Solapur!   Glad to be in this wonderful city. Addressing a public meeting. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
We are resolutely committed to the principle of ‘Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas.’ 

It is our endeavour to ensure that every poor person, irrespective of caste or creed gets to lead a life of dignity, and gets access to all possible opportunities.
author: narendramodi

text:
