I thank MPs from all the parties who supported The Constitution (One Hundred And Twenty-Fourth Amendment) Bill, 2019 in the Lok Sabha. 

I also appreciate those MP colleagues who enriched today’s debate with their views.
author: narendramodi

text:
The passage of The Constitution (One Hundred And Twenty-Fourth Amendment) Bill, 2019 in the Lok Sabha is a landmark moment in our nation’s history. 

It sets into motion the process to achieve an effective measure that ensures justice for all sections of society.
author: narendramodi

text:
Attended the Inaugural Session of #Raisina2019, addressed by PM @erna_solberg. 

She shared insightful views on several subjects. @raisinadialogue
author: narendramodi

text:
In Agra, the foundation stones for the following projects will be laid:

Integrated Command and Control Centre for Agra Smart City. 

Upgradation of SN Medical College, Agra. 

Various other development projects.
author: narendramodi

text: Tomorrow, I look forward to being among the people of Agra. The Gangajal Project pertaining to water supply will be inaugurated. It will improve the water supply, benefiting Agra residents and tourists. Projects relating to health, sanitation, education will also be inaugurated.
author: narendramodi

text: My discussions with PM @erna_solberg revolved around fulfilling Sustainable Development Goals, boost economic times, aspects of the ocean economy and deepening cultural ties. India and Norway look forward to cooperating on a wide range of issues, for the benefit of our citizens.
author: narendramodi

text:
During my recent visit to Mumbai, I sat down with the team of @HumansOfBombay and interacted with them about aspects of my life. 

Here is the first of the five part series. 

https://www.facebook.com/humansofbombay/photos/a.188058468069805/1021312724744371/?type=3&theater …
author: narendramodi

text: The development projects will improve connectivity in Solapur and surrounding areas. The housing project will particularly help Beedi and textile workers. Sanitation and sewerage facilities will also improve. We are committed to furthering ‘Ease of Living’ for our citizens.
author: narendramodi

text:
The foundation stones of the following works will also be laid in Solapur:

Underground Sewerage System under AMRUT Mission.
Improvement in Water Supply and Sewerage System.
Augmentation of Drinking Water Supply from Ujani Dam to Solapur City.
These will greatly benefit citizens.
author: narendramodi

text:
I look forward to visiting Solapur tomorrow in connection with following development works:
Dedication of four-laning of Solapur-Osmanabad section of NH-211. 
Foundation Stone of 30,000 houses under PMAY. 
 Launch of underground Sewerage System, and three Sewage Treatment Plants.
author: narendramodi

text: Looking good, @ianuragthakur!
author: narendramodi

text: Dear Hrithik, praying for the good health of Shri Rakesh Roshan Ji. He is a fighter and I am sure he will face this challenge with utmost courage. @RakeshRoshan_N
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the press with PM @erna_solberg. We had fruitful talks on strengthening India-Norway ties.
author: narendramodi

text:
A historic cricketing accomplishment in Australia! 

Congratulations to the Indian Cricket Team for the hard-fought and richly deserved series victory. 

The series witnessed some memorable performances and solid teamwork. 

Best wishes for the various games ahead.
author: narendramodi

text:
Never underestimate a BJP Karyakarta. 

Our party is guided by the motive of serving Bharat Mata. 

We are not here for power. We aren’t here to perpetuate family rule or build a fortune. 

Our Karyakartas are our family. They are our fortune.
author: narendramodi

text:
BJP Karyakartas across AP were asking me about the interface between political parties and the media. 

Here’s what I said. I urge friends in the media hear it as well. 

I also recalled a memory from 2001 when I was working in the Party organisation.
author: narendramodi

text:
People across AP are realising the lies of TDP and the state government. 

The CM has betrayed the great NTR twice. 

Telugu pride is about working for the people diligently, not focusing on son-rise and corruption.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to Himachal Pradesh CM Shri Jairam Thakur. He has been working hard to develop Himachal Pradesh and empower the poor. I pray for his long and healthy life. @jairamthakurbjp
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the hardworking Andhra Pradesh BJP Karyakartas. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thank you Baripada for the great welcome. 

Here are pictures from the rally.
author: narendramodi

text: Ayushman Bharat has revolutionised our health sector and is being widely praised all over. It has enabled a healthier life for the poor and downtrodden. I once again appeal to the Odisha Government to be a part of this scheme. They should forget politics and think of the poor.
author: narendramodi

text: Quickening Odisha’s growth.
author: narendramodi

text: Talked at length about Mission Indradhanush and how it manifests a new approach towards women and child welfare.
author: narendramodi

text:
The great Odia culture always gives topmost importance to women empowerment. 

However, the current Government in Odisha has not worked hard for the welfare of the state’s Nari Shakti.
author: narendramodi

text: From Baripada in Odisha, here is how we paid tributes to the phenomenal men and women who fought valiantly for India’s freedom.
author: narendramodi

text:
हमारे लिए किसान अन्नदाता हैं, उनके लिए वोटबैंक।

जब किसानों को कोई सिर्फ वोटबैंक समझता है तब वो आधी-अधूरी कर्जमाफी से आगे नहीं सोच पाता।

हम यह सुनिश्चित करना चाहते हैं कि किसानों के ऊपर आर्थिक बोझ न रहे। उन्हें सिंचाई और तकनीक की बेहतर सुविधा मिले, जिससे उनकी आय दोगुनी हो।
author: narendramodi

text:
जब सरकार बिना भ्रष्टाचार के साफ नीयत से काम करती है तो परिणाम दिखता है।

एक सिंचाई परियोजना जिसे दशकों पहले पूरा हो जाना चाहिए था, उसे कांग्रेस की सरकारों ने लगातार लटकाए रखा। 

हमने किसानों के कल्याण के लिए बड़ी सिंचाई परियोजनाओं को पुनर्जीवित किया है।
author: narendramodi

text:
We have transformed the housing sector. More houses are being built with better facilities, allocated without favouritism and aimed at women empowerment. 

Congress built few houses, allowed middlemen to make merry and named schemes after members of one family!
author: narendramodi

text: Odisha supports BJP’s development agenda. Speaking at a huge rally in Baripada. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Enhancing Jharkhand’s progress, reviving key projects. Addressing a public meeting in Palamu, Jharkhand.
author: narendramodi

text: हमारे वरिष्ठ नेता, प्रखर विद्वान और पार्टी संगठन की मजबूती में अहम भूमिका निभाने वाले आदरणीय मुरली मनोहर जोशी जी को उनके जन्मदिन की बहुत-बहुत शुभकामनाएं। मैं उनके अच्छे स्वास्थ्य और लंबी आयु की कामना करता हूं।
author: narendramodi

text:
অবিস্মৰণীয় আদৰণিৰ বাবে মই সমগ্ৰ অসমবাসী ভাই-ভনীলৈ ধন্যবাদ জনাইছো । শিলচৰৰ এই আলোকচিত্ৰ সমূহে উৎসাহ-উদ্দীপনাৰ গভীৰতাক প্ৰতিফলিত কৰিছে। 

I thank my sisters and brothers of Assam for the memorable welcome. 

These pictures from Silchar indicate the level of enthusiasm.
author: narendramodi

text:
A few days ago, we took a historic decision for the people of Assam. 

This will go a long way in preserving the unique culture of Assam.
author: narendramodi

text: The Citizenship Amendment Bill of 2016 is a sincere attempt to remove the injustices done in the past.
author: narendramodi

text: My categorical assurance to my sisters and brothers of Assam regarding the NRC.
author: narendramodi

text:
In Imphal, paid tributes to the rich history and culture of Manipur including the bravery of people from this land in the freedom struggle. 

Also talked about efforts to create better sporting infrastructure for the state’s youth. https://nm4.in/2VrY8lK
author: narendramodi

text:
A paradigm shift in the way projects are initiated and completed. 

Happy to share that work on several projects, including the FCI Food Storage Godown at Sawombung started after 2014 and they have been completed.

 This ensures fast paced development.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Integrated Check Post at Moreh, which has been inaugurated today will offer a wide range of facilities to the people.

The Dolaithabi Barrage project was conceived in 1987 but work began at full pace only after 2014 and it was inaugurated today.
author: narendramodi

text:
When it comes to the development of the Northeast, our Government has left no stone unturned. 

The contrast with previous Congress Governments, and the result of our efforts are for everyone to see.
author: narendramodi

text:
Defence Minister @nsitharaman's speech in the Parliament demolishes the campaign of calumny on Rafale. Must watch!

https://youtu.be/yCoXwGJCV0o
author: narendramodi

text: Shri @arunjaitley's intervention on Jammu & Kashmir is incisive and informative. Do watch!
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to be among the people of Assam. Watch my speech at Silchar.
author: narendramodi

text: A boost to Manipur's growth.   Inaugurating key development projects in Imphal. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Excellent! 

Congratulations to @sinha_arunima for scaling new heights of success. 

She is the pride of India, who has distinguished herself through her hardwork and perseverance. 

Wishing her the very best for her future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text:
During the Cabinet meeting yesterday, a landmark decision was taken that benefits the MSME sector. 

Know more...
author: narendramodi

text:
Our approach to GST has always been people friendly. 

We have always sought feedback from various stakeholders and have acted on that feedback too.

In the coming times too, this approach will remain the same. 

We are making GST as simple as possible.
author: narendramodi

text: ਐਨਡੀਏ ਸਰਕਾਰ ਨੇ ਹਮੇਸ਼ਾ ਕਿਸਾਨਾਂ ਦੇ ਹੱਕਾਂ ਬਾਰੇ ਸੋਚਿਆ ਹੈ ਤੇ ਉਹਨਾਂ ਦੇ ਵਿਕਾਸ ਲਈ ਕਈ ਠੋਸ ਕਦਮ ਚੁੱਕੇ ਹਨ ਜਦਕਿ ਕਾਂਗਰਸ ਦਹਾਕਿਆਂ ਤੋਂ ਕਿਸਾਨਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬਰਬਾਦ ਕਰਦੀ ਆਈ ਹੈ ਤੇ ਹਮੇੇਸ਼ਾ ਕਿਸਾਨਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਕਰਜ਼ੇ ਤੇ ਗਰੀਬੀ ਵੱਲ ਹੀ ਧੱਕਿਆ ਹੈ। ਐਨਡੀਏ ਸਰਕਾਰ ਕਿਸਾਨਾਂ ਲਈ ਸੀ, ਹੈ ਤੇ ਹਮੇਸ਼ਾ ਰਹੇਗੀ।
author: narendramodi

text:
Rewards, Congres style!

If one is associated with the 1984 anti-Sikh massacre, one gets to become MP, CM thanks to Congress.

Instead of focussing on public welfare, their interest lies more in ensuring people do not sing Vande Mataram.

Very sad...
author: narendramodi

text:
With the blessings of the people and the earnest desire to ensure more pilgrims can pray to Sri Guru Nanak Dev Ji, the NDA government has worked on the Kartarpur corridor. 

We want to build an India that is inspired by the values of Sri Guru Nanak Dev Ji.
author: narendramodi

text:
ਗੁਰਦਾਸਪੁਰ ਤੇ ਸਮੂਹ ਪੰਜਾਬ ਵਾਸੀਆਂ ਦਾ ਇੰਨੇ ਪਿਆਰ ਤੇ ਸਤਿਕਾਰ ਦਾ ਬਹੁਤ-ਬਹੁਤ ਧੰਨਵਾਦ। ਅੱਜ ਗੁਰਦਾਸਪੁਰ ਰੈਲੀ ਦੀਆਂ ਕੁੱਝ ਤਸਵੀਰਾਂ ਸਾਂਝੀਆਂ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ। ਇੰਨੀ ਠੰਡ ਦੇ ਬਾਵਜੂਦ ਗੁਰਦਾਸਪੁਰ ਪਹੁੰਚੇ ਹਰ ਇੱਕ ਪੰਜਾਬੀ ਦਾ ਮੈਂ ਸ਼ੁਕਰਗੁਜ਼ਾਰ ਹਾਂ।

@BJP4Punjab @Akali_Dal_
author: narendramodi

text:
2018 was a great year for Indian science. 

Our nation achieved a lot and we must do a lot more in the years to come so that science continues to enhance India’s progress.
author: narendramodi

text:
Beloved Shastri Ji gave us the slogan- Jai Jawan, Jai Kisan.

20 years ago, the great Atal Ji added Jai Vigyan.

Today, the need of the our is to add Anusandhan (research) to it.

Jai Jawan, Jai Kisan, Jai Vigyan, Jai Anusandhan.
author: narendramodi

text:
India’s history in science, technology and innovation will make every Indian proud.

A century ago, with minimum resources and maximum struggles our scientists did extraordinary things.
author: narendramodi

text: Here are some pictures from the 106th Indian Science Congress.
author: narendramodi

text: Great euphoria at the huge rally in Gurdaspur. Here is my speech.
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking on ‘Future India: Science and Technology’ at the 106th Indian Science Congress. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Our party is blessed to have the support of such hard-working volunteers.
My best wishes to everyone. Happy volunteering :)
author: narendramodi

text:
The Ujjwala Yojana continues to transform lives, emerging as an agent of change for the poor. Delighted that the number of beneficiaries has crossed 6 crore. 

Congratulations to the beneficiaries. The Yojana is ensuring women empowerment and better health in our society.
author: narendramodi

text:
A very emotional moment from today’s interaction with @BJP4Andhra Karyakartas…

We were honoured that Shri P V Chalapathi Rao Garu joined the interaction. 

The wisdom and hardwork of Karyakartas like him have no parallel. They are the strength of the BJP!
author: narendramodi

text:
Karyakartas told me how NTR Garu referred to Congress as 'Dushta Congress' but for TDP today, it is 'Dost Congress.’

People know the reality of TDP and Congress. 

Based on our work in the last 4.5 years, I can confidently say that it is BJP that will fulfil AP’s aspirations.
author: narendramodi

text:
To hide their own failures, the TDP Government in AP is spreading so many lies.

BJP’s truth will defeat the Tsunami of TDP’s lies.

It is high time the AP Government answer the people of the state on their own misdoings.
author: narendramodi

text:
Several members of the Telugu community have prospered overseas.

Thus, it was natural for a Karyakarta from Andhra Pradesh to ask about the foreign policy of India and express joy about India’s rising stature at the world stage.
author: narendramodi

text:
Caring for every Indian, providing national, financial and healthcare security to our citizens.

Know what I told a Karyakarta from Machilipatnam on the unique work culture of the NDA Government.
author: narendramodi

text:
The 2019 polls are special because those born in the 21st century will also vote.

Requested first time voters to bless @BJP4India and talked about why the BJP’s development agenda strikes a chord with people from all sections of society.
author: narendramodi

text: Having a wonderful interaction with the hardworking @BJP4Andhra Karyakartas. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Looking forward to interacting with @BJP4Andhra Karyakartas at 4 PM. 

Do watch.
author: narendramodi

text: In case you missed it, here is my interview with @ANI. Have spoken about a wide range of issues. Watch!
author: narendramodi

text:
Kader Khan Ji brightened the screen with his stupendous acting skills and lightened it thanks to his unique sense of humour. 

He was also a prolific screenwriter, associated with many memorable films. 

Saddened by his demise. Condolences to his family and admirers.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to Manipur’s dynamic CM Shri @NBirenSingh Ji on his birthday. He is working tirelessly for the development of the state. I pray for his long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text:
Wishing everyone a joyous 2019!

May everyone be happy and healthy. I pray that all your wishes are fulfilled in 2019.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had a good interaction with the newly elected Mayors from Haryana.

Congratulated them and conveyed my best wishes as they begin their work in fulfilling the aspirations of the people of their respective cities. @BJP4Haryana
author: narendramodi

text:
Excellent effort! 

Proud of our Party Karyakartas who are working tirelessly.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to know! My best wishes to you.
author: narendramodi

text:
Yes I agree. 

I urge more people to visit Prayagraj and take part in the Kumbh.
author: narendramodi

text: When Jabalpur has passionate citizens like you, no force can prevent this city from being Swachh.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thank you. 

This is a mark of respect for the brave Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose and all that he did for our nation.
author: narendramodi

text:
Met Gujarat Cabinet Minister Shri Kunvarjibhai Bavaliya. 

Congratulated him on his win in the Jasdan by-poll and conveyed my best wishes in his endeavours towards serving the people of Gujarat and further strengthening @BJP4Gujarat.
author: narendramodi

text: Reiterated India's continued commitment to work together for the development of Bangladesh and further strengthening of our bilateral relations.
author: narendramodi

text:
Spoke to Sheikh Hasina Ji and congratulated her on the resounding victory in the Bangladesh elections. 

Wished her the very best for the tenure ahead.
author: narendramodi

text: These pictures show the high level of enthusiasm at the public meeting in Port Blair.
author: narendramodi

text: An initiative that will boost industrial growth in Andaman and Nicobar islands, as well as Lakshadweep.
author: narendramodi

text:
It is important for us as a nation to be proud of our rich history and those who toiled for our freedom.

The response of the people of Andaman and Nicobar islands to a decision taken by the Government must be seen to be believed!
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, the people of Andaman and Nicobar islands got many development projects. The progress of these islands is our priority. 

I do not agree with any differentiation between mainland and island…Andaman and Nicobar is as mainland as any other part of India.
author: narendramodi

text:
75 years ago, on this day, in the city of Port Blair, Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose addressed a large gathering.

Today, we paid tributes to Netaji in a unique way. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
In 1943 Netaji Bose unfurled the Tricolour in Andaman and Nicobar islands.

Today in Port Blair, I had the honour of unfurling the Tricolour to mark the 75th anniversary of Subhas Babu's brave feat. We also reiterate our commitment to creating an India Subhas Babu dreamt of.
author: narendramodi

text: Among those imprisoned at Cellular Jail was the great Veer Savarkar. I visited the cell where the indomitable Veer Savarkar was lodged. Rigorous imprisonment did not dampen Veer Savarkar’s spirits and he continued to speak and write about a free India from jail too.
author: narendramodi

text:
Cellular Jail...this is where colonial rulers sent several nationalists and freedom fighters who fiercely resisted imperialism. 

Today, I had the privilege of visiting the Cellular Jail and paying homage to those greats who toiled for us and our freedom.
author: narendramodi

text: There is immense fervour at the public meeting in Port Blair. Watch my speech live.
author: narendramodi

text: Paid homage to those who lost their lives in the unfortunate 2004 Tsunami at the Tsunami Memorial in Car Nicobar.
author: narendramodi

text: Have a look at the vibrancy in Car Nicobar. These are some pictures from the public meeting, where I got the opportunity to interact with citizens from all walks of life.
author: narendramodi

text: Central Government’s efforts such as Sagarmala will have an extremely positive impact on the Andaman and Nicobar Islands. At the same time, we are working towards a Trans-shipment Port that will boost economic prospects. Connectivity will also be enhanced.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to announce important decisions relating to agriculture and fisheries. These will help protect local culture of the Andaman and Nicobar islands as well as increase livelihood opportunities.
author: narendramodi

text:
Giving wings to the aspirations of our Yuva Shakti. 
 
The upcoming ITI will greatly benefit youngsters.
 
The Government is building vital sporting infrastructure, which will further popularize sports in the UT and boost fitness levels.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today in Car Nicobar, we inaugurated and laid the foundation stones for several development works.
 
These are projects relating to education, healthcare, skill development, transportation, energy and sports. 
 
Congratulations to the citizens!
author: narendramodi

text:
Our country is grateful to Shri Mrinal Sen for giving us some of the most memorable films. 

The dexterity and sensitivity with which he made films is noteworthy. His rich work is admired across generations. 

Saddened by his demise. My thoughts are with his family and admirers.
author: narendramodi

text: Appreciated the role of websites like http://thebetterindia.com , http://yourstory.com , http://thepositiveindia.com  in inspiring positivity in society. I urge you to share such efforts that you know of, and further positivity.
author: narendramodi

text:
Remembering Mahatma Gandhi and Madiba!

As we mark the 150th Jayanti of Bapu and the birth centenary of Madiba, we recall their ideals and reiterate our commitment to create a just and compassionate society.
author: narendramodi

text: Spoke about a unique award named after Sardar Patel, that will further the spirit of unity and integration. #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text:
In January 2019, the holy city of Prayagraj will host the Kumbh Mela. This is an important event, one with deep historical roots and an occasion for self-discovery. 

Do visit Prayagraj for the Kumbh and do share your photos on social media. #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text: Our festivals are occasions of celebrating togetherness. They also illustrate a deep connect with Mother Nature.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to be connecting once again, thanks to #MannKiBaat. Tune in.
author: narendramodi

text: I thank the people of Tripura for their massive support to BJP in the civic polls. Gladdening to see the hard-work and efforts of karyakartas of @BJP4Tripura. This will give a further boost to the development of Tripura.
author: narendramodi

text:
बाबा विश्वनाथ की असीम कृपा हम सभी पर रही है।

हमारा प्रयास है कि काशी की आत्मा से छेड़छाड़ किए बिना, हमारा ये चिर-पुरातन शहर नई काया के साथ दुनिया के सामने आए।
author: narendramodi

text: Our Digital India initiative has brought convenience in the lives of crores of Indians and has also helped eliminate corruption.
author: narendramodi

text: ‘One District, One Product’ is a commendable initiative of the Uttar Pradesh Government, which will safeguard the well-being of all those associated with MSMEs, especially weaving and handicrafts.
author: narendramodi

text:
काशी में होना ही अपने आप में विशेष अनुभूति देता है। यहां के लोगों से मिले प्यार से मैं अभिभूत हूं। 

यहां विकास के कई कार्यों का लोकार्पण किया, जो काशी के लोगों के जीवन को और आसान बनाएगा।
author: narendramodi

text:
It is a matter of pride for Kashi that this great city is now home to the International Rice Research Institute South Asia Regional Centre. This Centre harnesses the power of technology and innovation for the benefit of our farmers.

Glimpses from the inauguration today.
author: narendramodi

text: Boosting the development of Kashi and UP. Addressing a programme in Varanasi.
author: narendramodi

text:
The moment Governments changed in MP and Rajasthan, urea shortages began and so have Lathis on farmers. 

In Karnataka, farmers are suffering.

On what basis is Congress talking about farmer welfare? 

The NDA govt. is taking many steps for a robust agriculture sector.
author: narendramodi

text:
गाजीपुर में बन रहा मेडिकल कॉलेज, पूर्वांचल को हेल्थकेयर हब बनाने की दिशा में एक बड़ा प्रयास है।

हमारी कोशिश है कि पूर्वांचल के हमारे भाई-बहनों को उसी क्षेत्र में गुणवत्तापूर्ण और सस्ते से सस्ता उपचार मिले।
author: narendramodi

text:
आज गाजीपुर में महाराजा सुहेलदेव के सम्मान में डाक टिकट जारी करने का सौभाग्य मिला।

पीढ़ी दर पीढ़ी हम महाराजा सुहेलदेव के साहस और उनके दयालु स्वभाव को याद करते आ रहे हैं। उनका पूरा जीवन लोककल्याण को समर्पित रहा। विशेषकर गरीब से गरीब लोगों का उन्होंने सबसे अधिक ध्यान रखा।
author: narendramodi

text: Wonderful to be in Ghazipur, Uttar Pradesh. Watch my speech at the public meeting.
author: narendramodi

text: India is delighted to welcome @PMBhutan Dr. Lotay Tshering. We had fruitful talks, focused on deepening cooperation in hydropower, space technology, economy and several other areas. Strong ties between our nations greatly benefit our citizens.
author: narendramodi

text: Harnessing the demographic dividend and empowering our Yuva Shakti.
author: narendramodi

text: Spoke about how one can volunteer for the 2019 poll campaign and why we deeply value the efforts as well as insights of volunteers.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is witnessing an increased arrival of tourists, which augurs well for our economy.

Talked about the steps taken in the tourism sector while interacting with a Karyakarta from Davanagere.
author: narendramodi

text:
A Karyakarta from Bidar asked me about the steps taken by the Government for the MSME sector.

This is what I said...
author: narendramodi

text:
In Karnataka, those in power are only bothered about ministries and portfolios. Public welfare is not their concern.

In such an atmosphere, the @BJP4Karnataka Karyakartas must continue being among people and highlight their issues.
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking on a wide range of issues with our Karnataka BJP Karyakartas. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Looking forward to interacting with @BJP4Karnataka Karyakartas this evening. 

Watch the interaction on the 'Narendra Modi Mobile App.'
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a joint press meet with Dr. Lotay Tshering, the PM of Bhutan. @PMBhutan
author: narendramodi

text: Birthday wishes to my valued colleague Shri @arunjaitley Ji. He has made a valuable contribution as our Finance Minister. He has also distinguished himself as a great Parliamentarian. Praying for his long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text:
उनको चौकीदार से डर लगने लगा है।

चोरों की नींद हराम हो गई है कि चौकीदार सोने को तैयार नहीं है।

चौकीदार चोरों को छोड़ेगा नहीं। 

देश में ईमानदारी ही चलेगी।
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress is a master at misleading farmers. 

Their fake promises and tokenism will not cut ice with the hardworking farmers of India.
author: narendramodi

text: Know how the emphasis on next-generation infrastructure will have a positive impact on the people of Himachal Pradesh.
author: narendramodi

text:
हिमाचल प्रदेश और अटल जी का नाता अटूट रहा। 

अटल जी ने हिमाचल के विकास की मजबूत नींव रखी और उसी से प्रेरित होकर भाजपा सरकार राज्य के विकास के लिए काम कर रही है।
author: narendramodi

text:
Here are pictures from the public meeting in Dharamshala. 

I congratulate the Himachal Pradesh Government under CM Shri Jairam Thakur on completing one year of providing good governance to the people of the state. @jairamthakurbjp
author: narendramodi

text: देवभूमि हिमाचल के धर्मशाला में जनसभा को संबोधित कर रहा हूं।  लाइव देखें...
author: narendramodi

text: Looking forward to being in Devbhoomi Himachal Pradesh tomorrow for a @BJP4Himachal rally in Dharamshala. You can watch the rally on the ‘Narendra Modi Mobile App.’
author: narendramodi

text: Assamese is a great language and the culture of Assam is special.
author: narendramodi

text: Connectivity will lead to more opportunity, which will enhance prosperity.
author: narendramodi

text: Absolutely! More bright engineers who will contribute to India's progress.
author: narendramodi

text:
We are happy that we have got the opportunity to work for the development of Eastern and Northeastern India. 

Our efforts are transforming lives in these regions.
author: narendramodi

text: Saddened by the demise of Padma Shri Sulagitti Narasamma Ji. Her efforts of providing midwifery services in Karnataka will always be remembered. Her kindness endeared her to the poorer sections of society. My thoughts are with her family and vast number of admirers.
author: narendramodi

text:
Rashtrapati Ji led the nation in paying tributes to the venerable Atal Ji at 'Sadaiv Atal’, which is Atal Ji’s Samadhi.

India is eternally grateful to Atal Ji for everything he has done for the nation.
author: narendramodi

text: Have a look at these pictures of the Bogibeel Bridge.
author: narendramodi

text:
Misgovernance and corruption most adversely impact the poor.

On various parameters, compare the working of the NDA with the previous Government. 

Ours is a Government that has diligently worked to fulfil the dreams of the poor.
author: narendramodi

text: At the core of good governance is compassion, and taking steps that bring a positive difference in the lives of the poor.
author: narendramodi

text:
A developed Eastern India is essential for a developed India.

The NDA Government’s efforts will usher in record transformation for Eastern India.
author: narendramodi

text: From bigger roads, rail connectivity to better healthcare facilities, the Northeast is witnessing a great transformation during the last four years.
author: narendramodi

text:
It is indeed an honour to have inaugurated the Bogibeel Bridge on Atal Ji's Jayanti.

After all, he was really keen that this project see the light of day. 

This and several other critical infra projects that were delayed for years are getting completed under the NDA Government.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Bogibeel Bridge is among the most state-of-the-art infra projects in India. 

It will deepen connectivity and open new avenues of prosperity for citizens.
author: narendramodi

text: A historic day for the Northeast! Speaking at the inauguration of the Bogibeel Bridge. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
हम सबके प्रिय, पूर्व प्रधानमंत्री स्वर्गीय अटल बिहारी वाजपेयी जी को उनकी जयंती पर शत-शत नमन। 

Tributes to Atal Ji on his Jayanti. We reiterate our commitment towards creating the India he dreamt of.
author: narendramodi

text:
पंडित मदन मोहन मालवीय जी को उनकी जयंती पर कोटि-कोटि नमन। शिक्षा के क्षेत्र में अमिट योगदान और राष्ट्र के प्रति असीम समर्पण के लिए महामना सदा याद किए जाएंगे।  

Remembering Mahamana on his Jayanti. He made everlasting contributions to our freedom movement and in education.
author: narendramodi

text:
Wishing everyone a Merry Christmas. 

We remember the noble teachings of Jesus Christ and recall his efforts towards creating a compassionate and equal society.
author: narendramodi

text:
The people of Odisha have many serious questions for the State Government. 

They want to know why is the State Government not solving people’s problems, despite being in power for so many years...
author: narendramodi

text: While the NDA Government is taking several steps for the welfare of farmers, the Odisha Government is insensitive to their needs and ignores their wellbeing.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Central Government is extremely sensitive towards the dreams of the wonderful people of Odisha.

There is a strong focus on infrastructure, connectivity, healthcare, social sectors and more.
author: narendramodi

text:
Pictures from the massive rally in Khurda. 

There is a strong demand for change in Odisha. 

The people of the state are convinced that if there is one party that can fulfil people’s aspirations, it is @BJP4Odisha.
author: narendramodi

text:
Honouring those who gave their life for India’s freedom.

The Paika Rebellion was a watershed moment in our history. It demonstrated the valour of the Odia people. 

Today, released a stamp and coin on the Paika Rebellion and remembered the greats who fought colonial rule.
author: narendramodi

text: Today in Odisha, also launched pipelines of @IndianOilcl and @gailindia. These projects will ensure more petroleum products for the citizens of Odisha.
author: narendramodi

text: Improving connectivity in Odisha by focussing in better road network across the state.
author: narendramodi

text:
The new ESIC hospital will serve my sisters and brothers of Odisha. 

Larger in capacity and better in facilities, it will contribute towards building a healthier Odisha.
author: narendramodi

text:
Glad to have dedicated to the nation the campus of IIT Bhubaneswar. 

The coming of such a prestigious institution augurs well for youngsters of Odisha.
author: narendramodi

text:
Inaugurated the Lalitgiri Museum.  I am sure this Museum will beautifully showcase facets of Odisha's spectacular culture and history.

Announced the setting up of the Buxi Jagabandhu research chair at Utkal University. This will help students researching on the Paika Rebellion.
author: narendramodi

text:
Being in Odisha is special.

Today, I had the honour of inaugurating and laying the foundation stones for numerous projects worth Rs. 14,000 crore.

The Central Government is committed towards doing everything possible for Odisha's progress. 

https://www.facebook.com/PMOIndia/videos/677865072611493/ …
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, on the eve of beloved Atal Ji's Jayanti, a commemorative coin was released in his honour. Widely respected by everyone, Atal Ji's strong leadership ensured great progress for our country. He was a leader who put national interest above everything. 

http://nm-1.in/1YUntK
author: narendramodi

text: Euphoric atmosphere at the @BJP4Odisha rally in Khurda. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Saddened by the demise of Captain Jai Narain Prasad Nishad Ji. He served our nation with great diligence. Captain Nishad’s efforts for the progress of Bihar were noteworthy. His work towards empowering the poor will always be remembered. Condolences to his family and supporters.
author: narendramodi

text: बहुत-बहुत धन्यवाद @AnupamPKher जी। काशी का प्रतिनिधि होने के नाते यहां का विकास मेरे लिए सौभाग्य की बात है।
author: narendramodi

text:
Maa Ganga is central to our history and culture. She has nurtured us for years. 

It’s our honour that we’ve been able to undertake such a massive exercise towards ensuring a Clean Ganga. These efforts will further intensify in the times to come.
author: narendramodi

text:
I salute your passion for India’s growth and thank you for the faith in our Government. 

When we have well wishers like you, I am sure we will be able to convey our work to the people with great effectiveness.
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulations!
author: narendramodi

text: Saddened by the loss of lives and destruction in Indonesia caused by the Tsunami after the eruption of a volcano. Condolences to the bereaved families and wishing the injured an early recovery. India is ready to assist our maritime neighbour and friend in relief work. @jokowi
author: narendramodi

text:
A Karyakarta from Tiruvallur wanted to know:

What has the Government done for senior citizens? 

Know what I told him.
author: narendramodi

text:
How was 2018 for India? 

This is what a Karyakarta from Tiruchirappalli asked me. 

Here is what I said.
author: narendramodi

text:
People of Madurai are pleased that their historic city will have an AIIMS.

A Karyakarta from Madurai asked me about Tamil Nadu’s development trajectory in the times to come.
author: narendramodi

text: Here is how the family of @BJP4India Karyakartas can enhance their efforts towards ensuring a record win for the Party in 2019.
author: narendramodi

text:
Many Mahagathbandhan leaders are ardent followers of Dr. Lohia. By allying with Congress, they are disrespecting his ideals.

People will also never forget how Congress humiliated greats like MGR and NTR. 

Opposition’s only interest is dynasty, not development.
author: narendramodi

text: Sardar Patel devoted his life towards unifying India. The Sardar Patel Award for National Integration will be a fitting tribute to him and will inspire more people to work towards furthering India’s unity and national integration.
author: narendramodi

text: Yesterday, at the DGPs/IGPs Conference in Kevadia, announced an annual Sardar Patel Award for National Integration. This award would be given for outstanding efforts to further national integration.
author: narendramodi

text: Remembering Chaudhary Charan Singh Ji on his birth anniversary. We recall his noteworthy contribution to India's development, particularly in safeguarding the interests of farmers. He also fiercely resisted the Emergency and worked to strengthen our democratic fabric.
author: narendramodi

text:
I thank the people of Jasdan for blessing the BJP and supporting the Party's development agenda.

Congratulations to Kunvarjibhai Bavaliya for the victory.

Kudos to the @BJP4Gujarat team, CM @vijayrupanibjp and @jitu_vaghani for their efforts.
author: narendramodi

text: Our Karyakartas are the biggest strength of the BJP. Watch the interaction with Tamil Nadu Karyakartas.
author: narendramodi

text:
We are determined to improve the health of women across India. 

At the @BJPMahilaMorcha meet, talked about some of the work done in this direction.
author: narendramodi

text:
Over the last four and a half years, lot of effort has been devoted towards women empowerment. 

Nari Shakti has been at the core of several initiatives of our Government.
author: narendramodi

text:
Since the days of the Jana Sangh, women Karyakartas have played a pivotal role in the Party. 

I commend the @BJPMahilaMorcha for their endeavours and wish them the very best for their efforts in the times to come.
author: narendramodi

text: Need of the hour for the police forces is to use latest technology including social media. Lots can also be done in capacity building in the area of cyber security.
author: narendramodi

text: There are elements who are exploiting caste fault-lines for their short term gains. It is important that police forces tackle such forces and preserve the united fabric of our country.
author: narendramodi

text: The efforts of our police forces in countering terrorism are commendable. At the DGPs/IGPs conference, spoke about the need for police forces to be vigilant and counter the forces of radicalisation. Also highlighted the need to strengthen inter-state coordination to tackle crime.
author: narendramodi

text: Shared my thoughts on a wide range of issues concerning our security systems and the working of the police forces at the DGPs/IGPs Conference in Kevadia. http://nm-1.in/9tiJSg
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the National Convention of @BJP4India Mahila Morcha. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Sharing some glimpses from the wonderful cultural programme at the DGPs/IGPs Conference at Kevadia.
author: narendramodi

text: During the Conference of DGPs and IGPs, I’ve also got the opportunity to meet select groups of officials and discuss specific issues pertaining to policing and security.
author: narendramodi

text: It’s been a productive day at the Conference of DGPs/IGPs in Kevadia. We’ve been having detailed presentations on various aspects relating to national security.
author: narendramodi

text: With the passing away of Dipali Barthakur Ji, we have lost an outstanding singer who made Assamese music and culture even more popular across India and the world. Her melodious songs will continue to enthral generations to come. Condolences to her family and countless admirers.
author: narendramodi

text: Chennai based Dr S Jayachandran is a hero. His was a life purely for the betterment of others.
author: narendramodi

text:
I would specially urge you all to visit Kevadia and see the ‘Statue of Unity.’ 

Some friends told me that the Statue can also be seen during Delhi-Mumbai flights. So, next time you are flying that route do try to spot the Statue.
author: narendramodi

text:
Paid tributes to the great Sardar Patel at the ‘Statue of Unity.’ 

As India’s Home Minister, his contribution towards building the framework of our security systems is immense.
author: narendramodi

text: Reached Kevadia in Gujarat for the Conference of DGPs/IGPs. Looking forward to fruitful deliberations that will strengthen our security apparatus.
author: narendramodi

text:
Do you have an idea for this month’s #MannKiBaat on the 30th? 

Share it on the MyGov Open Forum. 

You can also dial 1800 11 7800 and record your message. 

The NM Mobile App has a section as well to share inputs.
author: narendramodi

text:
The high voter turnout in the polls clearly displays immense faith that people of J&K have put in grass root democratic institutions of the country.  

Essence of democracy lies in empowerment of the common citizen, to which our government is totally committed.
author: narendramodi

text:
These elected Sarpanches are extraordinary individuals who have shown immense courage in the face of heavy odds. 

They have made an everlasting contribution towards enhancing the democratic fabric of the state. 

Assured them full support from the Centre in their many efforts.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had an excellent interaction with newly elected Sarpanches of Panchayats from across Jammu and Kashmir. 

Wished them the very best as they work towards fulfilling the aspirations of the people.
author: narendramodi

text:
I commend the @BJP4Haryana team for assiduously working for people's welfare. 

Under the leadership of Shri @mlkhattar Ji, the state government has been providing corruption-free and people-friendly governance to the state. BJP's development agenda is being widely appreciated.
author: narendramodi

text:
Haryana trusts BJP! 

I thank the people of Haryana for continuously reposing their faith in @BJP4Haryana.

We derive great strength from the people’s blessings and reaffirm our commitment to work for Haryana’s progress.
author: narendramodi

text: Having an interesting interaction with BJP Karyakartas based in Tamil Nadu and Puducherry. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Will be interacting with @BJP4TamilNadu and @BJP4Puducherry Karyakartas at 4:30 this evening.

Watch the interaction live on the 'Narendra Modi Mobile App.'
author: narendramodi

text: Leveraging the power of technology to bring a positive difference in the lives of 130 crore Indians.
author: narendramodi

text:
‘Ease of Living’ for people is our aim. 

Resources are being devoted towards creating urban centres where the development is holistic.
author: narendramodi

text:
From Kargil to Kanyakumari, from Kutch to Kamrup, there is a lot of work happening towards building next generation infrastructure. 

I salute all those working towards completing these projects.
author: narendramodi

text: Work on the Pune Metro is moving at a quick pace and this augurs well for the people of Pune and surrounding areas.
author: narendramodi

text: Housing for all is among the topmost priorities of our Government. With one's own home comes dignity and the ability to fulfil one's aspirations.
author: narendramodi

text: Furthering connectivity and convenience for the hardworking citizens of Mumbai and Thane.
author: narendramodi

text:
Mumbai, Thane and the surrounding regions play a crucial role in India’s progress. The Central and Maharashtra Government are taking many steps for the growth of these places.

Today, laid the foundation stones for projects worth Rs. 33,000 crore, including 2 Metro Lines.
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy to see the passion among members of the film and entertainment industry towards the development of India. 

They talked at length about ways to further Mumbai’s development, particularly with regard to making it a global hub for entertainment.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had an extensive and fruitful interaction with a delegation from the film and entertainment industry. 

The delegation spoke about the strides being made by the film and entertainment industry, and gave valuable inputs relating to GST for their sector. https://nm4.in/2PJUEHa
author: narendramodi

text: In Mumbai today, released the book ‘Timeless Laxman.’ This book is based on the life of the great RK Laxman, whose rich work and indomitable spirit continue to be admired and remembered by every Indian.
author: narendramodi

text: Pune's vibrancy is widely admired. This is a city of culture and learning. Addressing a public meeting here. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
पहले जब बड़ी कंपनियां बैंकों का पैसा नहीं लौटाती थीं, तो इनके मालिकों को कुछ नहीं होता था।

70 साल से देश में यही हो रहा था। जानते हैं क्यों? क्योंकि इन कंपनियों को खास सुरक्षा कवच मिला हुआ था।

2016 में Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code बनाकर मैंने इस सुरक्षा कवच को तोड़ दिया।
author: narendramodi

text: सुनिए दो मित्र और शेर की मजेदार कहानी...
author: narendramodi

text:
GST marks a historic leap for the nation. 

We firmly believe that GST must be as simple as possible and we are also working constantly in that direction.
author: narendramodi

text: Here is an example of how the work culture has changed in India today, indicative of a Surging India.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, India is a country that never stops. 

न रुकेंगे, न धीमा पड़ेंगे, न थमेंगे: ये इंडिया ने ठान लिया है।
author: narendramodi

text:
Today there are two pictures in front of us.

First, the state of affairs before 2014.

Second, the state of affairs post 2014.

Take any parameter, the work done in the last four years is quick, effective and people-friendly.
author: narendramodi

text: क्या चार साल पहले किसी ने सोचा था!
author: narendramodi

text: Glad to address the @republic Summit. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Looking forward to addressing the Republic Summit tomorrow morning in Mumbai. @republic
author: narendramodi

text:
India and the Maldives look forward to working together in areas such as maritime cooperation and mitigating climate change 

President @ibusolih and I also agreed on the need to further the atmosphere of peace and security in the Indian Ocean region. 

https://www.facebook.com/PMOIndia/videos/2085672661744004/ …
author: narendramodi

text:
President @ibusolih's people-centric development efforts are truly commendable. 

As a close friend, India always wishes for progress and prosperity of the Maldives. 

During our talks today, we discussed ways to boost connectivity, trade and cultural ties between our countries.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is glad to welcome President @ibusolih, President of the Republic of Maldives. 

This is his first overseas visit after assuming office, indicating the special priority he accords to stronger ties between our nations. 

We had fruitful talks on a wide range of subjects.
author: narendramodi

text: I congratulate Shri @Bhupesh_Baghel Ji on being sworn-in as Chhattisgarh's Chief Minister and wish him the very best in serving the people of the state.
author: narendramodi

text: As he begins his innings as Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister, I convey my greetings to Shri Kamal Nath Ji. Best wishes for the tenure. @OfficeOfKNath
author: narendramodi

text:
Kudos to all those who worked hard to ensure the 2018 Hockey World Cup is a resounding success. 

Congratulations to the people and Government of Odisha for their warmth and hospitality.
author: narendramodi

text: The Hockey World Cup in Odisha has been a treat for sports lovers. It was characterised by iconic matches, exceptional individual performances and wonderful team efforts. The tournament has also enhanced the popularity of hockey among the people of India, especially the youth.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congratulations to the @BELRedLions for winning the #HWC2018. I also congratulate @oranjehockey for their spirited fight. 

The Final yesterday was a memorable match, with both sides playing excellent hockey. Best wishes to both the teams for their endeavours ahead.  @FIH_Hockey
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulations to Shri @ashokgehlot51 Ji and Shri @SachinPilot Ji on taking oath as the CM and Deputy CM of Rajasthan. Best wishes for their tenure ahead.
author: narendramodi

text: Dear @capt_amarinder Ji best wishes for the procedure. Praying for your speedy recovery.
author: narendramodi

text: A momentous victory by one of India’s most outstanding athletes. Congratulations to @Pvsindhu1 for the historic win in the BWF World Tour Finals. Every Indian is delighted and very proud of her!
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress has disdain for the judiciary. 

After all, it was the Courts that kept a check on Congress’ authoritarianism. 

Disrespecting a Court decision, the then PM imposed the Emergency in 1975 and struck a heavy blow on freedom of speech and expression.
author: narendramodi

text:
It makes me very happy that the people of Prayagraj and the UP Government are devoting special attention to cleanliness.

These efforts are also in line with our emphasis on cleanliness, particularly a clean Ganga.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today in Prayagraj, several projects were inaugurated or their foundation stones were laid. These will improve the quality of life for the people of this great city. 

I am glad that pilgrims coming for the Kumbh will also be able to visit the Akshay Vat.
author: narendramodi

text:
प्रयागराज का आज का मेरा कार्यक्रम प्राचीन विरासत और जनता के लिए आधुनिक सुविधाओं को समर्पित था। 

नया हवाई अड्डा देश-विदेश से पर्यटकों के प्रयागराज आने में सुविधाजनक होने के साथ-साथ यहां निवेश को भी बढ़ावा देगा।
author: narendramodi

text:
प्रयागराज में संगम पर पूजा - अर्चना का अवसर पाकर धन्य हुआ। 

देशवासियों की ख़ुशहाली और उन्नति की प्रार्थना की।
author: narendramodi

text:
Glad to have spent a large part of the day in the historic city of Prayagraj.

The city is all set to host the Kumbh next year. 

Inaugurated the Integrated Command and Control Centre, which will be an important place with regard to the Kumbh and ensuring a memorable experience.
author: narendramodi

text:
70 साल में पहली बार हमारी सरकार ने किसानों की आय बढ़ाने के बारे में सोचा है।
 
हम बहुत ईमानदारी और परिश्रम से किसानों को खेती से जुड़े संकटों से बाहर निकालने का प्रयास कर रहे हैं।
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस सरकार के द्वारा किए गए हर रक्षा सौदे में कोई न कोई विदेशी मामा, अंकल, चाचा-भतीजा निकल आता है।
 
इसलिए जब पारदर्शिता और ईमानदारी से सौदे होते हैं, तो कांग्रेस बौखला जाती है।
author: narendramodi

text: हमारे जवानों की सुरक्षा के प्रति कांग्रेस का क्या रवैया रहा है, ये मैं देश को फिर याद दिलाना चाहता हूं।
author: narendramodi

text:
पहले की सरकारों में क्या कार्य संस्कृति थी, कैसे अन्याय हुआ, इसकी गवाह रायबरेली रेल कोच फैक्ट्री है।
2014 तक यहां सिर्फ 3% मशीनें ही काम कर रहीं थीं। हमने स्थिति बदली। पिछले वर्ष यहां 711 नए डिब्बे बने।
हम इसे दुनिया की सबसे बड़ी रेल कोच फैक्ट्री बनाएंगे।
author: narendramodi

text:
Earlier today in Raebareli, I visited the Modern Coach Factory. 

In the last four years, substantial effort has been devoted towards this factory so that it becomes a shining beacon of ‘Make in India’ and gives opportunities to local youngsters.
author: narendramodi

text: Always special to be in Prayagraj. Speaking at a public meeting. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Birthday greetings to Karnataka CM Shri @hd_kumaraswamy Ji. Praying for his long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to be in Raebareli. Watch my speech at the public meeting.
author: narendramodi

text: Today on #VijayDiwas, we remember the indomitable spirit of the brave soldiers who fought in 1971. Their unwavering courage and patriotism ensured our country is safe. Their service will always inspire every Indian.
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulations to Mr. Zoramthanga on taking oath as Mizoram's Chief Minister. Wishing him the very best for his tenure. May the Government fulfil people's aspirations and work towards the state's growth.
author: narendramodi

text: Wonderful to interact with booth level Karyakartas from Tamil Nadu. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Looking forward to interacting with @BJP4TamilNadu Karyakartas at 4:30 this evening. 

Watch the interaction on the 'Narendra Modi Mobile App.'
author: narendramodi

text: Over the last few years, the BJP and the NDA family have become the preferred choice of the Northeast. We consider it our privilege that we have the honour of fulfilling the aspirations of the Northeast and taking the region to new heights of progress.
author: narendramodi

text: I appreciate the entire team of @BJP4Assam for their excellent work across the state, which has resulted in the Party’s wonderful performance. I am sure the Karyakartas will continue raising issues of public welfare and work towards Assam’s growth.
author: narendramodi

text:
I thank my sisters and brothers of Assam for their strong support for @BJP4Assam in the recent Panchayat Polls across the state. 

The people of the state have immense faith in the Assam Government and the focus on good governance.
author: narendramodi

text:
लौह पुरुष सरदार वल्लभभाई पटेल को उनकी पुण्यतिथि पर मेरी विनम्र श्रद्धांजलि।

Remembering the great Sardar Patel on his Punya Tithi. His thoughts, rich work and strong effort towards India’s unity inspire generations of Indians.
author: narendramodi

text:
From fragile five to a bright spot in the global economy.

From inertia to fast paced reform.

From scams to a corruption-free Government.

Lot has changed from 2014 to the present.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is proud of our diaspora, which is distinguishing itself across the world. 

During today’s interaction with Kerala Karyakartas, talked about how the people of India and the diaspora are boosting India’s image internationally.
author: narendramodi

text: A Karyakarta from Kollam asked me about what the BJP Karyakartas can do to further the Party’s reach across Kerala and other parts. Here is what I said.
author: narendramodi

text:
Kerala has seen Congress and Communist rule. Both are efficient in corruption and inefficient in governance. 

BJP is different from the two and promises a people-friendly and non-corrupt government in Kerala.
author: narendramodi

text: I specially salute the hardworking @BJP4Keralam Karyakartas. They are assiduously serving the people and raising issues of public importance. This when successive Governments in Kerala have shown little respect for democracy and stood silent when our Karyakartas were killed.
author: narendramodi

text: It’s a delight to interact with BJP Karyakartas from Kerala. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Emphasised on the need to focus on last mile delivery, simplifying systems and procedures, which will improve both ‘Ease of Doing Business’ and ‘Ease of Living.’ 

We are devoting all possible efforts to further improve our 'Ease of Doing Business' rankings.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had an excellent meeting to review India’s progress towards enhancing ‘Ease of Doing Business.’ 

We discussed aspects relating to construction, power, resolving insolvency and other areas that will make business easier in the times to come.
author: narendramodi

text:
Paid homage to the martyrs of the 2001 Parliament attack. 

India will never forget their bravery. These great people lived and lost their lives for the nation.
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulations to KCR Garu on taking oath as the CM of Telangana. Best wishes for his tenure ahead.
author: narendramodi

text: We salute the valour of those who were martyred during the dastardly attack on our Parliament on this day in 2001. Their courage and heroism inspires every Indian.
author: narendramodi

text:
Birthday greetings to my friend and Goa's CM @manoharparrikar Ji. 

Parrikar Ji is known for his compassionate, down to earth and hardworking nature. He is extremely passionate about Goa's development. 

The entire nation prays for Parrikar Ji's good health.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to my colleague @drharshvardhan Ji on his birthday. May he lead a long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text:
It was a delight to interact with @sinha_arunima. 

Handed over the Tricolour and wished her the very best as she embarks on an expedition to Mount Vinson, Antarctica. 

India is proud of Arunima’s accomplishments and her fortitude inspires us all.
author: narendramodi

text: Ayushman Bharat involves a two-fold strategy to improve healthcare among the people of India.
author: narendramodi

text: Here is how we in India are empowering women and youngsters.
author: narendramodi

text: The India story is one of hope. We are fully committed to provide accessible and affordable healthcare for the poor.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Sustainable Development Agenda reminds us why partnerships- between citizens, communities and countries- are essential.

Together, let us empower citizens and communities for the greater good of humankind.
author: narendramodi

text: Coming together for the welfare of Nari Shakti and Yuva Shakti.   Addressing the Partners’ Forum.
author: narendramodi

text:
A major milestone for Ayushman Bharat! 

In 80 days, over 5 lakh families got free healthcare services worth Rs. 700 crore. 

We are continuously working towards creating a healthy India!
author: narendramodi

text:
The family of BJP Karyakartas worked day and night for the state elections. I salute them for their hardwork. 

Victory and defeat are an integral part of life. 

Today’s results will further our resolve to serve people and work even harder for the development of India.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congratulations to the Congress for their victories. 

Congratulations to KCR Garu for the thumping win in Telangana and to the Mizo National Front (MNF) for their impressive victory in Mizoram.
author: narendramodi

text:
We accept the people’s mandate with humility. 

I thank the people of Chhattisgarh, Madhya Pradesh and Rajasthan for giving us the opportunity to serve these states. The BJP Governments in these states worked tirelessly for the welfare of the people.
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings to Pranab Da on his birthday. India has benefitted greatly from his wisdom and statesmanship. We are grateful to him for his excellent service during his long years in active politics and administration. I pray for Pranab Da’s long and healthy life. @CitiznMukherjee
author: narendramodi

text: Dr. Urjit Patel is a thorough professional with impeccable integrity. He has been in the Reserve Bank of India for about 6 years as Deputy Governor and Governor. He leaves behind a great legacy. We will miss him immensely.
author: narendramodi

text: Dr Urjit Patel is an economist of a very high calibre with a deep and insightful understanding of macro-economic issues. He steered the banking system from chaos to order and ensured discipline. Under his leadership, the RBI brought financial stability.
author: narendramodi

text: Glimpses from the All-Party meeting earlier today.
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulations to all those associated with India’s nuclear energy programme. Their untiring efforts have enhanced India’s progress. The nation is proud of them.
author: narendramodi

text: Another world record by Indian scientists and engineers. The indigenously designed Kaiga-I nuclear power unit has run non-stop for over 940 days! This is a major feat.
author: narendramodi

text: Several journalists would have regularly interacted with Jagdishbhai over the years. He had previously served with many Chief Ministers of Gujarat. We have lost a wonderful person, who loved his work and did it with utmost diligence. Condolences to his family and well wishers.
author: narendramodi

text: Extremely saddened by the demise of Shri Jagdish Thakkar, the PRO in the PMO. Jagdishbhai was a veteran journalist and I had the pleasure of working with him for years, both in Gujarat and in Delhi. He was known for his simplicity and warm-hearted nature.
author: narendramodi

text: ગુજરાતમાં સંઘ નો વ્યાપ વધારવામાં એમનો અમૂલ્ય ફાળો છે.વર્ષો સુધી એમની સાથે કામ કરવાનો મોકો મળ્યો અને ખુબ શીખવા મળ્યું. પ્રભુ એમના આત્માને શાંતિ આપે....
author: narendramodi

text: આર.એસ.એસ. ના વરિષ્ઠ પ્રચારક શ્રી ભાસ્કરરાવ દામલેજીના અવસાનથી ખુબ વ્યથિત છું. વર્ષો પહેલા પ્રચારક જીવનની શરૂઆત કરનાર દામલેજી લાંબા સમયથી ગુજરાતમાં સક્રિય હતા.
author: narendramodi

text: The Indian Hockey Team is in phenomenal form! Congratulations to the team for their resounding win against Canada in the Hockey World Cup. Our team now advances to the Quarter Finals Stage. Best wishes for the games ahead! #HWC2018 @TheHockeyIndia @FIH_Hockey
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to Smt. Sonia Gandhi Ji on her birthday. I pray for her long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy to see 'Yuva Shakti.' 

India's 'Yuva Shakti' is India's pride!
author: narendramodi

text: More than me, or any individual, 130 crore Indians are building a New India.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you for the kind words and blessings.
author: narendramodi

text: Shri Parkash Singh Badal Ji is one of India’s senior most leaders who has devoted his life to public service, especially the welfare of farmers. His contribution towards Punjab’s growth is remarkable. Best wishes to him on his birthday. Prayers for his long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text: New India के लिए हमारा फोकस सामर्थ्य, संसाधन, संस्कृति और सुरक्षा पर है।
author: narendramodi

text: देश में आज 21वीं सदी की आवश्यकताओं को देखते हुए नेक्स्ट जेनरेशन इन्फ्रास्ट्रक्चर तैयार हो रहा है। हाईवे हो, रेलवे हो, एयरवे हो या वॉटरवे, चौतरफा काम किया जा रहा है।
author: narendramodi

text: सुनिए और सोचिए...
author: narendramodi

text:
क्या कारण है कि छोटे-छोटे देश भी बहुत कम समय में हमसे आगे निकल गए?

मंजिलों की कमी नहीं थी, नीयत की कमी थी।

पैसों की कमी नहीं थी, Passion की कमी थी।

Solutions की कमी नहीं थी, संवेदना की कमी थी।

सामर्थ्य की कमी नहीं थी, कमी थी कार्य संस्कृति की।
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the #JagranForum in Delhi. Watch my speech. @JagranNews
author: narendramodi

text: राजस्थान में आज मतदान का दिन है। राज्य के सभी मतदाताओं से मेरा आग्रह है कि वे पूरे उत्साह के साथ लोकतंत्र के महापर्व में अवश्य भाग लें और भारी संख्या में मतदान करें।
author: narendramodi

text: ఇవాళ ఎన్నికల రోజు! తెలంగాణలో ఉన్న నా సోదర సోదరీమణులందరూ పెద్ద సంఖ్యలో వచ్చి ఓటు వెయ్యమని కోరుతున్నాను.... ప్రత్యేకించి నా యువ మిత్రులందరూ తమ ఓటు హక్కును వినియోగించుకొని ప్రజాస్వామ్యాన్ని మరింత సుసంపన్నం చేయమని ప్రార్థిస్తున్నాను...
author: narendramodi

text: Paid homage to Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar earlier today.
author: narendramodi

text:
पूज्य बाबासाहेब को उनके महापरिनिर्वाण दिवस पर कोटि-कोटि नमन। 

India bows to Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar on Mahaparinirvan Diwas.
author: narendramodi

text: राजस्थान में भाजपा के लिए अपार उत्साह और समर्थन है। मैं जनता से अपील करता हूं कि वे भाजपा को भारी संख्या में वोट देकर अपना आशीर्वाद प्रदान करे।
author: narendramodi

text:
What did Congress do for the promotion of Khadi?

We are working to make Khadi popular worldwide. 

Now, when the Khadi Jacket is again popular and people call it a ‘Modi Jacket’ the Congress has a problem. Reason is their hatred towards me.
author: narendramodi

text:
नामदार को कांग्रेस के नेताओं का ही नाम नहीं मालूम। 

एक माने हुए नेता कुंभाराम जी कैसे कुंभकरण बन गए, नामदार ही जाने। 

और जो कुंभकरण के गीत गाते हैं, सरकार में भी सोते ही रहेंगे।
author: narendramodi

text:
मैंने देशवासियों से वादा किया था कि भ्रष्टाचारियों को छोड़ा नहीं जाएगा। 

VVIP हेलिकॉप्टर घोटाले का एक बड़ा राजदार अब भारत में है। 

राजदार राज खोलेगा और पता नहीं बात कितनी दूर तक पहुंचेगी।
author: narendramodi

text:
करोड़ों की हेराफेरी करने वाले आज जमानत पर हैं… इसीलिए उनका गुस्सा मोदी पर रहता है और वो मोदी को दिन-रात अपशब्द कहते रहते हैं। 

पर राजस्थान ऐसे जमानती लोगों पर विश्वास नहीं करेगा।
author: narendramodi

text:
मैंने लोगों से पूछा भारत में जाति का भेद, गांव-शहर का भेद, अमीर-गरीब का भेद किसने किया?

एक स्वर में सैकड़ों लोगों ने कहा…
author: narendramodi

text:
Sumerpur is for development.

Sumerpur is with BJP.
author: narendramodi

text: Dausa is clearly with @BJP4Rajasthan. Watch my speech at the huge rally.
author: narendramodi

text: Sumerpur is with @BJP4Rajasthan. Here is my speech at the rally.
author: narendramodi

text: India is proud of our scientists, who keep innovating and setting high standards of scale, achievements and succcess. Their remarkable work inspires every Indian. @isro
author: narendramodi

text:
A major milestone for our space programme, which will transform the lives of crores of Indians by connecting remote areas! 

Congrats to @isro for the successful launch of GSAT-11, which is the heaviest, largest and most-advanced high throughput communication satellite of India.
author: narendramodi

text: Here are pictures from the rally in Jaipur. @BJP4Rajasthan
author: narendramodi

text:
आज नामदार ने फतवा जारी किया – मोदी और भारत माता के लाखों-करोड़ों बेटे-बेटियों को भारत माता की जय बोलने का हक नहीं है। 

लाखों लोगों के सामने नामदार के फतवे को चूर-चूर किया और एक नहीं, दस बार भारत माता की जय बोला। 

नामदार, आप होते कौन हो, जो हमसे ये अधिकार छीनने का पाप कर रहे हो?
author: narendramodi

text:
मैडम की रिमोट कंट्रोल सरकार ने, 2008 से 2014 तक अपने उद्योगपति दोस्तों को बहुत ज्यादा कर्जा दिया, बैंकों को बर्बाद कर दिया।
 
राजस्थान कैसे भूल सकता है, एक घाटे वाली स्टील कंपनी को नामदार के टेलीफोन से हजारो रुपये का कर्ज मिला, फर्जी कंपनी बनी, किसानों की जमीन छिनी।
author: narendramodi

text: Sikar and Jhunjhunu have made remarkable progress in furthering the empowerment of women. I congratulate the Nari Shakti of this land and appreciate the Rajasthan Government for giving topmost importance to ‘Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao.’
author: narendramodi

text: Great atmosphere at the rally in Jaipur. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
जब सर्जिकल स्ट्राइक हुई तब ऐसा लगा कांग्रेस में शोक सभा चल रही थी।
 
उनको गर्व ही नहीं कि हमारे जवानों ने दुश्मन के दांत खट्टे कर दिए।
author: narendramodi

text: कांग्रेस ने राजस्थान में इतने साल शासन किया पर किसानों को पानी पहुंचाने के लिए कोई मेहनत नहीं की।
author: narendramodi

text:
जनता के आशीर्वाद से हमें ये सौभाग्य मिला कि गुरु नानक देव जी से जुड़े करतारपुर कॉरिडोर को लेकर हम बड़ा फैसला ले पाए। 

बाकी, कांग्रेस के पास विभाजन की राजनीति के अलावा कुछ करने का टाइम ही नहीं है।
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you Hanumangarh for the amazing response. @BJP4Rajasthan
author: narendramodi

text: These pictures from Sikar speak for themselves. Look at the support for BJP! People trust the Party’s development agenda. @BJP4Rajasthan
author: narendramodi

text: Coming to Sikar is special. People here have always supported @BJP4Rajasthan. Watch my speech.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a massive rally in Hanumangarh. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Navy Day greetings to all valorous personnel of the Indian Navy and their families. India is grateful to our Navy for protecting the nation and the commendable role the Navy plays during disaster relief.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you Hyderabad for the immense support! @BJP4Telangana
author: narendramodi

text: The NDA Government at the Centre is working to provide quality housing to the poorest of the poor but the Telangana Government has no desire to work on ensuring the poor get homes.
author: narendramodi

text:
The great members of our Constituent Assembly did not support the idea of Minority Reservations. Yet, parties in Telangana are promising it.

Not only is it illegal, it also makes me wonder- are these parties going to do injustice to SCs, STs and OBCs? They must answer.
author: narendramodi

text:
KCR Garu started with the Youth Congress.

He dutifully served under Chandrababu Naidu Garu. 

He became a Central Minister thanks to Congress. 

So, who is whose A, B and C teams?
author: narendramodi

text:
The same Congress leaders who are calling TRS the BJP’s B-team were calling JD(S) the BJP’s B-team in Karnataka, only to stitch an opportunist alliance with them after the results. 

Congress and TRS are one. Both are only interested in family politics.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress- dynasty

TRS- dynasty 

TDP- dynasty 

AIMIM- dynasty 

These parties only care about the interests of their respective families. 

BJP cares about the people of Telangana and their wellbeing.
author: narendramodi

text: Hello Hyderabad! Delighted to be among the people of this great city. Watch my speech.
author: narendramodi

text:
తెలంగాణ ప్రజలు తెరాస అస్తవ్యస్తమైన పరిపాలనతో బాగా విసిగి పోయారు.. 
కాంగ్రెసు - తెదేపా ల అవకాశవాద కలయిక మీద తెలంగాణ ప్రజలకు నమ్మకం లేదు... 
అందుకే తెలంగాణ అభివృద్ధి కోసం పాటుపడే భాజపా, తెలంగాణ ప్రజలందరి ఆశీస్సులను కోరుకొంటోంది @BJP4Telangana
author: narendramodi

text: మన దేశంలోని మహా నగరాల్లో ఎంతో చైతన్యం కలిగిన నగరం హైదరాబాద్. అందుకే ఈ రోజు సాయంత్రం ర్యాలీలో మీ అందరినీ కలవడానికి నేను చాలా ఆసక్తిగా ఎదురుచూస్తున్నాను. "నరేంద్ర మోడీ మొబైల్ యాప్" లో లైవ్ ప్రోగ్రాం చూడండి...  @BJP4Telangana
author: narendramodi

text:
If there is one party that has caused and furthered agrarian distress in India, it is Congress. 

Congress took away the land of farmers and their ‘telephone banking’ ensured favourable loans to their industrialist friends. 

We are fighting this and will continue doing so.
author: narendramodi

text:
गुलाब का फूल लगाकर घूमने वाले लोग बगीचे तो जानते थे, पर खेत-खलिहानों का कोई ज्ञान नहीं था। 

भाजपा की सरकारों ने किसान कल्याण के लिए अनेक कदम उठाए हैं।
author: narendramodi

text: Tourism enhances economic prosperity. The Central Government and the Rajasthan Government have undertaken pioneering steps to make Rajasthan attractive for tourists.
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस विकास की बात तो करती नहीं है, अब वो कहती है – मोदी हिंदू धर्म के बारे में कितना जानते हैं। क्या ये चुनावी मुद्दा होना चाहिए? 

और वैसे भी, सोमनाथ मंदिर का विरोध करने से लेकर सुप्रीम कोर्ट में भगवान श्रीराम को काल्पनिक बताने तक, कांग्रेस का चरित्र जनता बखूबी जानती है।
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस झूठ फैलाने की यूनिवर्सिटी बन गई है।

कांग्रेस में जितना झूठ बोलो, उतना बड़ा पद मिलता है।

कांग्रेस की विकास में कोई रुचि ही नहीं है।
author: narendramodi

text: Immense fervour at the rally in Jodhpur. @BJP4Rajasthan
author: narendramodi

text: जोधपुर में विशाल जनसभा को संबोधित कर रहा हूं। देखिए...
author: narendramodi

text: देश के प्रथम राष्ट्रपति भारत रत्न डॉ. राजेन्द्र प्रसाद को उनकी जयंती पर कोटि-कोटि नमन।अप्रतिम प्रतिभा के धनी एवं सादा जीवन-उच्च विचार के प्रतीक राजेन्द्र बाबू देशवासियों के लिए सदा प्रेरणास्रोत रहेंगे।
author: narendramodi

text: My friend, PM @netanyahu, Happy Hanukkah to you and the people of Israel. May this special occasion further the spirit of brightness and happiness. May everybody be healthy and prosperous.
author: narendramodi

text:
חברי היקר PM @Netanyahu, חג חנוכה שמח לך ולכל עם ישראל. מי יתן ומאורע מיוחד זה יביא יותר את הבהירות והשמחה מאוד.
מי יתן וכולם יהיו בריאים ומשגשגים.
author: narendramodi

text: Birthday greetings to my colleague Shri @JPNadda ji. Known for his down to earth nature, he is working hard to ensure the poor have access to top quality and affordable healthcare. I pray for his long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text: In 2022 India completes 75 years since Independence. In that special year, India looks forward to welcoming the world to the G-20 Summit! Come to India, the world's fastest growing large economy! Know India’s rich history and diversity, and experience the warm Indian hospitality.
author: narendramodi

text: Had an excellent meeting with President @EmmanuelMacron. We had wide ranging discussions on ways to deepen and diversify the India-France strategic partnership, particularly by enhancing trade and people-to-people ties.
author: narendramodi

text: J'ai eu une excellente rencontre avec le Président @EmmanuelMacron. Nous avons eu de bonnes discussions sur les moyens d'approfondir et diversifier le partenariat stratégique, en particulier en augmentant des échanges commerciaux et humains.
author: narendramodi

text:
Impossible to come to Argentina and not think about football. Argentinian players are tremendously popular in India. 

Today, received this jersey from @FIFAcom President Gianni Infantino. I thank him for the kind gesture.
author: narendramodi

text:
Meeting a valued friend from the Caribbean. 

PM @AndrewHolnessJM and I discussed sectors such as energy and climate change during our interaction. We look forward to closer ties with Jamaica.
author: narendramodi

text: Excellent meeting with PM @sanchezcastejon. There is great potential in India-Spain cooperation, particularly in areas relating to @makeinindia and urban development. We also discussed avenues to deepen cultural ties between our nations.
author: narendramodi

text: Abordamos asimismo las posibilidades de profundizar los lazos culturales entre nuestros países.
author: narendramodi

text: Excelente reunión con el Presidente del Gobierno de España @sanchezcastejon. La cooperación India-España tiene un enorme potencial, especialmente en los sectores relacionados con @makeinindia y el desarrollo urbano.
author: narendramodi

text: The upcoming visit of President @CyrilRamaphosa, and that too during the special occasion of India's Republic Day will further cement business and people-to-people ties between India and South Africa.
author: narendramodi

text: Glad to have met President @CyrilRamaphosa. At a time when India is marking the 150th birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi, it is our honour to welcome President Ramaphosa as the Chief Guest for the 2019 Republic Day celebrations. Bapu's close link with South Africa is well known.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to meet my friend, @MinPres Mark Rutte. Our talks today focussed on boosting economic and cultural ties between India and the Netherlands.
author: narendramodi

text: Blij mijn vriend @MinPres Mark Rutte te ontmoeten. Onze gesprekken van vandaag waren gericht op het stimuleren van economische en culturele relaties tussen India en Nederland.
author: narendramodi

text: Met Chancellor Merkel at Buenos Aires. We reviewed the full range of relations between India and Germany. Our countries are cooperating extensively for the benefit of our citizens and working together towards world peace as well as stability.
author: narendramodi

text: Bundeskanzlerin Merkel und ich trafen uns in Buenos Aires,wo wir über das gesamte Spektrum der Beziehungen zwischen Indien & Deutschland gesprochen haben.Unsere Länder arbeiten zum Wohle unserer Bürger umfassend zusammen & arbeiten gemeinsam für den Weltfrieden und die Stabilität
author: narendramodi

text:
A wonderful interaction with President of @EU_Commission, @JunckerEU & @eucopresident Donald Tusk. 

Our talks revolved around enhancing friendship between India and EU. We also discussed aspects relating to eliminating the menace of terrorism.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had a productive meeting with President @mauriciomacri. We had extensive discussions on ways to strengthen bilateral relations between India and Argentina. 

Also thanked President Macri for hosting a wonderful G-20 Summit. 

Look forward to welcome him in India soon.
author: narendramodi

text: Asimismo, le agradecí a Presidente Macri por organizar una excelente Cumbre del G20. Espero con gran interés darle la bienvenida pronto en la India.
author: narendramodi

text: Mantuve una reunión fructífera con Presidente @mauriciomacri. Hablamos en profundidad sobre las distintas  maneras de fortalecer la relación bilateral entre la India y Argentina.
author: narendramodi

text: Former President George H. W. Bush was passionate about strong relations between India and USA. His presence will be sorely missed. May he rest in peace.
author: narendramodi

text: Condolences to the Bush family and the people of USA on the passing away of former President George H .W. Bush. He was a leading statesman at a critical period of world history.
author: narendramodi

text: Statehood Day greetings to the people of Nagaland. I pray that Nagaland scales new heights of development and the aspirations of the state’s citizens are fulfilled.
author: narendramodi

text:
Striking at the root of economic malpractices for a better future. 

During the second session at G-20 Summit, which focused on international trade, financial and tax systems, I presented a 9-point programme on ways to take stringent action against fugitive economic offenders.
author: narendramodi

text:
Excellent meeting of the RIC (Russia, India, China) Trilateral. 

President Putin, President Xi Jinping and I discussed a wide range of subjects that would further cement the friendship between our nations and enhance world peace.
author: narendramodi

text:
JAI (Japan, America, India) trilateral marks the coming together of three friendly nations. 

Today's historic JAI meeting was a great beginning. PM @AbeShinzo, @POTUS and I held fruitful talks aimed at furthering connectivity, maritime cooperation and a stable Indo-Pacific.
author: narendramodi

text: Esto constituye buenos augurios para las personas de nuestros países.
author: narendramodi

text: Encantado de reunirme con Presidente @sebastianpinera. Chile es nuestro socio valioso en América Latina. Existe un gran potencial para ampliar nuestra cooperación en los ámbitos del comercio, la agricultura, la energía, así como la ciencia y la tecnología.
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted to meet President @sebastianpinera. Chile is a valued partner in Latin America. There is a strong potential to deepen partnership in areas such as trade, agriculture, energy, healthcare as well as science and technology. This augurs well for the people of our nations.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressed the first session of the G-20 Summit. Shared my views on the need to focus on empowerment of women, ways to boost economic growth and highlighted India's efforts such as Jan Dhan Yojana, Mudra Yojana and Start up India that are aimed at furthering all-round development.
author: narendramodi

text: The G-20 Family.
author: narendramodi

text: Gratitude to President @mauriciomacri for hosting the G-20 Summit in Argentina. This is an important platform that brings together leading economies of the world to discuss matters that enhance sustainable development. @g20org
author: narendramodi

text: 阿根廷G-20峰会期间与习近平主席进行了良好的会见，就广泛的双边和国际问题进行了讨论。我跟习近平主席的进场会见加强了印中关系。
author: narendramodi

text:
Had a wonderful meeting with President Xi Jinping on the sidelines of the G-20 Summit in Argentina. 

The talks revolved around a wide range of bilateral and global subjects. 

Our regular interactions have added significant strength to India-China ties.
author: narendramodi

text: At the meeting with BRICS leaders, reaffirmed India's commitment to multilateralism and discussed issues such as the role of BRICS in the new industrial revolution, ways to deepen political exchanges and cooperation in fighting terrorism.
author: narendramodi

text:
BRICS is a global growth engine. Together, the BRICS family consists of 42% of the Earth's population. Thus, the progress of BRICS nations is vital for the progress of humanity. 

In Buenos Aires, we had a very good meeting of BRICS leaders, where several issues were discussed.
author: narendramodi

text:
Excellent meeting with Mr. @antonioguterres, @UN Secretary-General. 

There were wide-ranging deliberations on various global issues. 

We talked about mitigating climate change and India’s efforts in this regard through initiatives like the International Solar Alliance.
author: narendramodi

text:
Talked about the vibrant India-Argentina friendship and how people in India are admirers of Argentina’s culture as well as their accomplishments in sports. 

Also invited the Indian diaspora and the people of Argentina for the 2019 PBD in Kashi and the Kumbh in Prayagraj.
author: narendramodi

text:
The ‘Yoga For Peace’ programme in Buenos Aires was special. 

Glad to see the immense popularity of Yoga among the people, especially the youth, of Argentina. 

Talked about how Yoga is a means to wellness and brings societies together.
author: narendramodi

text: Had a fruitful interaction with Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman Al Saud. We discussed multiple aspects of India-Saudi Arabia relations and ways to further boost economic, cultural and energy ties.
author: narendramodi

text: Yoga - connecting humanity. Addressing the 'Yoga For Peace' programme in Argentina.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thousands of kilometres apart, yet bound together by the spirit of oneness! 

Extremely grateful to the Indian community for the memorable welcome in Argentina.
author: narendramodi

text: Looking forward to a wide range of interactions at the G-20 Summit, aimed at furthering sustainable development.
author: narendramodi

text:
A fantastic start for the Indian Hockey team! 

Congratulations to our team for an impressive win against South Africa in their opening match at the World Cup in Odisha. 

Best wishes for the upcoming games. @TheHockeyIndia #HWC2018
author: narendramodi
