text: Tremendous support for BJP in Bharatpur.
author: narendramodi

text:
हमारी भ्रष्टाचार की लड़ाई से नामदार बहुत दुखी हैं। 

जिनके मलाई खाने के रास्ते बंद हुए हैं, वो मोदी मुर्दाबाद कहेंगे ही, मेरे माता-पिता को गाली देंगे ही, मेरी जाति पर अभद्र टिप्पणी करेंगे ही।
author: narendramodi

text: हमारा संकल्प – कोई भारतीय बेघर नहीं रहेगा।
author: narendramodi

text: I compliment the Rajasthan Government and CM Vasundhara Ji for the excellent work done to improve irrigation infrastructure across the state.
author: narendramodi

text:
हमलोग सब कामदार हैं। हम सोने के चम्मच लेकर पैदा नहीं हुए हैं। 

मैं आपका आशीर्वाद लेने आया हूं। हम सामान्य मानवी के जीवन में सकारात्मक बदलाव लाना चाहते हैं।
author: narendramodi

text: भाजपा की सरकारें जहां भी हैं, ‘सबका साथ सबका विकास’ के मंत्र को लेकर गरीबों की सेवा करती हैं।
author: narendramodi

text: Sharing glimpses from the public meeting at Nagaur. @BJP4Rajasthan
author: narendramodi

text: Rajasthan is firmly with BJP. Watch the speech at the rally in Bharatpur.
author: narendramodi

text: शौर्य एवं पराक्रम की धरती नागौर में विशाल जनसभा को संबोधित कर रहा हूं। देखिए...
author: narendramodi

text: The affection for BJP in Rajasthan is immense. Today I look forward to being among the people of Nagaur and Bharatpur. Watch the rallies live on the ‘Narendra Modi Mobile App.’ @BJP4Rajasthan
author: narendramodi

text: आज मध्य प्रदेश में मतदान का दिन है। प्रदेश के सभी मतदाताओं से मेरा आग्रह है कि वे पूरे उत्साह के साथ लोकतंत्र के महापर्व में भाग लें और भारी संख्या में मतदान करें।
author: narendramodi

text: I request my sisters and brothers of Mizoram, particularly the dynamic youth of the state, to turnout in large numbers and vote.
author: narendramodi

text: There would also be bilateral meetings with world leaders on the sidelines of the G-20 Summit. These meetings are wonderful forums to exchange views on bilateral matters of mutual interest. @g20org
author: narendramodi

text: G-20 has made commendable efforts to promote cooperation among leading global economies. India's contribution to global economic growth and prosperity underlines our commitment to “Building Consensus for Fair and Sustainable Development”, which is the theme of the Summit.
author: narendramodi

text: I would be taking part in the G-20 Summit in Argentina from 29th November to 1st December. During the Summit, important issues relating to sustainable development, the global economy, women empowerment would be discussed. http://nm-4.com/up46  @g20org
author: narendramodi

text: Pictures from today's rally in Mahabubnagar.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress and TRS have no right to talk about the welfare of farmers. 

It is the BJP that has worked assiduously towards ensuring prosperity of our industrious farmers.
author: narendramodi

text: The people of Telangana are anguished by the misgovernance of TRS.
author: narendramodi

text:
Telangana Government has failed to deliver on its promises! 

Why is the State Government casual about providing proper housing facilities to the poor?
author: narendramodi

text:
Thankful to the people of Nizamabad for joining today's rally. 

There is a friendly fight between Congress and TRS. After all, KCR Garu has happily worked with Madam. He is also inspired by the Congress and promotes dynasty politics.

Only BJP can solve Telangana’s problems.
author: narendramodi

text:
కాంగ్రెసు మరియు తెరాస ల మధ్య స్నేహ పూర్వక పోటీ ఉంది... 
కె. సి. ఆర్ గారికి మేడంగారి క్రింద పని చేయమంటే చాలా ఆనందం 

భారతీయ జనతా పార్టీ ఒక్కటే తెలంగాణ సమస్యలన్నింటినీ పరిష్కరించగలదు ...
author: narendramodi

text:
BJP’s Mantra is- Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas. 

We want to serve all sections of Telangana’s society. 

అందరితో కలసి ... అందరి అభివృద్ధి - అన్నది భారతీయ జనతా పార్టీ మంత్రము 

తెలంగాణలో ఉన్న అన్ని వర్గాల వారికి సేవ చెయ్యడమే మా ప్రధాన లక్ష్యం
author: narendramodi

text:
తెలంగాణా ముఖ్యమంత్రికి తన మీద, తన పని మీద నమ్మకం లేదు...రానురాను మూఢనమ్మకంతో జీవిస్తున్నారు... 

ఆయుష్మాన్ భారత్ కార్యక్రమాన్ని రాష్ట్రంలో అమలు చేయకుండా పేదప్రజలకు ఎంతో అన్యాయం చేస్తున్నారు...
author: narendramodi

text:
కాంగ్రెసు వంశపారంపర్యంగా అభివృద్ధి చెందింది కాబట్టి తను కూడా అలాగే తన కుటుంబాన్ని అభివృద్ధి చేసుకొని వారసత్వ పాలనను తెలంగాణా పై రుద్దవచ్చు అనుకొంటున్నాడు 

... కాని ఆయనకు బాధాకరమైన అంశమేమంటే ఇప్పుడు కాలం మారింది...!
author: narendramodi

text:
తెలంగాణా ముఖ్యమంత్రి కాంగ్రెసు పార్టీ ద్వారా చాలా స్ఫూర్తిని పొందారు... 

ఆయన ఏ భ్రమలో ఉన్నారంటే - అసలు ఏం పని చేయకపోయినా కాంగ్రెసు ఎన్నోసార్లు గెలిచింది కాబట్టి తను కూడా ఏ పని చేయకపోయినా గెలవవచ్చునని అనుకుంటున్నారు...
author: narendramodi

text: A warm welcome and best wishes to all teams participating in the Hockey Men's World Cup 2018, being held in Odisha. I am sure this tournament will be a treat for sports lovers and will also be an opportunity to discover India’s and especially Odisha’s culture. @FIH_Hockey
author: narendramodi

text: Watch my speech at the rally in Mahabubnagar.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to be in Telangana. Addressing a public meeting in Nizamabad. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Dear sisters and brothers of Telangana, I am eagerly looking forward to being in your state today. I will address a rally in Nizamabad followed by one in Mahabubnagar. I seek your support and blessings for @BJP4Telangana in the coming polls. Watch the rallies on the NM Mobile App
author: narendramodi

text: రాబోయే ఎన్నికల్లో భారతీయ జనతా పార్టీ అఖండ విజయం సాధించడానికి మీ ఆదరాభిమానాలు, ఆశీస్సులను కోరుకుంటున్నాను... NM Mobile app ద్వారా ఈ ర్యాలీ  విశేషాలను నిరంతరం చూడండి @BJP4Telangana
author: narendramodi

text: నా ప్రియాతి ప్రియమైన తెలంగాణా సోదర సోదరీమణులారా!! ఇవాళ  మన  తెలంగాణా గడ్డ మీద అడుగుపెcట్టడానికి ఎంతో ఆసక్తిగా,  ఎదురు చూస్తున్నాను...  మొదటగా నేను నిజామాబాద్ ర్యాలీలో మాట్లాడిన తరువాత మహబూబ్ నగర్ లో మీతో నా భావాలు పంచుకొంటాను... @BJP4Telangana
author: narendramodi

text:
Your vote matters! 

Here is why your vote is precious and powerful.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressed a rally in Kota. In Rajasthan, BJP is drawing phenomenal support from all sections of society. Youngsters feel if there is one party that can further Rajasthan’s progress it is BJP. Congress works only for a privileged few, not to mention their record corruption.
author: narendramodi

text: Gratitude to the people for joining the public meeting in Beneshwar Dham in large numbers.
author: narendramodi

text: पिछले चार वर्षों में हमने सभी वर्गों के गरीब से गरीब व्यक्ति के सशक्तिकरण के लिए कार्य किया है।
author: narendramodi

text:
There is a reason state after state, people have rejected the once mighty Congress.

Congress' arrogance combined with their colossal misgovernance has angered people.
author: narendramodi

text:
मैंने वादा किया था कि मैं रात-दिन देश सेवा में लगा रहूंगा। 

जब मैंने लोगों से पूछा कि क्या मैंने अपना वादा निभाया है, देखिए उन्होंने क्या कहा -
author: narendramodi

text:
Rajasthan is a land closely associated with the Army. Several people from this state serve and protect the nation.

Congress' repeated insults towards the Army will not be appreciated by people of this land.
author: narendramodi

text:
डॉ. बाबासाहेब अंबेडकर ने समाज में भेदभाव खत्म करने की राह दिखाई।

लेकिन नामदार और उनके चेले मेरी जाति पूछते रहते हैं। 

पता नहीं क्यों कांग्रेस जात-पात पर चुनाव लड़ती है। 

मेरी जाति है - 130 करोड़ भारतीय।
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस के शासन में गैस के कनेक्शन के लिए कतारों में खड़ा रहना पड़ता था, बड़े लोगों से कूपन मांगनी पड़ती थी। 

आज 90% घरों तक गैस कनेक्शन पहुंच चुका है और इसका सबसे ज्यादा फायदा महिलाओं को हुआ है।
author: narendramodi

text:
Have a look at these pictures from Bhilwara. 

People of Rajasthan are reposing faith in the BJP. 

Pro-people policies of the state and Central Government have endeared the BJP to the citizens of the state. @BJP4Rajasthan @VasundharaBJP
author: narendramodi

text: भीलवाड़ा में एक विशाल जनसभा को संबोधित कर रहा हूं। देखिए...
author: narendramodi

text:
Rajasthan, the land of the brave and a land that is home to wonderful people calls once again! 

Will be campaigning in Bhilwara, Beneshwar Dham and Kota today. Will talk about @BJP4Rajasthan’s development agenda. 

Do watch these rallies on the NM Mobile App.
author: narendramodi

text:
On Constitution Day we recall with pride the stellar contribution of the greats who served in our Constituent Assembly. We are proud of our Constitution and reiterate our commitment to uphold the values enshrined in it. 

Here is what I said during yesterday’s #MannKiBaat.
author: narendramodi

text:
Tributes to those who lost their lives in the gruesome 26/11 terror attacks in Mumbai. 

Our solidarity with the bereaved families. 

A grateful nation bows to our brave police and security forces who valiantly fought the terrorists during the Mumbai attacks.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy that you enjoyed your Kashi visit and witnessed the city's transformation! @AnilKapoor
author: narendramodi

text: Care for the environment is a part of our culture and ethos. India is ready to do everything possible for a cleaner and greener tomorrow.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress ignored the Northeast, despite receiving people's support for years. 

There is lot of work to be done in Mizoram and BJP is committed to serving the great people of Mizoram and fulfilling their dreams. @BJP4Mizoram
author: narendramodi

text: Yes, the Ujjwala Yojana has furthered women empowerment, especially helping women from poorer sections of society.
author: narendramodi

text: There’s an interesting quiz on the NM Mobile App, based on #MannKiBaat50. Do take part.
author: narendramodi

text:
इस बार:
 
ना दरबारी, 

ना राजा, 

ना महाराज,

इस बार फिर से शिवराज। @ChouhanShivraj
author: narendramodi

text:
Addressed a massive rally in Jabalpur. I have travelled across Madhya Pradesh in the last few days and I see strong support for @BJP4MP. 

The state has immense trust in the leadership of @ChouhanShivraj Ji. 

Memories of Congress misrule still haunt the people of M.P.
author: narendramodi

text: Do watch this programme. #MannKiBaat50
author: narendramodi

text: Glimpses from the rally in Vidisha, Madhya Pradesh. @BJP4MP
author: narendramodi

text:
आओ, विकास की स्पर्धा करें। 

कोई भी क्षेत्र ले लीजिए, शिवराज जी का काम कांग्रेस के काम से बहुत उत्तम है। 

यही कारण है कि अपना कुशासन छिपाने के लिए कांग्रेस के भूतपूर्व मुख्यमंत्री प्रचार ही नहीं करते।
author: narendramodi

text: भाजपा की सारी सरकारें किसान कल्याण के लिए प्रतिबद्ध हैं।
author: narendramodi

text:
मेरे पिताजी 30 साल पहले दुनिया छोड़कर चले गए। 

मेरे परिवार में किसी का राजनीति से कोई संबंध नहीं है।

फिर भी कांग्रेस के नामदार मेरे परिवार के बारे में अभद्र टिप्पणी करने से नहीं रुकते।
author: narendramodi

text:
New tricks of the Congress:

Send lawyers to the Rajya Sabha.

Obstruct key legislation.

Armtwist the courts. 

And, if a Judge does not give verdicts they like then bully them with impeachment threats. 

Congress’ black deeds will not succeed till I am here.
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस का अहंकार है कि वो लोकतंत्र स्वीकार ही नहीं करती। 

उसकी सोच है कि गद्दी सिर्फ एक ही परिवार को मिल सकती है।
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस जातिवाद में डूबी हुई है। 

गरीब, पीड़ित, शोषित और वंचित समाजजनों से कांग्रेस नफरत करती है।
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress strategy for the elections:

Abuse my Mother.

Make indecent comments about my caste.

The character of the Congress is anti-backward. No wonder some of the most horrific instances of violence against Dalits, OBCs have happened when Congress is in power.
author: narendramodi

text:
रामानंद जी कहते थे – जो हरि को भजै, सो हरि का होई।

उसी तरह – जो जनता को भजै, सो जनता का होई।

जो भारत को भजै, सो भारत का होई।

हम भाजपा के कार्यकर्ता 130 करोड़ भारतीयों को भजते हैं, हम उनकी सेवा करना चाहते हैं।
author: narendramodi

text:
अलवर की जनता को कोटि-कोटि धन्यवाद।

आज का जनसैलाब दिखाता है कि भाजपा ही राजस्थान की पसंद है। @BJP4Rajasthan
author: narendramodi

text: All over MP there is phenomenal affection for BJP. Jabalpur wants BJP yet again! Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: The bond between Vidisha and BJP is very strong. Addressing a rally here.
author: narendramodi

text:
A tea seller in a remote area in Himachal Pradesh and the power of the radio. 

Know what convinced me about the importance of the radio in our nation, back in 1998! #MannKiBaat50
author: narendramodi

text:
'Mann Ki Baat' is about the inherent strength of our society. It is about the power of collective efforts to bring a positive change in India. 

One of the listeners asked me how has this medium remained apolitical. Here is what I said. #MannKiBaat50
author: narendramodi

text: 'Mann Ki Baat' manifests the spirit of young and aspirational India, an India that will not easily accept status quo, an India that is at the forefront of innovation and vibrancy. #MannKiBaat50
author: narendramodi

text:
Someone asked me today- how much do you prepare before every episode.

My simple answer- nothing...because 'Mann Ki Baat' is the voice of 130 crore Indians. What is shared is their ideas and inputs. #MannKiBaat50
author: narendramodi

text: A big thank you to all those sisters and brothers from across the length and breadth of India who have been a part of the ‘Mann Ki Baat’ journey for the last 50 episodes. I look forward to more people enriching the platform with their participation. #MannKiBaat50
author: narendramodi

text:
Here is today’s special #MannKiBaat50 episode. 

This is a programme that has connected me with the people of India in a very special way.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to be in ‘Veerbhoomi’ Rajasthan. Speaking at a massive rally in Alwar. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: We complete 50 episodes of sharing happiness. Tune in to today’s #MannKiBaat50.
author: narendramodi

text: The 50th episode of ‘Mann Ki Baat’ begins soon. Hear it on all channels of Doordarshan and @AkashvaniAIR. The episode can also be heard on the ‘Narendra Modi Mobile App.’ #MannKiBaat50
author: narendramodi

text: Birthday greetings to Tripura’s young and dynamic CM Shri Biplab Deb. He has been working round the clock to transform Tripura and fulfill the aspirations of the state’s youth. I pray for his long life and best health. @BjpBiplab
author: narendramodi

text:
On 3rd October 2014, we began the journey of #MannKiBaat.

With your blessings, this journey completes 50 episodes tomorrow, of sharing joy, positivity and amplifying the power of collective efforts. 

I hope you will enthusiastically tune in tomorrow for the 50th episode.
author: narendramodi

text:
Those who are speculating about the elections in Madhya Pradesh from their comfortable rooms should come to Mandsaur and see the immense support for BJP! 

Madhya Pradesh is strongly with the BJP.
author: narendramodi

text:
BJP is a party for all sections of society, we want everyone's blessings.

Congress does not want votes of SC/ST communities, it only wants votes from one section of society. Congress wants to divide MP!
author: narendramodi

text: कांग्रेस और उसके साथियों ने बहुत माल खाया है। हमने इस लूट पर रोक लगाई है।
author: narendramodi

text:
वोट पाने के लिए कांग्रेस झूठे वादे और झूठे नारों की मदद ले रही है। 

चार पीढ़ी तक देश तो चलाया पर कोई वादा पूरा नहीं किया।
author: narendramodi

text:
मध्य प्रदेश के किसान भली-भांति जानते हैं, जब एमपी में कांग्रेस की सरकार थी और केंद्र में मैडम की रिमोट कंट्रोल वाली सरकार थी, तब कर्ज के लिए 15-16% ब्याज देना पड़ता था। 

यह भाजपा की सरकार है, जिसने स्थिति सुधारी।

उन्होंने किसानों को कर्जदार बनाया, हमने किसानों को मजबूत किया।
author: narendramodi

text:
The agriculture sector suffered during successive Congress regimes. 

Policies of the Congress are not farmer friendly. 

BJP is committed to the prosperity of our hardworking farmers.
author: narendramodi

text:
A proud moment for Indian sports. 

Congratulations to Mary Kom for winning a Gold in the Women’s World Boxing Championships. The diligence with which she’s pursued sports and excelled at the world stage is extremely inspiring. Her win is truly special. @MangteC
author: narendramodi

text: I appeal to my sisters and brothers of Mandsaur to bless BJP. We will work to fulfil their aspirations.
author: narendramodi

text:
Due to his hardwork and humility, Shivraj Ji is affectionately called ‘Mama’ by the youth of the state.

Congress has a problem with that. Because for them, such affection is reserved for the likes of Mr. Quattrocchi and Mr. Warren  Anderson.
author: narendramodi

text: भाजपा की सरकारें रिमोट कंट्रोल की सरकारें नहीं हैं। हमारा हाईकमान है 130 करोड़ भारतीय।
author: narendramodi

text:
It has been 15 years since MP comprehensively rejected the Congress and under BJP, the state has seen unparalleled growth. 

Days of Congress’ ‘divide and rule’ are over, now only the BJP’s development agenda strikes a chord with the people.
author: narendramodi

text:
Completing projects on time is not the interest of the Congress. Their interest lies in awarding contracts to known persons.

In the last few years, many projects of MP pending at the level of the Centre have been completed. This has benefitted the state's people.
author: narendramodi

text:
भ्रष्टाचार कांग्रेस का शिष्टाचार है।

कांग्रेस को मुझसे परेशानी यह है कि 4 पीढ़ियों का राज खत्म हो गया और आज सारी हेराफेरी बंद है, जमानत पर जिंदगी गुजारनी पड़ती है।
author: narendramodi

text:
नामदारों की चार पीढ़ी, चायवाले के चार साल – आओ तुलना करें, किसने कितना किया। 

लेकिन कांग्रेस के पास मुद्दे नहीं, कुसंस्कार भरे हैं और अहंकार सातवें आसमान पर है।

इसलिए, कांग्रेस अब मेरी मां को गाली देने पर आ गई।
author: narendramodi

text: In Chhatarpur to seek people’s support for BJP in the upcoming elections. Watch my speech.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, on the auspicious occasion of Shri Guru Nanak Dev Ji’ Jayanti, attended a programme at my colleague, Smt. @HarsimratBadal_ Ji’s residence. 

Over Kirtans, we all remembered the noble ideals and message of Shri Guru Nanak Dev Ji.
author: narendramodi

text: Unforgettable affection in Aizawl. I am grateful to the people of Mizoram and seek their blessings as well as support for BJP in the coming polls.
author: narendramodi

text:
It is impossible to come to Mizoram and not talk about sports, particularly football!

Mizoram is full of budding athletes, many of whom are playing in several tournaments. 

Talked about NDA Government’s efforts to promote sports and fitness.
author: narendramodi

text: The NDA Government is working hard to ensure housing for every Indian but the Mizoram Government does not support this endeavour. Why would a State Government want their own people to be homeless, I fail to understand.
author: narendramodi

text: The Mizoram Chief Minister has personally handled ministries relating to PWD and power but the state’s roads are of poor quality, the power situation is grim. Mizoram deserves better leadership.
author: narendramodi

text: Sadly, in Mizoram, Government contracts are only given if you are related to top Congress leaders. Such a work culture has slowed the development journey of the state.
author: narendramodi

text: In the last four years, more roads have been built in the Northeast, rail connectivity has improved significantly.  This will enhance ‘Ease of Living.’
author: narendramodi

text:
Our approach is- Act East and Act Fast for India’s East. 

Special attention is being devoted to ensure next-generation infrastructure for the people of Mizoram.
author: narendramodi

text:
The history and culture of Mizoram makes every Indian proud. 

Unfortunately, the Congress leaves no opportunity to mock the culture of our tribal communities, of Mizoram and of the Northeast. Congress will not be forgiven for doing so.
author: narendramodi

text: कार्तिक पूर्णिमा और देव दीपावली के पावन अवसर पर आप सभी को हार्दिक बधाई।इस अवसर पर गंगा स्नान और दीपदान की प्राचीन परंपरा रही है। मैं समस्त देशवासियों के समग्र कल्याण की कामना करता हूं।
author: narendramodi

text: Grateful to the people of Mizoram for the affection. Watch my speech.
author: narendramodi

text: Shri Guru Nanak Dev Ji taught us the path of truth, righteousness and compassion. He was committed towards eradicating injustice and inequality from society. He also believed in the power of education. We bow to him on his Jayanti and recall his inspiring thoughts.
author: narendramodi

text: The thoughts and ideals of Shri Guru Nanak Dev Ji inspire people all over the world. The Cabinet took crucial decisions towards celebrating his 550th Jayanti in a grand manner.
author: narendramodi

text: Bringing a positive difference in the lives of our Nari Shakti through clean energy.
author: narendramodi

text: We are increasing LNG terminals across India, focusing on a strong Nationwide Gas Grid and City Gas distribution networks.
author: narendramodi

text: Today, India takes a big leap towards clean energy. This will have a very positive impact on future generations.
author: narendramodi

text: India is committed to move towards cleaner fuel. Here is how.
author: narendramodi

text: मध्य प्रदेश के सतना में हुई दुर्घटना से गहरा दुख पहुंचा है। संकट की इस घड़ी में मेरी संवेदनाएं पीड़ित परिवारों के साथ हैं। हादसे में जो घायल हुए हैं, मैं उनके शीघ्र स्वस्थ होने की कामना करता हूं।
author: narendramodi

text: Uttarakhand once again supports BJP. I thank the people of the state for their continuous blessings, which have led to impressive wins for our Party in local body polls. I congratulate the local unit for their hardwork and efforts, which made the wins possible. @BJP4UK
author: narendramodi

text:
Trust young India to show the way!

Please give my regards to your daughter and my best wishes for her future endeavours. 

Like her, many youngsters are at the forefront of Swachh Bharat Mission.
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted to see this :)
author: narendramodi

text: Easier opportunities to do business augur well for young India, which is blessed with immense entrepreneurial energy.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you for the kind words. It is the #MannKiBaat of 130 crore Indians, I am merely sharing what they have said.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thank you. 

Do tune in this Sunday for the 50th episode and I hope you have filled the #MannKiBaat survey on MyGov or the NM Mobile App.
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings on Milad-Un-Nabi. We remember the noble teachings of the venerable Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon him) and pray that there is harmony, brotherhood and peace all around.
author: narendramodi

text: Had a wonderful interaction with noted cricket player Ravindrasinh Jadeja and his wife, Rivaba. @imjadeja
author: narendramodi

text: As #MannKiBaat completes 50 episodes, I request you to participate in a survey on aspects relating to the programme. Your insightful views will be highly beneficial.
author: narendramodi

text: I thank the people of Rewa, Madhya Pradesh for joining today's rally in large numbers. Glad to see several women and youngsters attend.
author: narendramodi

text:
मध्य प्रदेश में कांग्रेस का शासन और भाजपा का शासन… दोनों के काम की तुलना करें। 

हर क्षेत्र में भाजपा का काम उत्तम रहा है। कांग्रेस ने जनता की आशाओं के साथ खिलवाड़ किया।
author: narendramodi

text:
हमारी सरकार ने गरीबों के लिए आवास की समुचित सुविधाएं सुनिश्चित की हैं। तेज गति से पक्के मकान बनाए जा रहे हैं।

गरीबों को पक्का मकान मिले, क्या कांग्रेस इस दिशा में कभी सोच पाई?
author: narendramodi

text:
Look how the Karnataka Government is treating farmers. They are calling farmers ‘goons’ and harassing them. This is unacceptable! 

Congress, which is an integral part of the Government should stop talking about farmer welfare. Their actions show they do not care for farmers.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress institutionalised corruption in India.

It is high time Congress returns to the poor what they looted from them for decades.
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस के लिए विकास का मतलब – मिट्टी डालो और उसे रोड मानो।

अब मध्य प्रदेश का आदिवासी डामर की पक्की सड़क चाहता है, और उसे विश्वास है कि भाजपा ही उसकी आकांक्षाओं को पूरा करेगी।

आदिवासी क्षेत्रों में कनेक्टिविटी को बढ़ावा देने के लिए हम तेजी से कार्य कर रहे हैं।
author: narendramodi

text:
In the name of 'Loan Melas' the tribal communities were harassed and exploited. Congress allowed this to go on. 

Times have changed and the BJP has worked assiduously for the welfare of tribals, ensuring financial inclusion and economic empowerment.
author: narendramodi

text:
There is massive support for the BJP in Jhabua. 

People of this area have seen the good work of the MP Government for the last 15 years. 

They have also seen how the Congress failed to ensure progress for years, when the party was in power. @BJP4MP
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you Rewa for the support. @BJP4India is MP’s preferred choice. Sharing my speech.
author: narendramodi

text: छत्तीसगढ़ में आज दूसरे और अंतिम चरण का मतदान है। सभी मतदाताओं से मेरा निवेदन है कि वे पूरे उत्साह के साथ भारी संख्या में मतदान कर लोकतंत्र के महापर्व को सफल बनाएं।
author: narendramodi

text:
As a part of this effort, launched the 'Ease of Doing Business' Grand Challenge. 

The power of your ideas and latest technology will make India an even more attractive place to do business. Here are the details.
author: narendramodi

text:
India's strides in 'Ease of Doing Business' have drawn the attention of the world. We are seen as a bright spot globally.

While our rankings have improved significantly, we want to better them even further. For that, we seek your views.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had a fruitful interaction with industry representatives on a wide range of issues regarding the economy. 

We talked at length about India's reform trajectory, strides in 'Ease of Doing Business' and steps taken for MSME sector.
author: narendramodi

text: Today, on  Rani Lakshmibai's Jayanti, I am reminded of my gift to the Australian PM in 2014 that pertained to an interesting nugget from Rani Lakshmibai's life and a link with Australia.
author: narendramodi

text: Inaugurating key infra projects in Haryana, which will further ‘Ease of Living.’ Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
The movement for a cleaner India and ensuring better sanitation facilities is a people’s movement.

It is the 130 crore Indians, particularly women and youngsters who have taken the lead in this movement. 

I congratulate all those working to fulfil the dream of a Swachh Bharat.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, on World Toilet Day, we reiterate our commitment towards enhancing cleanliness and sanitation facilities across the nation. 

We in India take pride at the remarkable speed with which sanitation cover has increased in the last four years.
author: narendramodi

text: Rani Lakshmibai is a source of inspiration for every Indian. Her fortitude in the face of adversity and steadfast opposition to colonialism will never be forgotten. It is due to greats like her that India won freedom. Remembering her on her Jayanti.
author: narendramodi

text: Tributes to India's former Prime Minister, Mrs. Indira Gandhi Ji on her birth anniversary.
author: narendramodi

text: Congress is a confused Party, led by a confused leadership that cannot provide good governance to the people of Madhya Pradesh.
author: narendramodi

text: Madhya Pradesh knows how Shivraj Ji has served the state, despite the complete non-cooperation by the UPA for ten long years.
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस की काम करने की गति और हमारी गति, 

कांग्रेस की काम करने की दिशा और हमारी दिशा,

कांग्रेस की ‘बांटो और राज करो’ की सोच और हमारा ‘सबका साथ सबका विकास’ का मंत्र। 

फर्क साफ है।
author: narendramodi

text:
People in Madhya Pradesh have horrific memories of the Congress misrule, that ended 15 years ago. 

No wonder the Congress does not want the former Chief Minister in their midst to campaign for the party.
author: narendramodi

text: NDA's strong measures against corruption and black money have angered Congress and their eco-system, which is why they abuse me daily.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress' double standards are amusing. 

They talk about cow welfare in Madhya Pradesh, while their Party leaders in Kerala show disregard for the cow.
author: narendramodi

text:
In their desperation to win in Madhya Pradesh, Congress is giving tickets to people from all kinds of backgrounds. 

Why is the Congress creating a bad political culture in the state?
author: narendramodi

text: इंदौर जोश और उत्साह से भरा शहर है। यह व्यापार का एक ऐसा केंद्र है, जिसने स्वच्छता में अपनी एक विशेष पहचान बनाई है। इस शहर ने हमेशा भाजपा का समर्थन किया है। आज की रैली में मैंने इंदौरवासियों से एक बार फिर भाजपा को आशीर्वाद देने की अपील की।
author: narendramodi

text: आज छिंदवाड़ा में जनसभा को संबोधित किया। यहां के लोगों ने कांग्रेस में अपनी आस्था दिखाई, लेकिन कांग्रेस नेताओं ने छिंदवाड़ा की उपेक्षा कर देश के दूसरे हिस्सों में अपने व्यवसाय स्थापित करने को प्राथमिकता दी। अब छिंदवाड़ा के लोग कांग्रेस को उसके पापों की सजा देने जा रहे हैं।
author: narendramodi

text: Indore has always blessed BJP and I hope this wonderful city blessed us again. Speaking at a rally here.
author: narendramodi

text: Chhindwara is tired of Congress' false promises. They have faith in BJP. Here is my speech at the rally.
author: narendramodi

text:
Chhattisgarh Government under @drramansingh Ji was never treated properly by the remote controlled UPA Government. 

In the last five years, NDA Government at the Centre and the State Government here have worked together at a remarkable pace for the growth of Chhattisgarh.
author: narendramodi

text:
We are placing our faith in the youth of India. We are empowering them to become job creators and entrepreneurs. 

We opened the doors of banks for the poor while the Congress' 'telephone banking' created India's NPA mess.
author: narendramodi

text: कांग्रेस झूठे वादे करने में माहिर है, लेकिन असल में वह किसानों के कल्याण के लिए कुछ नहीं करती है। भारत के किसान कांग्रेस पर विश्वास करने वाले नहीं हैं।
author: narendramodi

text:
Make a person outside the Nehru-Gandhi the Congress Party President for five years and I will agree that Pandit Nehru made a 'Chaiwallah' the PM. 

India has not forgotten how a stalwart like Sitaram Kesri Ji was treated by one family.
author: narendramodi

text:
भाजपा सरकार पिछले 15 वर्षों से छत्तीसगढ़ में युवाओं के जीवन स्तर में सुधार के लिए परिश्रम कर रही है।

भाजपा ही छत्तीसगढ़ के युवाओं की आकांक्षाओं को पूर्ण कर सकती है।
author: narendramodi

text:
यह चुनाव छत्तीसगढ़ के लिए बहुत महत्वपूर्ण है। यह राज्य 18 वर्ष का हो चुका है और अगले पांच साल राज्य की प्रगति के लिए निर्णायक होंगे।

छत्तीसगढ़ के लोगों की भलाई के लिए मैं राज्य के लोगों से आग्रह करता हूं कि वे फिर से भाजपा को आशीर्वाद दें और सेवा करने का अवसर प्रदान करें।
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you Mahasamund for joining the BJP rally in large numbers. Here is my speech.
author: narendramodi

text: Had productive discussions with President @ibusolih.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congratulations to Mr. @ibusolih on taking oath as the President of the Maldives. 

Wishing him the very best for his tenure ahead. 

Looking forward to working with him to strengthen bilateral relations between our nations.
author: narendramodi

text:
Spoke to the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu, Thiru Edappadi K. Palaniswami regarding the situation arising due to cyclone conditions in the state. Assured all possible help from the Centre. 

I pray for the safety and well-being of the people of Tamil Nadu. @CMOTamilNadu
author: narendramodi

text: My thoughts are with the families of those who lost their lives due to cyclonic conditions in parts of Tamil Nadu. I pray for the quick recovery of those injured. Officials are working towards providing all possible assistance in the wake of the cyclone.
author: narendramodi

text:
In a different parts of the state, Congress speaks different languages. 

In Chhindwara they say someone is CM, in Gwalior they say someone else is CM. Do they think people are foolish?

Congress should answer who is their CM face in Madhya Pradesh!
author: narendramodi

text:
In Madhya Pradesh:

Over 50 years of Congress rule.

15 years of BJP serving the state.

Compare our work on any parameter. 

Governance under BJP is far better!
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress feels- 'it is either us or no one.' This party exists only for the welfare of one family.

That is why they disturbed all non-Congress Governments and never wanted stability.
author: narendramodi

text:
Gwalior has always given tremendous affection to the BJP. This is a land closely associated with Rajmata Scindia, who was humiliated by the Congress High Command. 

People of Gwalior will never support those who insulted Rajmata Scindia.
author: narendramodi

text: I will convey to the new Maldivian Government of Mr. Solih the desire of the Indian Government to work closely for realisation of their developmental priorities, especially in areas of infrastructure, health care, connectivity & human resource development. https://www.facebook.com/narendramodi/photos/a.10150164299700165/10161144554320165/?type=3&theater …
author: narendramodi

text: Recent elections in The Maldives represent the collective aspirations of the people for democracy, rule of law and a prosperous future. We in India strongly desire to see a stable, democratic, prosperous and peaceful Republic of Maldives.
author: narendramodi

text: I will be in Malé tomorrow to attend the historic Inauguration Ceremony of the President-elect H.E. Ibrahim Mohamed Solih. I warmly congratulate him on his victory in the recent elections and wish him the very best for his tenure.
author: narendramodi

text: बोलना कुछ, करना कुछ – यह कांग्रेस का तरीका है। जनता कांग्रेस के झूठ से परेशान है और कांग्रेस को स्वीकार करने को तैयार नहीं है।
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस ने दशकों तक गरीबों के नाम पर राजनीति की, वोट लिया पर काम नहीं किया। 

हमने चार सालों में गरीबों के जीवन में आमूलचूल परिवर्तन किया है।
author: narendramodi

text:
कांग्रेस को अभी भी हैरानी है कि एक चायवाला पीएम बन गया!

और, कांग्रेस की पीड़ा का कारण यह भी है कि चार पीढ़ियों ने जो जमा किया था, वो पैसा अब कुछ परिवारों के लिए नहीं, बल्कि जनता के विकास के लिए खर्च हो रहा है।
author: narendramodi

text: मध्य प्रदेश की जनता ने हमारा काम देखा है और इसलिए जनता का हम पर विश्वास है।
author: narendramodi

text:
शहडोल में जनसभा की कुछ तस्वीरें। 

मध्य प्रदेश ने @ChouhanShivraj जी के नेतृत्व में  पिछले 15 वर्षों  में अभूतपूर्व विकास देखा है। @BJP4MP
author: narendramodi

text:
The mood of Chhattisgarh is clear.

People have faith in @BJP4CGState, people trust the governance of @drramansingh Ji and that is why they want BJP again. 

Here are pictures from Ambikapur.
author: narendramodi

text:
From 2000 to 2003, what did the Congress do in MP and Chhattisgarh? Those who were serving as Chief Ministers during that period owe answers to the people.

Promises were broken, aspirations were unfulfilled. We can't allow these leaders or the Congress culture to return.
author: narendramodi

text:
In the name of making houses for the poor, Congress leaders filled their own pockets.

However, under @BJP4CGState things are different. We are not only building more houses but also enhancing the dignity of women through these houses.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress' sense of entitlement is legendary! 

Why is it that before every election they start making remarks about my poverty and background? 

Mocking the poor and referring to them pejoratively is the Congress way of doing things.
author: narendramodi

text:
When one comes to Chhattisgarh, one thinks about the statesmanship of Atal Ji, who created this state. 

Compare how amicably Atal Ji created three states, with the animosity and bitterness with which Congress divided Andhra Pradesh.
author: narendramodi

text: For the last 15 years, the @BJP4CGState Government, under the leadership of @drramansingh Ji has worked for the welfare of the state's poor and marginalised.
author: narendramodi

text: Madhya Pradesh supports BJP! Watch my speech at the rally in Gwalior.
author: narendramodi

text: I thank the people of Chhattisgarh for the affection. Addressing a rally in Ambikapur. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Want to share a message for the 50th #MannKiBaat programme? You can do so by calling on 1800-11-7800. 

Inputs for the programme can also be shared on MyGov.
author: narendramodi

text:
This month’s #MannKiBaat on the 25th is special. It will be the 50th episode of the programme. 

It would be wonderful to hear from you all. Share your thoughts and ideas for the programme on the NM Mobile App.
author: narendramodi

text: Will be addressing rallies at Shahdol and Gwalior in Madhya Pradesh later today. I would be talking about the extensive work done by @BJP4MP over the last 15 years and will request the people to bless us once again.
author: narendramodi

text: Today, will address a public meeting in Chhattisgarh’s Ambikapur. Looking forward to being among the wonderful people of Chhattisgarh. @BJP4CGState
author: narendramodi

text: At the East Asia Summit in Singapore, I shared my thoughts on enhancing multilateral cooperation, economic and cultural ties among member nations. Also reiterated India's commitment to a peaceful and prosperous Pacific region.
author: narendramodi

text: Platforms like the Singapore-India Hackathon serve as excellent opportunities for our youngsters to showcase their work. They also serve as forums to learn about pioneering innovations by youngsters from other nations and institutes. A win-win for our students!
author: narendramodi

text:
A boost to technology, innovation and youth power. 

Happy to have met innovators who won prizes in the first ever Singapore-India Hackathon. They talked about their extensive work. I was impressed by their passion and commitment towards solving problems our world faces.
author: narendramodi

text:
Wonderful moments with my young friends.

Spent time with NCC cadets, who got the opportunity to come to Singapore as a part of a cadet exchange programme. They shared their memorable learnings and experiences with me.
author: narendramodi

text:
Cementing old bonds in pursuit of a glorious future. 

Had a great interaction with ASEAN leaders at the ASEAN-India Informal Breakfast Summit. We are happy that ties with ASEAN are strong and are contributing to a peaceful and prosperous planet. @ASEAN
author: narendramodi

text:
झारखंड के लोगों को राज्य के स्थापना दिवस की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं।

Greetings to the people of Jharkhand on their Statehood Day. 

With the blessings of Bhagwan Birsa Munda, may this state scale new heights of growth and glory in the coming years.
author: narendramodi

text: Glad to have met everyone at the dynamic India pavilion. My best wishes to all Indian youngsters associated with the Fintech sector.
author: narendramodi

text: Our work in Fintech has delivered outstanding results, especially for the welfare of the poor.
author: narendramodi

text: India is making remarkable strides in Fintech thanks to our youth and I am sure this is going to continue in the years to come.
author: narendramodi

text: All of this is inspired by the commitment to bring a qualitative difference in the lives of 130 crore Indians.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you.
author: narendramodi

text: Correctly pointed. The infra push in the last four years has added immense speed to Varanasi's growth.
author: narendramodi

text: Kashi is closely linked with India's ancient culture. How can we not work on this city's development?
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted to have met you in Singapore, @VP Mike Pence. India and USA are time tested friends, who are cooperating on several subjects. Our talks today will further enhance the strong relations between our countries.
author: narendramodi

text:
India-Thailand ties are built on the foundations of a shared cultural heritage. We consider Thailand to be one of our most valued partners.

General Prayut Chan-o-cha and I had an excellent meeting, in which we discussed multiple avenues of India-Thailand cooperation.
author: narendramodi

text: PM @ScottMorrisonMP and I reviewed the full range of ties between India and Australia. We spoke about ways to enhance economic, cultural and security ties between our nations.
author: narendramodi

text: The satellite will provide communication and internet services to the remotest corners of our country. @isro
author: narendramodi

text: My heartiest congratulations to our scientists on the successful launch of GSLV MK III-D2 carrying GSAT-29 satellite. The double success sets a new record of putting the heaviest satellite in orbit by an Indian launch vehicle. @isro
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy to have met PM @leehsienloong in Singapore. 

We had fruitful talks on deeper India-Singapore friendship as well as how India-ASEAN relations contribute to peace and prosperity in the region.
author: narendramodi

text: Glimpses from the Singapore Fintech Festival, including the visit to the India Pavilion.
author: narendramodi

text: The way ahead for the Fintech Sector.
author: narendramodi

text: In India, Fintech is driving enterprise, employment and prosperity.
author: narendramodi

text:
India's efforts towards digitisation are successful because the payment products cater to all sections of society. 

Digital payments are increasing rapidly and so is efficiency as well as transparency.
author: narendramodi

text:
We live in an age where technology is bringing historic transitions. 

In India, technology has helped ensure better service delivery.
author: narendramodi

text: The Singapore Fintech Festival celebrates the power of belief and showcases the wide range of opportunities in the Fintech world.
author: narendramodi

text: Honoured to deliver the keynote address at the Singapore Fintech Festival. Watch my speech.
author: narendramodi

text: Remembering our first Prime Minister, Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru on his birth anniversary. We recall his contribution to our freedom struggle and during his tenure as Prime Minister.
author: narendramodi

text: Extremely touched by the affection of the Indian community in Singapore. Their warm welcome, so early in the morning amidst the rain, was touching. India’s diaspora makes our nation very proud. They have succeeded all over the world, in a wide range of areas.
author: narendramodi

text:
Delighted to meet you @jack! Happy to see the passion with which you’re leading @Twitter. 

I enjoy being on this medium, where I’ve made great friends and see everyday the creativity of people.
author: narendramodi

text: I will also interact with the participants and winners of the first ever joint India-Singapore Hackathon. This is a stupendous effort to promote a spirit of innovation among our youngsters and empower them to solve the major problems our planet faces.
author: narendramodi

text: At 7:45 AM IST tomorrow, I will be delivering the keynote address at the Singapore Fintech Festival. I would be talking about various issues relating to the sector. India’s prowess in the Fintech Sector will also be showcased during the festival. https://www.facebook.com/narendramodi/photos/a.10150164299700165/10161133835100165/?type=3&theater …
author: narendramodi

text: I will be in Singapore tomorrow and the day after to take part in the ASEAN-India, East Asia Summits as well as the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) Leaders' Meeting. India strongly values the close ties with ASEAN nations. This augurs well for our citizens.
author: narendramodi

text: महापर्व छठ के पावन अवसर पर आज अस्ताचलगामी सूर्य को अर्घ्य दिया जाएगा। सभी देशवासियों को हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं। सूर्य देव अपनी असीम ऊर्जा से हम सबके जीवन को प्रकाशवान एवं ऊर्जावान बनाएं।
author: narendramodi

text: In Bengaluru, I paid tributes to Shri Ananth Kumar Ji. We’ve lost an outstanding public servant, who had a positive impact on the lives of many. Also spent time with his family members.
author: narendramodi

text:
It is gladdening to see Kashi emerge as a textile hub, drawing people from all over the world. 

This also means the city needs better infrastructure, especially good quality roads, which we are working to provide.
author: narendramodi

text: Harnessing our waterways for progress and prosperity.
author: narendramodi

text: A special day in the development journey of Kashi, a city that is revered and admired by every Indian.
author: narendramodi

text: केंद्र और छत्तीसगढ़ सरकार के प्रयासों के कारण राज्य के लोगों के जीवन में, खासकर आदिवासियों के जीवन में आमूलचूल परिवर्तन आया है।
author: narendramodi

text: भाजपा के पास विकास का मजबूत इतिहास है। भाजपा सरकारों ने अच्छे परिणाम और बड़े परिवर्तन हासिल किए हैं।
author: narendramodi

text: जब छत्तीसगढ़ मध्य प्रदेश का हिस्सा था, तब कांग्रेस की सरकारों ने इस पर ध्यान नहीं दिया। नए राज्य के गठन के बाद भी तीन साल तक सत्ता में रही कांग्रेस को छत्तीसगढ़ के विकास में कोई रुचि नहीं थी।
author: narendramodi

text: देश को विकास की नई ऊंचाइयों तक ले जाना है, समृद्धि की तरफ ले जाना है, गरीबी से मुक्त करना है। इसीलिए भाजपा हमेशा विकास पर बल देती है। विरोधी दलों को विकास की राजनीति पसंद नहीं।
author: narendramodi

text: Some glimpses from the rally in Bilaspur earlier today. @BJP4CGState
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to be in Kashi. Inaugurating several development projects. Watch my speech.
author: narendramodi

text: Watch my speech at a massive rally in Bilaspur in Chhattisgarh.
author: narendramodi

text: छत्तीसगढ़ में मतदान का आज पहला चरण है। सभी मतदाताओं से मेरा आग्रह है कि वे पूरे उत्साह के साथ लोकतंत्र के महापर्व में अवश्य भाग लें और भारी संख्या में मतदान करें।
author: narendramodi

text: I spoke to his wife, Dr. Tejaswini Ji and expressed condolences on the passing away of Shri Ananth Kumar Ji. My thoughts are with his entire family, friends and supporters in this hour of grief and sadness. Om Shanti.
author: narendramodi

text: Ananth Kumar Ji was an able administrator, who handled many ministerial portfolios and was a great asset to the BJP organisation. He worked hard to strengthen the Party in Karnataka, particularly in Bengaluru and surrounding areas. He was always accessible to his constituents.
author: narendramodi

text: Extremely saddened by the passing away of my valued colleague and friend, Shri Ananth Kumar Ji. He was a remarkable leader, who entered public life at a young age and went on to serve society with utmost diligence and compassion. He will always be remembered for his good work.
author: narendramodi

text: One of the things our Government has always emphasised on is timely completion of development works. Such an approach is essential if we want the benefits of these works to reach the people.
author: narendramodi

text: Absolutely!
author: narendramodi

text: That is good to know.
author: narendramodi

text: I agree with what you say about the Ganga...and we are working round the clock towards a Clean Ganga and Clean Kashi.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you for your encouraging words on Kashi's development.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to the hardworking Chief Minister of Nagaland, Mr. @Neiphiu_Rio. One of the senior most politicians from the Northeast, Mr. Rio has been continuously working for the welfare of Nagaland. I pray for his long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text:
Making Kashi cleaner and healthier through sewerage projects which will have a long-term impact on the city and surrounding areas. 

The inauguration of 140 MLD Dinapur STP will add great strength towards the efforts of cleaning the Ganga.
author: narendramodi

text: In a major boost to port-led development and harnessing our Jal Shakti for India's growth, an inland waterways terminal will be inaugurated in Varanasi tomorrow.
author: narendramodi

text:
With the inauguration of the Babatpur Airport highway, coming to Varanasi just got easier. Have a look at the photos of this state-of-the-art project.

Travelling to and from Jaunpur, Sultanpur and Lucknow also gets easier with this project. 

A win-win for the people of Kashi.
author: narendramodi

text:
One of the projects I will be inaugurating in Kashi tomorrow is the Varanasi Ring Road Phase 1, which will be a source of great convenience and relief for the people of Kashi. It will reduce travel time and fuel usage.

And yes, going to Sarnath also gets a lot easier now!
author: narendramodi

text:
I have had the honour of paying tributes at the Neuve-Chapelle Memorial in France and at the memorial in Israel's Haifa, places associated with India's role in the First World War. 

When PM @netanyahu came to India, we paid tributes at the Teen Murti-Haifa Chowk.
author: narendramodi

text:
India remembers our brave soldiers who fought in WW-1 This was a war in which India was not directly involved yet our soldiers fought world over, just for the cause of peace. 

Here is what I had spoken about India and WW-1 during last month's #MannKiBaat.
author: narendramodi

text: Today, as we mark one hundred years since the end of the horrific First World War, we reiterate our commitment towards world peace and pledge to work to further an atmosphere of harmony and brotherhood so that the trail of death and destruction caused by wars does not occur.
author: narendramodi

text:
Remembering Acharya JB Kripalani and Maulana Abul Kalam Azad on their birth anniversaries. 

Two exemplary personalities, their notable role during the freedom struggle and emphasis on public welfare, equality, education and justice will never be forgotten.
author: narendramodi

text:
Always a delight to meet Pranab Da. 

Went to his residence, exchanged Diwali greetings and wishes for the festive season. @CitiznMukherjee
author: narendramodi

text: On the 12th of this month, I look forward to being in Kashi to inaugurate development projects that will have a transformative impact on the city and the rest of UP, especially Poorvanchal.
author: narendramodi

text: A major infrastructure project, which will enhance 'Ease of Living' for the people of Varanasi.
author: narendramodi

text: Kashi has blessed me with unparalleled affection. Am doing everything possible to transform the ancient city and strengthen it with the modern infrastructure it deserves.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you for the kind words.
author: narendramodi

text: Ofcourse I did!
author: narendramodi

text: Very thoughtful of you.
author: narendramodi

text:
छत्तीसगढ़ को काम करने वाली सरकार चाहिए।

भाजपा की सरकार ने 15 साल तक छत्तीसगढ़ का सिर्फ और सिर्फ विकास किया, अर्थव्यवस्था सुधारी, शिक्षा, स्वास्थ्य पर बल दिया।
author: narendramodi

text:
Urban Maoists live in big cities, lead comfortable lives but they wreck the lives of those living in rural areas. 

Congress does everything possible to protect and support these Urban Maoists. They owe an answer to the people of Chhattisgarh for their conduct.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congress leaves no opportunity to mock our tribal brothers and sisters. 

Congress makes fun of tribal culture, their customs, their clothes, their headgear.
author: narendramodi

text:
Over the last 4 years, the team of the NDA Government at the Centre and the @drramansingh Ji Government has diligently served Chhattisgarh. 

This is in contrast to the UPA, which ill-treated Chhattisgarh and tried to stop the state's development.
author: narendramodi

text:
It was Atal Ji who saw that the development of Chhattisgarh was not getting enough attention when it was in MP. Hence, a new state was created.

Over the last 15 years, @drramansingh Ji has worked tirelessly and focussed on the state's inclusive growth.
author: narendramodi

text: जगदलपुर की विशाल जनसभा की कुछ तस्वीरें।
author: narendramodi

text: Chhattisgarh supports @BJP4India! Addressing a massive rally in Jagdalpur. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
देवभूमि उत्तराखंड के स्थापना दिवस की राज्य के लोगों को हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं। प्रकृति, प्रगति और समृद्ध संस्कृति की अनमोल संगम-स्थली यह प्रदेश विकास के पथ पर निरंतर नए कीर्तिमान स्थापित करे।

Greetings to the people of Uttarakhand on their Statehood Day.
author: narendramodi

text:
Looking forward to addressing a rally in Jagdalpur. 

BJP has assiduously served the people of Chhattisgarh for the last 15 years and I am sure the people will again bless our Party in the coming polls. @BJP4CGState
author: narendramodi

text:
भाई दूज के पावन पर्व की सभी देशवासियों को बहुत-बहुत बधाई।

Greetings to you all on the special occasion of Bhai Dooj, a festival that celebrates the strong brother-sister bond.
author: narendramodi

text: Called on the Honourable Vice President Shri @MVenkaiahNaidu Ji and conveyed greetings for the festive season. @VPSecretariat
author: narendramodi

text: Went to Advani Ji’s residence and wished him on his birthday.
author: narendramodi

text:
Shri LK Advani Ji’s impact on Indian politics is immense. Selflessly and diligently, he built the @BJP4India and wonderfully mentored Karyakartas.  

I pray for the good health and long life of our beloved Advani Ji.
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to Shri LK Advani Ji on his birthday. Advani Ji’s contribution towards India’s development is monumental. His ministerial tenures are applauded for futuristic decision making and people-friendly policies. His wisdom is admired across the political spectrum.
author: narendramodi

text:
New Year greetings to all Gujaratis. 

May the coming year lead to the fulfilment of all your aspirations. May everyone be healthy and happy.

Saal Mubarak!
author: narendramodi

text: સૌ ગુજરાતીઓને નવા વર્ષની અંતઃકરણ પૂર્વક શુભેચ્છાઓ! પ્રકાશનું પર્વ દીપોત્સવ જીવનને તેજોમય કરીને ઉન્નત કરે છે. નવપ્રારંભ... આપને માટે કલ્યાણકારી, સુખકારી અને સ્વપ્નપૂર્તિનો કાર્યકાળ બને એવી હાર્દિક શુભકામનાઓ...સાલ મુબારક…
author: narendramodi

text: A unique gesture by the @UN on Diwali! Happy to see this.
author: narendramodi

text:
On the banks of the pristine Bhagirathi river, praying to Maa Bhagirathi. 

Felt extremely blessed.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear PM @netanyahu, as promised yesterday, here are some glimpses of how I celebrated Diwali.

I went to the magnificent state of Uttarakhand, where I paid a surprise visit to our brave troops in Harsil, followed by prayers at Kedarnath, one of the holiest places in India.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thank you for the splendid Diwali wishes, Your Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum. 

Wishing you a Happy Diwali as well. 

Your personal commitment towards robust India-UAE relations adds great strength to our bilateral ties. @HHShkMohd
author: narendramodi

text: صاحب السمو الشيخ محمد بن راشد @HHShkMohd أشكركم على تهنئتكم الرائعة بمناسبة عيد الديوالي، أبادل سموكم التهنئة وأتمنى لكم عيد ديوالي سعيد، إن إلتزالم سموكم الشخصي لزيادة متانة العلاقات بين جمهورية الهند ودولة الإمارات العربية المتحدة يضيف قوة كبيرة إلى علاقاتنا الثنائية.
author: narendramodi

text:
बाबा केदारनाथ के दर्शन का सौभाग्य पाकर अभिभूत हूं। 

मैंने महादेव से देश की निरंतर प्रगति और सभी देशवासियों के सुख, शांति और समृद्धि की कामना की है। 

जय बाबा केदारनाथ !
author: narendramodi

text: While interacting with Army and @ITBP_official Jawans in Harsil, spoke about the numerous steps being taken by the Government of India for the strengthening of the defence sector, welfare of ex-servicemen and highlighted how Indian forces are admired globally for the skills.
author: narendramodi

text:
Celebrated Diwali with our valorous Army and @ITBP_official personnel at Harsil in Uttarakhand. 

India is immensely proud of all those who protect our nation, with utmost dedication and courage. 

We salute them!
author: narendramodi

text:
दीपावली की सभी देशवासियों को हार्दिक बधाई। मेरी कामना है कि प्रकाश का यह पावन पर्व सबके जीवन में सुख, शांति एवं समृद्धि लेकर लाए।

Happy Diwali! May this festival bring happiness, good health and prosperity in everyone’s lives. May the power of good and brightness always prevail!
author: narendramodi

text:
Bibi, my friend, thank you so much for the Diwali wishes. 

Every year, I visit our border areas and surprise our troops. This year too, will spend Diwali with our brave troops. Spending time with them is special. 

I will share photos of the same tomorrow evening. :) @netanyahu
author: narendramodi

text:
ביבי, חבר יקר שלי.
תודה רבה על הברכות לרגל חג הדיבאלי.

כל שנה ביום דיבאלי , אני מבקר באזורי הגבול ומפתיע את החיילים שלנו.

גם השנה , אני אבלה זמן עם החיילים האמיצים שלנו בכדי לבלות זמן מיוחד איתם.
author: narendramodi

text: It is very satisfying when initiatives of the Government are able to transform lives of the poor and marginalised.
author: narendramodi

text:
Best wishes for this festive season to you too. 

Thanks for your kind words.
author: narendramodi

text: Social media is a wonderful platform, where I get to interact and see the creativity of people.
author: narendramodi

text: Commendable volunteering effort! My best wishes.
author: narendramodi

text: Ayodhya and South Korea have an ancient link. This link forms the cornerstone of historical and civilisational bonds between India and the Republic of Korea. @moonriver365
author: narendramodi

text: It is a matter of immense joy and pride that Mrs. Kim Jung-sook, First Lady of the Republic of Korea visited Ayodhya and also wore traditional Indian clothing. The people of India deeply appreciate this gesture. @moonriver365
author: narendramodi

text: 아요디아와 한국은 오랜 인연을 맺고 있습니다. 이는 인도와 한국의 유구한 문명의 유대를 형성하는 주춧돌이 되어왔습니다. @moonriver365
author: narendramodi

text: 대한민국 영부인 김정숙 여사님의 아요디야 방문은 저희에게 큰 기쁨이자 자랑입니다. 인도 전통옷을 입으신 모습 또한 그러합니다. 이러한 여사님께 인도 국민들은 깊이 감사드립니다.
author: narendramodi

text:
Donate to @BJP4India and support the Party in the various initiatives towards building a New India. 

Your contribution is deeply valued.

And yes, urge your family and friends to donate as well!
author: narendramodi

text:
Had a great meeting with Mrs. Kim Jung-sook, First Lady of the Republic of Korea. 

We had fruitful discussions on ways to deepen bilateral cooperation between our nations. 

http://www.pmindia.gov.in/en/news_updates/pm-meets-first-lady-of-the-republic-of-korea/?comment=disable …
author: narendramodi

text: This is wonderful. Her passion towards women empowerment is laudatory. Best wishes to her.
author: narendramodi

text:
Ayushman Bharat shows that the poor can get quality healthcare. 

Happy to see poor people benefitting from the scheme.
author: narendramodi

text: Well said.
author: narendramodi

text: Glad you feel so about Ayushman Bharat.
author: narendramodi

text:
Our Armed Forces are brave and determined to protect the nation. 

We are doing everything possible to support them, and ensure our country is protected.
author: narendramodi

text:
We are guided by this Mantra:

राष्ट्र रक्षा समं पुण्यं,
राष्ट्र रक्षा समं व्रतम्,
राष्ट्र रक्षा समं यज्ञो,
दृष्टो नैव च नैव च।।

We will do everything for our beloved nation and for the wellbeing of 130 crore Indians. 

Vande Mataram! 

Jai Hind!
author: narendramodi

text:
India is a land of peace. Values of togetherness are enshrined in our culture. 

Peace is our strength, not our weakness.

Our nuclear programme must be seen with regard to India’s efforts to further world peace and stability.
author: narendramodi

text: Today is historic because it marks the completing of the successful establishment of the nuclear triad. India's nuclear triad will be an important pillar of global peace and stability.
author: narendramodi

text:
In an era such as this, a credible nuclear deterrence is the need of the hour. 

The success of INS Arihant gives a fitting response to those who indulge in nuclear blackmail.
author: narendramodi

text:
The success of INS Arihant enhances India’s security needs. 

It is a major achievement for our entire nation. 

True to its name, INS Arihant will protect the 130 crore Indians from external threats and contribute to the atmosphere of peace in the region.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dhanteras gets even more special! 

India’s pride, nuclear submarine INS Arihant successfully completed its first deterrence patrol! 

I congratulate all those involved, especially the crew of INS Arihant for this accomplishment, which will always be remembered in our history.
author: narendramodi

text:
धनतेरस के पावन अवसर पर सभी देशवासियों को हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं। भगवान धन्वंतरि हम सबको जीवन में सुख, समृद्धि एवं उत्तम स्वास्थ्य प्रदान करें। 

Greetings on the auspicious occasion of Dhanteras. May this special day enhance the spirit of peace and prosperity in our society.
author: narendramodi

text: Commendable effort by @dr_maheshsharma Ji. I am sure it will motivate other Karyakartas and leaders to organise similar donation drives.
author: narendramodi

text:
Here is Shri @CRPaatil Ji talking to someone who benefitted from the Ujjwala Yojana. 

I urge BJP MPs and leaders to also meet beneficiaries and share their inspiring journeys with the rest of the nation.
author: narendramodi

text: My colleague, the MP from Navsari, Shri @CRPaatil Ji shared some wonderful videos, where he is interacting with beneficiaries of various Central Government schemes. Here is one such video, with an Ayushman Bharat beneficiary.
author: narendramodi

text: Yes, it will add strength to the MSME sector.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you. We are leaving no stone unturned to fulfil the aspirations of our citizens, especially the poorest of the poor.
author: narendramodi

text: Bigger markets and better opportunities for MSMEs is a 'win win.’
author: narendramodi

text: We are working to ensure that those associated with the MSME sector have access to timely and adequate credit.
author: narendramodi

text: Here is what I said about how an ideal @BJP4India Karyakarta should be.
author: narendramodi

text: An interesting interaction with a Karyakarta from Tikamgarh, Madhya Pradesh.
author: narendramodi

text: Karyakartas in Kota wanted to know more about the efforts for the welfare of the MSME sector.
author: narendramodi

text:
We in the @BJP4India are inspired by the principles of Pandit Deendayal Upadhyaya Ji and are working tirelessly towards serving the poorest of the poor.

Spoke about ‘Antyodaya’ in response to the question from a Karyakarta in Sikar.
author: narendramodi

text:
Chhattisgarh is a young state with an ancient and rich heritage, and is home to hardworking people. 

Over the last 15 years the state has made great strides under @drramansingh Ji. 

I told a Karyakarta from Korba why the people of the state must bless BJP yet again.
author: narendramodi

text: Having a wonderful interaction with @BJP4India Karyakartas. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
At 4:30 PM today, I will interact with @BJP4India Karyakartas in Bulandshahr, Kota, Korba, Sikar and Tikamgarh. 

Watch the interaction live on the 'Narendra Modi Mobile App.'
author: narendramodi

text: Know how an ordinance makes things much better for the MSME sector.
author: narendramodi

text:
Placing unparalleled faith in our MSME sector. 

Simplifying processes for Environmental Clearances and 'Consent to Establish’ through steps such as self-certification.
author: narendramodi

text: Freeing the MSME sector from Inspector Raj.
author: narendramodi

text:
Simplifying processes, making business easier. 

Now, returns due to 8 Labour Laws and 10 rules to be filed only once instead of the earlier twice
author: narendramodi

text: I hope this decision makes the Diwali for MSMEs working in the Pharma Sector even more special.
author: narendramodi

text: Comprehensive package of Rs. 6000 crore to ensure 20 hubs, state-of-the-art tool-rooms and more.
author: narendramodi

text:
The Government e-Marketplace (GeM) is an excellent platform, offering customers and convenience for MSMEs. 

Announced today that all CPSEs will have to be a part of GeM.
author: narendramodi

text: A boost to Nari Shakti, creating favourable opportunities for women entrepreneurs.
author: narendramodi

text:
Expanding the market for MSMEs, ensuring that their customer base also widens. 

Now, a mandatory 25% of all procurements by CPSEs must be from MSMEs.
author: narendramodi

text:
Solving the challenge of cash flows for MSMEs.

It was been decided that all CPSEs and Corporates having a turnover of more than Rs. 500 crore must be on the Trade Receivables e-Discounting System or the TReDS Platform.
author: narendramodi

text:
Lower interest, higher exports…a win-win for MSMEs.

Subvention benefits on incremental and new loans, higher shipment credit for GST registered MSMEs.
author: narendramodi

text:
Access to credit is a major challenge for the MSME sector. 

In order to mitigate this challenge, delighted to share that through a portal, a loan upto Rs. 1 crore would be available in 59 minutes…yes, 59 minutes! 

Let there be no limitations for India’s entrepreneurial energy!
author: narendramodi

text:
Had a wonderful conversation @WorldBank President, Mr. @JimYongKim. 

I thank him for his kind words on India's historic rise in the 'Ease of Doing Business' rankings over the last four years, and his support towards India's reform trajectory. http://nm-4.com/6e26
author: narendramodi

text: Accelerating India's growth. Addressing the Support and Outreach Initiative for the MSME sector.
author: narendramodi

text:
MSME sector is of vital importance to the Indian economy. This sector's energy and dynamism is noteworthy.

This evening I will launch a Support and Outreach Initiative, which will benefit MSMEs and strengthen our efforts for the sector undertaken over the last four years.
author: narendramodi

text:
This relationship augurs well for the people of our two countries, and is also an anchor for peace and prosperity in the Indo-Pacific. 

I thank PM @AbeShinzo for his deep interest in these objectives and look forward to work with him further for attaining them.
author: narendramodi

text: I fully agree with PM @AbeShinzo and cherish our close friendship. My visit to Japan saw many new milestones in the India-Japan Special Strategic and Global Partnership.
author: narendramodi

text: 印日関係は両国の国民に利益をもたらすものであり、インド太平洋の平和と繁栄を繋ぎとめる錨でもあります。これらの目標に深い興味を持ってくださっている安倍首相に感謝します。目標を実現するためこれからも安倍首相とともに仕事をすることを楽しみにしています。
author: narendramodi

text: 安倍首相のお言葉に完全に同意します。私は首相との緊密な友情をかけがえのないものと感じます。この度の日本訪問では、印日特別戦略的グローバルパートナーシップにとって節目となる多くの合意がありました。
author: narendramodi

text:
भारत की हृदयस्थली यानि मध्य प्रदेश ने हमेशा मातृभूमि के विकास में अग्रणी भूमिका निभाई है। 

पिछले 15 वर्षों में राज्य की उन्नति अभूतपूर्व रही है। 

स्थापना दिवस के अवसर पर प्रदेश के लोगों को बहुत-बहुत बधाई। 

मेरी शुभकामना है कि यह राज्य विकास के नित नए मानदंड स्थापित करे।
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings to my sisters and brothers of Karnataka on the special occasion of Karnataka Rajyotsava. Karnataka is home to a rich history and bright people who have distinguished themselves in various fields. I pray for the happiness and wellbeing of the people of the state.
author: narendramodi

text: ರಾಜ್ಯೋತ್ಸವದ ವಿಶೇಷ ಸಂದರ್ಭದಲ್ಲಿ ಕರ್ನಾಟಕದ ನನ್ನ ಸಹೋದರ ಸಹೋದರಿಯರಿಗೆ ಶುಭಾಶಯಗಳು. ಕರ್ನಾಟಕ ಶ್ರೀಮಂತ ಇತಿಹಾಸ ಹೊಂದಿದ್ದು, ವಿವಿಧ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಗುರುತಿಸಿಕೊಂಡಿರುವ ಪ್ರತಿಭಾವಂತರಿಗೆ ನೆಲೆಯಾಗಿದೆ. ನಾನು ರಾಜ್ಯದ ಜನರ ಸಂತೋಷ ಹಾಗೂ  ಯೋಗಕ್ಷೇಮಕ್ಕಾಗಿ ಪ್ರಾರ್ಥಿಸುತ್ತೇನೆ.
author: narendramodi

text:
यह अटल जी की दूरदृष्टि थी कि छत्तीसगढ़ के गठन का सपना साकार हुआ। 

समय के साथ राज्य ने कई क्षेत्रों में विशेषकर कृषि में उल्लेखनीय प्रगति की है। 

छत्तीसगढ़ के लोगों को राज्य के स्थापना दिवस पर बहुत-बहुत शुभकामनाएं। 

यह राज्य निरंतर विकास की नई-नई ऊंचाइयों को छूता रहे।
author: narendramodi

text:
हरियाणा परिश्रम, पुरुषार्थ, साहस और देश के प्रति समर्पण की भूमि है। 

यह हमें अन्न देने वाले किसानों और देश की रक्षा करने वाले जवानों की धरती है। 

राज्य के स्थापना दिवस पर हरियाणा के लोगों को मैं अपनी शुभकामनाएं देता हूं। प्रदेश हमेशा प्रगति के पथ पर अग्रसर रहे।
author: narendramodi

text: Kerala Piravi greetings! Kerala has a wonderful culture and has always emphasised on human empowerment. It’s people have brought immense pride to India. I pray for the progress and prosperity of the people of Kerala. May all their aspirations be fulfilled in the times to come.
author: narendramodi

text: കേരളപ്പിറവി ആശംസകള്‍ ! കേരളത്തിലെ ജനങ്ങളുടെ പുരോഗതിക്കും അഭിവൃദ്ധിക്കും വേണ്ടി ഞാന്‍ പ്രാര്‍ത്ഥിക്കുന്നു. അവരുടെ എല്ലാ അഭിലാഷങ്ങളും വരും നാളുകളില്‍ പൂര്‍ത്തീകരിക്കപ്പെടട്ടെ.
author: narendramodi

text: An appeal to the hardworking family of @BJP4India Karyakartas.
author: narendramodi

text:
‘गरीबी हटाओ’ कुछ लोगों के लिए केवल नारा था। 

हम गरीबों के सशक्तिकरण पर ध्यान केंद्रित कर रहे हैं। 

हमारा हर प्रयास गरीबों के कल्याण के लिए है। हम चाहते हैं कि गरीब ताकतवर बनें।
author: narendramodi

text:
Karyakartas from Rajsamand are anguished at the abuses Congress leaders throw at me. 

Congress may have hate and anger towards me but we have affection, respect and hardwork to give to this nation we all love.

The more dirt they throw at us, the more the Lotus will shine!
author: narendramodi

text:
मध्य प्रदेश, छत्तीसगढ़ और राजस्थान में आने वाले चुनावों में हमारे तीन एजेंडा है : 

विकास, 

तेज गति से विकास, 

और 

सबके लिए विकास।
author: narendramodi

text:
In the last four years, the spread of technology to rural areas has been unparalleled. 

Technology is transforming lives in ways more than one. 

Here is a Karyakatra from UP’s Machhlishahr asking about the Digital India initiative.
author: narendramodi

text:
बैतूल के कर्मठ कार्यकर्ता, भाई परसराम धुर्वे जी ने मुझसे पूछा कि आज ‘स्टैच्यू ऑफ यूनिटी’ के लोकार्पण के बाद मुझे कैसा लगा।
 
जानिए मैंने क्या कहा...
author: narendramodi

text:
Delighted to see my friend, President Moon looking so elegant in a tailored Indian waist-coat Jacket! 

I hope these simple gifts from the Indian people remain close to the President's heart and remind him of the civilizational bond our countries share.  @moonriver365
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted at yet another rise in India’s ‘Ease of Doing Business’ rank. We are unwavering in our commitment towards economic reforms, which will ensure an environment that fosters industry, investment and opportunities. @WorldBank
author: narendramodi

text: Birthday greetings to Shri @sarbanandsonwal, who is working tirelessly for Assam's growth. I pray for his long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text: МахатмаГандидіңшындық, бейзорлық, еркіндік, демократияжәнебейбітшілікқағидаларыҚазақстандатеңдәрежедеқұрметтеледі. А. АйтекеновжәнеТ. Ермолинаорындаған «Бхаджан» әнінемузыкалықбейнематериалжақындаөзінің20-мерейтойынатапөткенАстананыңкөріністерінкөрсетеді.
author: narendramodi

text:
Mahatma Gandhi’s ideals are cherished in Kazakhstan. 

Here is 'Vaishnava Jana To' sung by Kazakh singers Mr. A. Aitekenov and Ms. T. Yermolina. The video has scenes from Astana, which recently celebrated 20 years as the capital of Kazakhstan. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Hindiston va O’zbekiston birgalikda o’z mamlakatlarida tinchlikni saqlash, kuch ishlatish va terrorizmga qarshi kurashni olib borayotgan bir pallada, “Dil Hai Hindustani” oltin disk g’olibi o’zbek oilaviy Havas guruhi a’zozi Qahramon Mahatma Gandining xabarini tarqatmoqda.
author: narendramodi

text: A tribute to Bapu from Uzbekistan. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Garaşsyzlyk ýadigärliginiň / hindi-türkmen dostlugyny alamatlandyrýan Gandiniň ýadigärliginiň ýanynda aýdymçy Gülaýymyň “Waişnaw Jan To” #VaishnavJanTo aýdymy ýerine ýetirmegi #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Here is 'Vaishnava Jana To' by Turkmen singer Gulayym at the Monument of Independence and Gandhi Ji's bust in Ashgabat, symbolising India-Turkmen friendship. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0C_IpBIgBwE …
author: narendramodi

text: Interacting with @BJP4India Karyakartas in MP, Chhattisgarh, Rajasthan and UP. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: More glimpses from the programme marking the dedication of the #StatueOfUnity to the nation.
author: narendramodi

text: We are doing everything possible to turn Sardar Patel's vision into a reality and ensure a good quality life for our fellow Indians.
author: narendramodi

text:
The #StatueOfUnity illustrates the spirit of New India. 

Its colossal height is a reminder of the colossal skills and aspirations of our Yuva Shakti.
author: narendramodi

text:
Sardar Patel integrated and unified India, in letter and spirit. 

He was clear that after 15th August 1947, India would never be bound by the chains of colonialism.
author: narendramodi

text:
Building of the #StatueOfUnity was a spectacular mass movement. 

I salute the lakhs of hardworking farmers across India who donated their tools and portions of the soil that were used to build this Statue.

I appreciate all those who worked tirelessly to build this Statue.
author: narendramodi

text:
On the banks of the Narmada stands the majestic statue of a great man, who devoted his entire life towards nation building. 

It was an absolute honour to dedicate the #StatueOfUnity to the nation. 

We are grateful to Sardar Patel for all that he did for India.
author: narendramodi

text:
At 5 PM this evening, I look forward to interacting with @BJP4India Karyakartas based in Betul, Machhlishahr, Mahasamund, Satna and Rajsamand Lok Sabha seats. 

You can watch this interaction live on the 'Narendra Modi Mobile App.'
author: narendramodi

text: A tribute to the great Sardar Patel!  Dedicating the ‘Statue of Unity’ to the nation. Here’s my speech.
author: narendramodi

text:
A special day and a special tribute. 

Here is my article, on the landmark contribution of Sardar Patel to our country and why Sardar Jayanti this year is even more unique.
author: narendramodi

text: Tributes to our former Prime Minister, Mrs. Indira Gandhi on her death anniversary.
author: narendramodi

text:
देश को एकता के सूत्र में पिरोने वाले लौह पुरुष सरदार वल्लभभाई पटेल को उनकी जयंती पर कोटि-कोटि नमन।

We bow to the great Sardar Patel, the stalwart who unified India and served the nation tirelessly, on his Jayanti.
author: narendramodi

text:
Tomorrow, on the Jayanti of Sardar Patel, the 'Statue of Unity' will be dedicated to the nation. 

The statue, which is on the banks of the Narmada is a fitting tribute to the great Sardar Patel. http://nm-4.com/7116
author: narendramodi

text: It was a pleasure meeting the USISPF delegation. Glad that they held the India Leadership Summit as well their board meeting in India for the first time. India US strategic partnership has grown multifold leading to mutual economic benefits. http://nm-4.com/x216
author: narendramodi

text:
सबसे ऊँचा, सबसे शानदार...

लौह पुरूष है हमारा सरदार!
author: narendramodi

text: India and Italy have decided to boost ties in key sectors such as lifestyle accessories design, transportation and automobile design, energy, life sciences etc. Such extensive engagement will benefit the citizens of our nations. @GiuseppeConteIT
author: narendramodi

text:
In order to give an impetus to enhanced economic cooperation between India and Italy, it was decided to set up a CEO forum guided by a Joint Commission on Economic Cooperation. 

To increase two-way investments, we have decided to create a fast-track mechanism. @GiuseppeConteIT
author: narendramodi

text:
India is delighted to host PM @GiuseppeConteIT. 

I am glad he took part in the Technology Summit as well.

During our talks earlier today, we reviewed the full range of the India-Italy partnership, particularly in advancing cooperation in trade, technology and culture.
author: narendramodi

text: Un artiste représentant l'organisation Art & Démocratie a chanté Vaishnava Jan To. Le Mahatma qui a influencé le Président Tunisien Habib Bourguiba et la lutte pour la liberté est vénéré comme icône de la paix, et sa philosophie est enseignée en Tunisie.
author: narendramodi

text:
An artist from Art & Démocratie organisation sang 'Vaishnava Jana To' 

Mahatma Gandhi is revered as an icon of peace, and his philosophy is widely taught in Tunisia. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UaXiFqzbGkg …
author: narendramodi

text:
Rana Mohip from Trinidad and Tobago gives his voice to Bapu's favourite song. 

Gandhi Ji's message of kindness, compassion and truth reverberates through Trinidad and Tobago, which has a proud history of unity in diversity like India. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: คุณแอน มิตรชัย นักร้องชาวไทยและเป็นที่รู้จักดีในฐานะ ‘ราชินีลิเก' (การแสดงพื้นบ้านของไทย) ขับร้อง ภาจัน ‘ไวษณพ จานา โต’ภาษาคุชราตีเพื่อรำลึกถึงท่านบาปู@150 พระบาทสมเด็จพระปรมินทรมหาภูมิพลอดุลยเดชของไทยทรงสนับสนุนปรัชญาเศรษฐกิจพอเพียง ซึ่งเหมือนกับแนวคิดของคานธี.
author: narendramodi

text: Ms. Ann Mitchai, a noted Thai Singer, sings ‘Vaishnava Jana To’ to mark #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: More technology for greater progress.   Addressing the India-Italy Technology Summit.
author: narendramodi
narendramodi
narendramodi

text:
日本国民の愛情に感謝の念をあらわします。

安倍総理と一緒にPM @AbeShinzo’sの山梨の別荘でのおもてなし、いつまでも忘れません。安倍総理にお会いすること、そしてこれからの印日関係についてお話することはいつも大喜びです。心から感謝を申し上げます。
author: narendramodi

text: 私の二日間の日本訪問はインド・日本パートナーシップに携わっている様々な関係者と交流ができるよう、幅広いプログラムが含まれました。この訪問により、貿易、技術、人と人の関係、多くの分野での印日関係を強化していくと存じています。
author: narendramodi

text:
Gratitude to the Japanese people for their affection. 

I will always remember PM @AbeShinzo’s kind gesture of taking me to his home. It is always a delight to meet him and discuss the way ahead for India-Japan ties. I thank him for his hospitality.
author: narendramodi

text: My two day Japan visit consisted of a wide range of programmes, where I got to interact with various stakeholders of the India-Japan partnership. The visit will further strengthen the India-Japan relationship, be it in trade, technology or people-to-people ties.
author: narendramodi

text:
Held fruitful and extensive talks with PM @AbeShinzo. 

Today’s discussions focused on aspects relating to better economic ties, stronger cooperation in areas of defence and security.
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking at the joint press meet with PM @AbeShinzo.
author: narendramodi

text:
Strengthening all avenues of India-Japan cooperation and boosting cultural, people-to-people ties.

Met Mr. Heita Kawakatsu, the Governor of Shizuoka province and Mr. Yuji Kuroiwa, the Governor of Kanagawa Prefecture. The discussions were extremely productive.
author: narendramodi

text: Excellent discussions with top Japanese leaders including Mr. Hiroshige Seko, Minister @METI_JPN, Foreign Minister, Mr.  Taro Kono, Mr. Toshihiro Nikai, Secretary General of LDP and Chairman of Policy Research Council of LDP,  Mr. Fumio Kishida.
author: narendramodi

text:
Close economic relations are the cornerstone of the India-Japan partnership. 

Had the opportunity to meet leading venture capitalists and top CEOs from India as well as Japan. 

The discussions in these sessions were extremely fruitful and will add strength to our ties.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had a delightful interaction with the Indian community in Japan. 

The accomplishments of our diaspora make us very proud. 

Talked at length about the rich history, robust present and strong future of India-Japan relations. https://www.facebook.com/PMOIndia/videos/2179177595636271/ …
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a seminar on ‘Make in India’, technology and the India-Japan partnership in Africa.
author: narendramodi

text: PM @AbeShinzo、山梨の別荘での温かいおもてなしに心から感謝いたします。安倍総理のこのおもてなしを大変光栄に思います。安倍総理はまた、箸を使った日本流の食事の仕方を教えてくださいました。
author: narendramodi

text: PM @AbeShinzo and I visited the FANUC Corporation, which has pioneered the usage and application of technology, particularly in robotics.
author: narendramodi

text:
Extremely grateful to PM @AbeShinzo for the warm reception at his home. I am truly honoured by this gesture. 

PM Abe also taught me the Japanese way of eating food using chopsticks!
author: narendramodi

text:
Heard today’s #MannKiBaat?

Take part in this interesting quiz based on today’s episode, on the ‘Narendra Modi Mobile App.’
author: narendramodi

text:
This November, we mark hundred years since the end of World War-1. Let us always pursue the path of peace, harmony and brotherhood.
