Let us also remember the brave Indian soldiers who fought in the First World War, guided by a firm commitment to peace.
author: narendramodi

text: Two interactions that will remain etched in my memory. #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text: Here is why we all are proud of Sikkim! #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text: We in India are blessed to have the wisdom and knowledge of our tribal communities, who teach us the true meaning of sustainable development and living in harmony with nature. Spoke about this interesting subject during #MannKiBaat.
author: narendramodi

text:
A grateful nation salutes Sardar Patel. 

During #MannKiBaat today, spoke at length about the inspiring life of Sardar Patel, an interesting @TIME Magazine cover where he featured and how Field Marshal Manekshaw paid tributes to him.
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted to meet PM @AbeShinzo in the picturesque prefecture of Yamanashi.
author: narendramodi

text: Sharing this month’s #MannKiBaat. Tune in.
author: narendramodi

text: Shri Madan Lal Khurana Ji will always be remembered for the manner in which he strengthened the BJP in Delhi. He made unwavering efforts towards serving the post-partition refugees in Delhi. My thoughts and solidarity with his family and supporters.
author: narendramodi

text: Anguished by the passing away of Shri Madan Lal Khurana Ji. He worked tirelessly for the progress of Delhi, particularly towards ensuring better infrastructure. He distinguished himself as a hardworking and people-friendly administrator, both in the Delhi government and Centre.
author: narendramodi

text: Do tune in. #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text:
I thank Japan's Indian community for their warm welcome. 

We are proud of the accomplishments of the Indian diaspora.
author: narendramodi

text: إنتشر مقطع أغنية "فيشناف جاناتو" للمغني الإماراتي ياسر حبيب على اليوتيوب بسرعة فائقة. وأبرزتها وسائل الإعلام المطبوعة و الإلكترونية في الإمارات. ساعدت الرؤية السامية لبابـو الهندي و بابا زايـد على أن تصبح الهند والإمارات دولتين صديقتين منفتحتين متقدمتين.
author: narendramodi

text:
Sharing a rendition of ‘Vaishnava JanaTo’ by Emirati singer Yasser Habeeb. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G2c-eCFe2Gc …
author: narendramodi

text: Wenn wir den 150. Geburtstag von Mahatma feiern, erinnern wir uns an seinen Besuch in der Schweiz im Jahr 1931, um Nobelpreisträger Romain Rolland zu treffen. Vaishnav Jan gesungen von den Schweizer Künstlern Bruno Stefan & Team. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Vaishnav Jan gesungen in den malerischen Alpenbergen, welche Swami Vivekananda bei seinem Besuch im Jahr 1896 als Miniatur-Himalaya bezeichnete. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: This rendition is by noted Swiss artist Bruno Stefan and the team. I appreciate them for their efforts. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
'Vaishnava Jana To' sung in the picturesque Alps. When we celebrate the 150th birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi, we recall his visit to Switzerland in 1931 to meet Nobel Laureate Romain Rolland. #Gandhi150 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UhpCxezIDFc …
author: narendramodi

text:
PIO Nisha Madaran’s bewogen vertolking van “Vaishnav Jan” is prachtig
opgenomen in Paramaribo dat op UNESCO’s werelderfgoedlijst staat. De
harmonieuze multi-ethnische samenleving van Suriname is een waarlijke
weergave van Bapu’s filosofie van een ideale natie. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: A person of Indian origin, Nisha Madarn's soulful rendition of 'Vaishnava Jana To' is a must hear. The video has been shot in Paramaribo, a UNESCO heritage-City. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Landed in Tokyo. I am confident this visit will add new vigour to the strong friendship between India and Japan. 

今、東京に着陸しました。今回の日本訪問はインドと日本の強い友好関係に新たな勢いを与える、と確信しております。
author: narendramodi

text: One of the greatest living Indian sculptors, Shri Ram Vanji Sutar created over 50 sculptures. His works include restoring sculptures found in Ellora & Ajanta, Chambal monument at the Gandhi Sagar Dam, busts of Bapu and Gurudev Tagore and 'Statue of Unity.' Congratulations to him!
author: narendramodi

text: Set up in 1961, Chhayanaut, has played a vital role in promoting Gurudev Tagore’s works in Bangladesh and globally. Chhayanaut was part of Bangladesh’s freedom movement, even when Rabindra Sangeet was banned in East Pakistan! Congratulations to everyone associated with it.
author: narendramodi

text: Shri Rajkumar Singhajit Singh is a doyen of Manipuri dance. He is widely respected as a great teacher, performer and choreographer. His efforts have gone a long way in keeping the Manipuri dance alive, and to promote harmony as well as creativity. Congratulations to him!
author: narendramodi

text: Am delighted that Shri Rajkumar Singhajit Singh, Chhayanaut (a cultural organization of Bangladesh) and Shri Ram Vanji Sutar are being honoured with the Tagore Award for Cultural Harmony for the years 2014, 2015 and 2016 respectively.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to see this. Please wish your father a Happy Birthday!
author: narendramodi

text: Absolutely! Let us always further the spirit of positivity in our society.
author: narendramodi

text: Equal and participative. All of us have to work together to build a New India.
author: narendramodi

text: I would interact with business leaders from India as well as Japan. I am eagerly awaiting the interaction with the Indian Community settled there. Stronger business and cultural relations between India and Japan augur well for our people and the world.
author: narendramodi

text: On 28th and 29th October, I would be attending the India-Japan Annual Summit. I look forward to productive talks with PM @AbeShinzo, which will enhance India-Japan ties. Japan is a valued partner, with whom we have a Special Strategic & Global Partnership. https://www.facebook.com/narendramodi/photos/a.10150164299700165/10161068338265165/?type=3&theater …
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the Krishi Kumbh, a commendable initiative of the UP Government. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congratulations! 

We invite the world to invest in India and explore the several opportunities available here.
author: narendramodi

text: الاحتفال  بالذكري السنوية ال 150 لميلاد المهاتما غاندي في بلاد النيلين مع اداء رائع للفشناو جان تو من قبل الفنانة السودانية الشهيرة ريماز ميرغني, علي خلفية اهرامات مروي ونهر النيل العظيم وهو يعبرالصحراء الكبري, يحمل معه الامل اللامحدود والكرم والحنان كما حملها المهاتما غاندي.
author: narendramodi

text: Celebrating #Gandhi150 in the land of the two Niles, with this beautiful rendition of Bapu’s ‘Vaishnava Jana To’ by popular Sudanese singer Rimaz Mirghani in the backdrop of Merowe Pyramids and the great River Nile flowing through the vast Sahara.
author: narendramodi

text: Vaishnav Jan To Bhajan interpretado por el Coro Condesa Eylo Alfonso en Valladolid, grabado en el Parque de la Paz. El coro juvenil interpreta momentos representativos de la vida de Gandhi y reflexiona sobre su poderoso mensaje de paz. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Bapu remembered in Spain. 

'Vaishnava Jana To' rendition by the Condesa Eylo Alfonso Choir in Valladolid, filmed at the Peace Park. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0vV7Vntn9zs …
author: narendramodi

text:
Bapu and South Africa have a close connection. He lived in South Africa for many years and later, the thoughts of Bapu inspired beloved Madiba. 
Noted Carnatic vocalist Karthiegasen Pillay renders 'Vaishnava Jana To' in the classical tradition. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: 영광스러운 상을 주신 서울평화상 문화재단에 진심으로 감사드립니다. 모든 인류의 행복한 삶과 발전,평화,번영에 이바지한 새로운 인도에 주시는 상이라 생각합니다.모든 인도인을 대표해 겸허히 이 상을 받겠습니다.
author: narendramodi

text: Here are some glimpses from today's Town Hall. Always a joy to interact with energetic IT professionals from across India. They are doing exceptional work in furthering education, digital literacy, agriculture welfare and cleanliness as a part of several volunteering initiatives.
author: narendramodi

text:
When we serve, we learn. 

When we volunteer, we are also imbibing so much from those we volunteer for. 

This two way synergy makes volunteering special. #Self4Society
author: narendramodi

text:
Our valued guests during the Town Hall were Divyang basketball players, who joined the interaction from Chennai. 

Glad to see increased awareness among the corporate sector towards the welfare of persons with disabilities. #Self4Society
author: narendramodi

text: I applaud the IT sector for institutionalising and strengthening CSR initiatives. All over India, wonderful things are happening thanks to volunteering by professionals, towards bringing a qualitative difference in the lives of others. #Self4Society
author: narendramodi

text:
My friends in the IT sector, here is a unique opportunity to contribute towards nation building. 

Join the movement to transform India, through the #Self4Society portal and App. 

Your skills will power India's growth.
author: narendramodi

text:
#Self4Society

From I to We,

Building synergies for societal change.
author: narendramodi

text: Pán Zdeněk Hladík, významný sitarista, ju doprevádzal hraním na tradičné hudobné nástroje. Videoklip zároveň obsahuje krásne zábery zo Slovenska. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Pani Petra Humeňanská Sedláková, populárna speváčka a finalistka súťaže "Slovensko hľadá SuperStar", prespievala obľúbenú Gándhího modlitbu "Vaishnav Jan To". #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Mrs. Petra Humenanska Sedlakova, a popular singer and finalist of the Slovak Superstar Program, rendered 'Vaishnava Jana To.' Mr. Zdenek Hladik, an eminent sitar player supported her with music, using traditional musical instruments. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SOoVwsD1DD4 …
author: narendramodi

text: Singaporean singers from the 7-decade old Singapore India Fine Arts Society, singing 'Vaishnava Jana To' at Clifford Pier, site of immersion of Gandhi Ji's ashes in 1948. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Artisti: Nicu Patoi, Anne Marie Ene, Avadhut, Cezar Cazanoi, Andrei Kerestely, Cristian Mitran. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Cu ocazia aniversarii a 150 de ani de la nasterea lui Mahatma Gandhi, am produs un videoclip cu rugaciunea preferata ''Vaishnava Janato'' cântat de românca Meera Cristiana Radu. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Here is 'Vaishnava Jana To' sung by a Romanian singer, Ms. Meera Cristiana Radu. The accompanying artists are Nicu Patoi, Anne Marie Ene, Avadhut, Cezar Cazanoi, Andrei Kerestely, Cristian Mitran. I thank them for the rendition. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2YuakhClK80&index=45 …
author: narendramodi

text: Sincerely thank the Seoul Peace Prize Cultural Foundation for the great honour. I most humbly accept the Award on behalf of all my Indian brothers & sisters.  This is a recognition of New India's contribution to the well-being, progress, prosperity & peace of the whole humankind.
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted to participate in a Town Hall interaction with IT professionals and tech-enthusiasts. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
महर्षि वाल्मीकि जयंती की सभी देशवासियों को बहुत-बहुत शुभकामनाएं।

Greetings on Valmiki Jayanti. We remember the noble ideals of Bhagwan Valmiki, especially his emphasis on harmony, equality and social justice.
author: narendramodi

text: The ‘मैं नहीं, हम’ portal is based on the principle of #Self4Society, which will bring together IT professionals and organisations to work for various social causes and bring a positive difference in the lives of our fellow citizens.
author: narendramodi

text: Tomorrow afternoon, I eagerly look forward to taking part in an interesting programme, a Town Hall-style interaction with IT professionals, technocrats and tech-enthusiasts from all over India to launch the ‘मैं नहीं, हम’ portal and App.
author: narendramodi

text: #MahatmaGandhi continua a servir de inspiração enquanto a  e  constroem uma parceria no século XXI. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: O famoso flautista Português Rão Kyao interpreta a Bhajan favorita de Mahatma Gandhi, Vaishnav Jan To, em frente à icónica Torre de Belém, de onde Vasco da Gama rumou à Índia. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Renowned Portuguese flutist Rão Kyao plays Gandhi Ji's favourite 'Vaishnava Jana To', in front of iconic Torre de Belém. This is a must hear! 

Bapu continues to inspire as India and Portugal build a strong 21st century partnership. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P1CfeeLQZeU …
author: narendramodi

text: تكريما لذكرى مهاتما غاندي، شاركت فلسطين العالم هذه المناسبة، حيث قامت الفنانة الفلسطينية إحسان سعادة بأداء ترنيمته المفضلة 'Vaishnava Jana To.' والتي تم تصويرها عند تمثاله  في حديقة الأمم برام الله.  ويبقى إرث وسيرة غاندي يشكلان مصدر إلهام للشعب الفلسطيني.
author: narendramodi

text:
Joining the world in paying homage to Bapu, Palestinian singer Ihsan Saadeh sings ‘Vaishnava Jana To', filmed at the location of Mahatma Gandhi’s Bust in Garden of Nations, Ramallah. Bapu’s life inspires the people of Palestine. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IeRnGlnYLDE …
author: narendramodi

text: La Huaca Pucllana, pirámide de adobe (400 d.C) prestó sus magníficas instalaciones para este profundo himno. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: El Perú contemporáneo rinde tributo a la canción devocional favorita de Mahatma Gandhi, Vaishnav Jan To, bajo la voz de su querida cantante, Eva Ayllón. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Hear ‘Vaishnava Jana To' in the voice of one of Peru’s most popular singers, Eva Ayllón. Lima’s serene Huaca Pucllana, a 400 AD adobe pyramid provided the right setting for the deeply moving song. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EoQaZHpQWTg …
author: narendramodi

text:
المغني العماني المشهور haithamrafi@ يقدم الثناء لغاندي بالأغنية ”Vaishnav  Jana To”  تصوير من الأماكن الأيقونية في عمان. وتحت القيادة الحكيمة لجلالة السلطان قابوس قدمت السلطنة مساهمة ملموسة لترويج السلام الدولي. 
#Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Popular Omani singer @haithamrafi pays tribute to Gandhi Ji by singing 'Vaishnava Jana To', shot at iconic places of Oman.

Under the wise leadership of HM Sultan Qaboos, Oman has made a key contribution towards the promotion of global peace. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5q75iefwWJI …
author: narendramodi

text:
You can contribute any amount from Rs. 5/- to Rs. 1000/- via the ‘Narendra Modi Mobile App.’ 

Your support and contribution will strengthen the resolve of our Karyakartas to serve the nation. http://donations.narendramodi.in/
author: narendramodi

text:
Contributed to @BJP4India, via the ‘Narendra Modi Mobile App.’ 

I urge you all to contribute to the Party through the App and spread the message of transparency in public life.
author: narendramodi

text: I congratulate Mr. Jensen Huang, Founder, President and CEO of @nvidia for an insightful talk on 'Leveraging Artificial Intelligence for Inclusive Growth' at the @NITIAayog lecture earlier this evening.
author: narendramodi

text: Had a fruitful interaction with a delegation from the National Commission for Safai Karamcharis.
author: narendramodi

text: Nauru pays tributes to Bapu and what can be better than my friend, President Baron Waqa himself singing the song that Gandhi Ji loved. Have a look. #Gandhi150 @Republic_Nauru
author: narendramodi

text: गान्धीजी को प्रिय भजन “वैष्णव जन” #सुरसुधा सांगीतिक समूह नेपालकी सरस्वती खत्रीको सुमधुर आवाजमा श्रवण गर्न पाउँदा मेरो  नेपाल भ्रमणको स्मृतिहरू ताजा भएको छ | “पीर पराई जाने रे” भजनले भारत र नेपालको सभ्यतामा निहित मूल्यलाई प्रतिबिम्बित गर्दछ | #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Do not miss Gandhi Ji’s favourite ‘Vaishnava Jana To’ wonderfully sung by Saraswoti Khatri of 'Sur Sudha Band.' #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zm9nl7vlVQM …
author: narendramodi

text:
Beautiful rendition of ‘Vaishnava Jana To' at @Whakarewarewa_V known for projecting Maori cultural heritage, with magical Rotorua in the background. 

Bapu’s legacy resonates deeply with New Zealand’s emphasis on equality. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Mahatma Gandhi's favoriete vrome lied gezongen door Nederlandse zangers bij Kinderdijk, een UNESCO erfgoed in het land van gerechtigheid en vrede. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Dutch singers sing ‘Vaishnava Jana To' at Kinderdijk, an UNESCO heritage site in the country associated with justice and peace. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0XrHKrGorTU …
author: narendramodi

text:
A Namibian tribute to Mahatma Gandhi. 

Presenting 'Vaishnava Jana To' by Ms. Sally Boss Madam, a popular singer, who has received several awards for her singing. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings to @BJP4India President Shri @AmitShah on his birthday. Under Amit Bhai’s leadership, the Party has expanded significantly across India. His rigour and hard work are great assets for the Party. I wish him a long and healthy life.
author: narendramodi

text:
Members of the Azad Hind Fauj fought valiantly for India’s freedom. 

We will always be grateful to them for their courage. 

Today, I had the honour of meeting Lalti Ram Ji, an INA veteran. It was wonderful spending time with him.
author: narendramodi

text:
Mahatma Gandhi es una figura venerada en México.

Incluso una prominente avenida de la Ciudad de México lleva su nombre, la cual también está adornada con su estatua. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Mis saludos a Eugenia Leon, reconocida cantante de México, quien ha interpretado #Vaishnav Jan To…-el bhajan favorito de Mahatma Gandhi. Eugenia León ha sido ganadora del Premio Grammy Latino a la Excelencia y cuenta con 26 albumes. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
I thank Eugenia Leon, among Mexico's leading singers, who has sung 'Vaishnava Jana To.’ 

Mahatma Gandhi is a revered figure in Mexico. 

A prominent avenue is named after him in Mexico City, which is also has his statue. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Махатма Гандигийн дурсгал зориулж Монгол Улсад “Вайжнава Жана Тө” залбирлыг дуучин МУГЖ Т.Ариунаа Жонон хамтлагтай хамран үндэсний хөгжмийн зэмсэг оролцуулж ар талд Монголын үзэсгэлэнт байгаль, гэр болон адуун сүргийг оруулан тоглов. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Remembering Mahatma Gandhi in Mongolia. 

Rendition of “Vaishnava Jana To” Mongolian artist Ms. T. Ariunaa on Jonon Band using traditional musical instruments, in the background of stunning Mongolian landscapes. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RaoYiDyOr0I …
author: narendramodi

text:
لقد غنى المطرب المغربي المعروف ناصر ميكري الأغنية التعبدية المفضلة لدى الماهتما غاندي استخدم نصر ميكري خلفية نهر أبي رقراق بالرباط (الذي يعيد إلى الأذهان خلفية باناراس) ، وبذل مجهودًا خاصا لتسليط الضوء على الصور المتعلقة بغاندي في شريط فيديو.
#Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Mahatma Gandhi’s favourite song sung by noted Moroccan singer Nasr Megri. He has used the background of the Bouregreg River of Rabat. Have a look. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pn2Quj17jeA …
author: narendramodi

text:
Every athlete who won a medal in the @youtholympics held in @BuenosAires2018 has worked very hard for several years. 

Their success will inspire many other youngsters to shine on the playing field. 

Wishing these young stars the very best for their future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text: Tababi Devi Thangjam achieved a marvellous feat at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games. She won a Silver medal in Judo in the women's 44kg category. This medal is truly special in India's Olympic history. It was great interacting with her today.
author: narendramodi

text:
Uttarakhand’s Suraj Panwar has made India proud on the world stage by securing a Silver medal in the Men’s 5000m Race Walk at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games. 

Many congratulations to him for this accomplishment and may he keep on attaining new milestones!
author: narendramodi

text:
Meet Praveen Chithravel. The youngster from Tamil Nadu secured a Bronze in the Men’s Triple Jump event at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games. 

Previously, he had also won a Gold medal in the inaugural Khelo India School Games. Many congratulations and keep it up, Praveen!
author: narendramodi

text:
India is proud of Simran, who won a Silver medal in the 43kg Women’s Freestyle Wrestling at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games. 

Many congratulations to her for achieving this feat. Simran has also won medals in various global championships in the past few years.
author: narendramodi

text:
Saurabh Chaudhary is a star! He won a Gold medal in 10m Air Pistol Shooting event at @BuenosAires2018. 

Hailing from Meerut, he started shooting in 2015 and at the age of 16 he won his first Asian Games Gold. Glad to know that he enjoys farming.
author: narendramodi

text:
Kudos to Tushar Mane for striking the Silver at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games in 10m Air Rifle Shooting event. 

His dedication towards sports is commendable. 

It was great meeting him today. May he win many more laurels in the times to come.
author: narendramodi

text:
The talented Mehuli Ghosh is an inspiration for the younger generations. 

She has made the country proud by winning a Silver medal in the 10m Air Rifle Shooting category at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games. 

Many congratulations for her splendid performance. @GhoshMehuli
author: narendramodi

text:
Manu Bhaker is India’s pride! 

Strong and determined, she proved her mettle by clinching the Gold in 10m Air Pistol Shooting event at 2018 Youth Olympic Games. 

Many congratulations on her achievement and may she bring many more laurels for the country. @realmanubhaker
author: narendramodi

text: It was a proud moment for India, when the young and energetic @lakshya_sen bagged the Silver in Men’s Singles Badminton at 2018 Youth Olympic Games. His focus on the game and sportsman spirit are admirable. Glad to have met him today.
author: narendramodi

text:
It was a delight meeting Akash Malik, who won a Silver medal for India in Men’s Recurve Individual Archery event at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games. 

His determination towards sports is praiseworthy. 

My best wishes for all his future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text:
Meet my young friend Jeremy Lalrinnunga. 

The youngster from Mizoram bagged a Gold medal at the 2018 Youth Olympic Games by lifting a total of 274 kg, which was only one kilogram short of the Seniors National records! 

Many congratulations, Jeremy!
author: narendramodi

text:
Even at a young age, Salima Tete showed excellent leadership skills to lead the Indian Junior Women's Hockey team to a Silver medal at the Youth Olympics 2018. Not only did she lead and defend but also scored 4 goals. 

Congratulations Salima and may you have a bright future!
author: narendramodi

text:
Reet is a midfielder who not only controlled the game and helped others score goals but also scored 5 goals herself at the Youth Olympics 2018. 

Well played, Reet!
author: narendramodi

text:
Meet Mumtaz Khan whose thrilling game as a forward in the Indian Junior Women's Hockey team played an important role in their Silver medal victory at the Youth Olympics 2018. She scored 10 goals! 

We are proud of you, Mumtaz. Congratulations!
author: narendramodi

text:
Yuva Shakti and Nari Shakti make India proud. 

Young Lalremsiami, a forward, scored 9 enthralling goals in the Youth Olympics 2018 and helped Indian Junior Women's Hockey team win the Silver medal in the tournament. 

Congratulations and best wishes for a bright future!
author: narendramodi

text:
Ishika Chaudhary is a defender in the Indian Junior Women's Hockey team who is known for her strong defense skills. 

I congratulate Ishika for her sterling contribution in the team's Silver medal at the Youth Olympics 2018. Wishes for a bright future ahead!
author: narendramodi

text:
Khushboo is a goalkeeper in the Indian Junior Women's Hockey team. It is one of the most important roles in game and Khushboo is adept at it. 

Congratulations to her for helping the team win the silver medal at the Youth Olympics 2018!
author: narendramodi

text:
Congratulations to Bichu Devi Kharibam for her contribution towards winning the Silver medal for India at @BuenosAires2018. 

Her reliable goalkeeping skills have been widely appreciated.
author: narendramodi

text:
A midfielder's role is extremely important in Hockey, to convert opportunities into successes. 

Chetna played this role with great skill for the Indian Junior Women's Hockey team in Youth Olympics 2018 and won us the silver medal. 

Congratulations Chetna!
author: narendramodi

text:
Baljeet Kaur is a forward in the Indian Junior Women's Hockey team. 

Her game immensely helped the team, which brought home the Silver medal in the Youth Olympics 2018. 

My wishes for a bright future, Baljeet. 

This team has shown the power of the Indian youth.
author: narendramodi

text:
Our captain leading from the front! 

With Vivek Sagar Prasad, who captained the Silver medal winning Men's hockey team. 

Vivek himself played well against Bangladesh, Australia and Malaysia.
author: narendramodi

text:
Sudeep Chirmako is India's pride. 

This hockey player scored 11 goals, including 4 in one match against Austria, during the @youtholympics. 

He has worked hard and I wish him the very best for his future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text:
Ace forward Shivam Anand was in stupendous form during @BuenosAires2018. 

His hardwork had a major role to play in the Indian team winning the Silver.

He scored a total of 8 goals through the tournament. Congratulations to him.
author: narendramodi

text: Sanjay’s six goals through the 2018 Youth Olympics added much needed strength to the hockey team. Happy to have met this youngster.
author: narendramodi

text:
Glad to have met my friend, the young hockey player, Rahul Kumar Rajbhar earlier today. 

He shared his experiences with me from @BuenosAires2018. 

Congratulated him for his and the team’s wonderful performance.
author: narendramodi

text: The formidable Prashant Kumar Chauhan has distinguished himself as a reliable goal keeper of the Men’s hockey team. Delighted to meet him.
author: narendramodi

text: Rabichandra Moirangthem's four goals and wonderful game remained an asset for the Indian team through the @youtholympics 2018. Extremely proud of this youngster.
author: narendramodi

text: Met Pawan, a talented hockey player and part of the team that represented India in @BuenosAires2018. His passion towards hockey is admirable.
author: narendramodi

text:
Youngsters like Maninder Singh will surely boost the popularity of Indian hockey. 

Proud of this athlete. 

Congratulated him on being a part of the Silver medal winning hockey team in @BuenosAires2018. @youtholympics
author: narendramodi

text:
Proud of our Yuva Shakti!

Interacted with our young athletes, who won medals in the @BuenosAires2018 Youth Olympic Games.
author: narendramodi

text: It is our Government's honour that we have taken several steps for the welfare of our armed forces, including for women serving in the forces.
author: narendramodi

text:
It is unfair that in the glorification of one family, the contribution of several other greats was deliberately forgotten. 

It is high time more Indians know about the historic role of stalwarts Sardar Patel, Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar and Netaji Subhas Bose.
author: narendramodi

text:
Subhas Babu always took pride in India's history and our rich values. 

He taught us that not everything must be seen from a non-Indian prism.
author: narendramodi

text:
All over the world, people took inspiration from Netaji Subhas Bose in their fights against colonialism and inequality. 

We remain committed to fulfilling Netaji's ideals and building an India he would be proud of.
author: narendramodi

text:
By setting up the Azad Hind Fauj and the Azad Hind Government, Netaji Subhas Bose showed his deep commitment towards a free India.

This spirit of nationalism was a part of him from his young days, as shown in a letter he wrote to his mother.
author: narendramodi

text:
It was a privilege to hoist the Tricolour at the Red Fort, marking 75 years of the establishment of the Azad Hind Government. 

We all remember the courage and determination of Netaji Subhas Bose.
author: narendramodi

text: Made a special announcement at the National Police Memorial.
author: narendramodi

text: Whenever an unfortunate disaster strikes, it is our police personnel who are working round the clock, at the forefront of rescue and relief operations. Proud of them!
author: narendramodi

text:
Had the opportunity to interact with surviving members of the Hot Springs incident. 

The bravery of those associated with the incident will never be forgotten.
author: narendramodi

text:
Today, we not only dedicate the National Police Memorial to the nation but also salute our police personnel for their service. 

I am sure this Memorial will stand as a reminder of the courage and sacrifice of policemen and policewomen, who keep the nation safe.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a programme marking 75 years of the establishment of the Azad Hind Government.
author: narendramodi

text: Tributes to our brave police personnel. Dedicating to the nation the National Police Memorial.
author: narendramodi

text: Tomorrow, on Police Commemoration Day, I will be dedicating to the nation the National Police Memorial. A grateful nation pays tributes to all those policemen and policewomen martyred in the line of duty. We salute their families for their fortitude.
author: narendramodi

text: Tomorrow morning, I will be hoisting the Tricolour at the Red Fort. Here is the reason.
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted to meet PM Ranil Wickremesinghe in Delhi today. We had fruitful discussions, reviewing various aspects of India-Sri Lanka cooperation. @RW_UNP
author: narendramodi

text: I salute the entire team of @BJP4JnK for their stupendous efforts in the local body elections. I am glad that they reached out to every section of society and explained the Party’s development agenda.
author: narendramodi

text: I thank the people of Jammu and Kashmir for their support to the @BJP4JnK in the urban local body elections. I assure the people of the state that the Party will work hard to fulfil the aspirations of the state’s youth and serve the state with utmost diligence.
author: narendramodi

text: Il-filmat tal-kanzunetta ġie meħud fl-Imdina, l-Belt Kapitali l-Qadima ta' Malta. l-idejat ta’ Mahatma għadhom jispiraw lill-Maltin. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Il-kantanta popolari Maltija, Debbie Scerri, tagħti ġieħ lil Mahatma Gandhi permezz ta' interpretazzjoni eċċellenti tal-kanzunetta favorita ta’ Bapu: ‘Vaishnav Jan To’. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Popular singer from Malta, Debbie Scerri pays tribute to Mahatma Gandhi through this excellent rendition of ‘Vaishnava Jana To’. The video was shot in Mdina, the old capital of Malta. Bapu’s ideas still inspire the Maltese. #Gandhi150

text: Anguished by the demise of Lok Sabha MP from Begusarai, Shri Bhola Singh Ji. He will be remembered for his outstanding service to society and efforts towards the development of Bihar. My thoughts are with his family and supporters in this hour of grief.

text: Extremely saddened by the train accident in Amritsar. The tragedy is heart-wrenching. My deepest condolences to the families of those who lost their loved ones and I pray that the injured recover quickly. Have asked officials to provide immediate assistance that is required.

text: ພື້ນຫຼັງສາກແມ່ນເປັນຮູບພະທາດຫຼວງ ເຊີ່ງເປັນເຄື່ອງໝາຍຂອງຊາດລາວ ແລະ ທັງເປັນເຄື່ອງໝາຍແຫ່ງສາຍສຳພັນລາວ - ອິນເດຍ. ປະຊາຊົນລາວແມ່ນໄດ້ຮັບອິດທິພົນຈາກທ່ານ ມາຮັດມາຄັນທີ ຜູ້ທີ່ເປັນແຮງດົນບັນດານໃຈໂດຍຜ່ານບົດເພງດັ່ງກ່າວ.
author: narendramodi

text: ພອນສະຫວັນ ອິນທະວົງ ໄດ້ສະແດງໃຫ້ເຫັນເຖືງຈິດວິນຍານໂດຍຜ່ານບົດເພງ ໄວນາບ ຈານໂຕ, ເຊີ່ງເປັນສຸນທະລີແຫ່ງຄວາມພະຍາຍາມ ແລະ ກໍ່ເປັນເພງທີ່ມີຊື່ສຽງໃນທົ່ວໂລກ. ບົດເພງ ໄວນາບ ຈານໂຕ ແມ່ນມີເນື້ອຫາກ່ຽວກັບຄຳສອນຂອງພະພຸດທະເຈົ້າ. #Gandhi150

author: narendramodi

text:
Maharashtra is a land closely associated with social reform, unity and brotherhood. 

In that spirit, let us all follow the Mantra of 'Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas' and build a New India.
author: narendramodi

text:
The NDA Government has given a strong impetus to the housing sector. 

More houses are being built, with much better facilities.
author: narendramodi

text:
A new home brings with it the power to dream bigger and fulfil aspirations. 

‘Housing for All’ is a great way to fight poverty. 

Watch the interaction with beneficiaries from Thane, where beneficiaries also recited a poem and sang a song!
author: narendramodi

text: This festive season got even more special for these people from Nagpur, who now have their own homes.
author: narendramodi

text:
Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana beneficiaries from Solapur were happy about the e-Griha Pravesh but they were even happier because their homes are in the names of women, thus furthering women empowerment. 

We had a delightful interaction.
author: narendramodi

text:
I asked beneficiaries of the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana from Amaravati during the e-Griha Pravesh: did you have to pay a single bribe to get a home. 

Their answer was a resounding NO!

The culture of bribes and middlemen to get a home is history.
author: narendramodi

text:
From today, over 2.5 lakh people of Maharashtra are proud owners of their own homes. 

I congratulate all those who have got their homes. 

I had the honour of interacting with some of the beneficiaries across Maharashtra during the e-Griha Pravesh ceremony.
author: narendramodi

text: Remembered the noble thoughts of Shri Saibaba while addressing the programme to mark the centenary year celebrations of Shri Saibaba Samadhi in Shirdi.
author: narendramodi

text:
Feeling extremely blessed after praying at the Shri Saibaba's Samadhi Temple in Shirdi. 

His thoughts and ideals inspire crores of Indians as we work towards creating an inclusive, compassionate and just society.
author: narendramodi

text:
Who does not like spending special occasions with their near and dear ones.

In that spirit, I travelled to the holy land of Shirdi, to be with my sisters and brothers of Maharashtra. 

Here are some pictures from the public meeting earlier today.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a huge public meeting in Shirdi, Maharashtra. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
Dear professionals associated with the IT sector, technocrats and tech-lovers, I have a request...

Have a look at this Open Forum on the 'Narendra Modi Mobile App' and share your views!

author: narendramodi

text:

text:
राजस्थान के पाली से कुसुम त्रिवेदी जी ने मुझसे पूछा कि टैक्स कलेक्शन क्यों बढ़ रहा है। 

मैंने इसका जवाब तो दिया ही, साथ ही कहा कि किस तरह से इसका सीधा फायदा राष्ट्र निर्माण में हो रहा है।
author: narendramodi

text:

text:
चतरा के एक कार्यकर्ता ने मुझे उत्तरी कोयल प्रोजेक्ट के बारे में पूछा जो 1973-74 से लटका पड़ा था। भाजपा की सरकार आने के बाद ही इस प्रोजेक्ट में गति आई। 

ऐसे कई प्रोजेक्ट थे जो पुरानी ‘अटकाने, लटकाने और भटकाने’ की नीति के कारण लटके थे, जिनको हमने गति दी।

text: Las sabias palabras de Gandhi y su modo de vida son reverenciados por los cubanos #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: La canción devocional favorita de Bapu cantada en Gujarati por el showman y Premio Nacional de la Música Bobby Carcasses y la joven violinista y cantante Laura Maria en el Malecón y la Habana Vieja. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: 'Vaishnava Jana To' sung by Cuban National Music Award winner Bobby Carcasses and Laura Maria, a young violinist and singer, at Malecon as well as Old Havana. #Gandhi150 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GSX92uRTYfY …
author: narendramodi

text: Den populære danske sangerinde Anita Lerche har fremført sangen Vaishnav Jan To med København som sit betagende bagtæppe. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Mahatma Gandhi er anerkendt over hele Danmark som en forkynder af fred og ikke-vold. Hans tanker er tæt knyttet til bæredygtig udvikling og miljøbeskyttelse. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Mahatma Gandhi is revered across Denmark as an apostle of peace and non-violence. The popular Danish singer Anita Lerche has sung 'Vaishnava Jana To' against the scenic backdrop of Copenhagen. #Gandhi150 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zWetL2ZwlEs …
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing BJP Karyakartas from MP, Rajasthan, Jharkhand, Maharashtra and UP. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Looking forward to a wonderful interaction with @BJP4India Karyakartas from Chatra, Ghazipur, Hoshangabad, Mumbai North and Pali Lok Sabha constituencies at 4:30 this evening. You can watch it on the 'Narendra Modi Mobile App.'
author: narendramodi

text:
Greetings on the auspicious occasion of Durga Ashtami. May Maa Durga fulfil everyone’s aspirations, further the atmosphere of joy and eliminate all evil from our society. 

Have a blessed Durga Puja!
author: narendramodi

text: India is immensely proud of the young and talented Sandeep, who brings home a Gold Medal in Javelin, in the F44 category. My best wishes for his future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text: Today we worship Maa Mahagauri, the 8th Avatar of Maa Durga. We seek her blessings so that every human is happy and is free from suffering. May there be peace and togetherness all around.
author: narendramodi

text: Had a wonderful interaction with Acharya Swamishree Purushottampriyadasji Maharaj from the Maninagar Shree Swaminarayan Gadi Sansthan.
author: narendramodi

text: Every Indian is proud of our contingent at the 2018 Asian Para Games. Each athlete's life journey inspires us and we all wish them the very best for their endeavours in the years to come!
author: narendramodi

text: Clinching a gold in the Men's 50M Butterfly and 2 Bronze medals in the 200m Individual Medley and 50m Freestyle S7 categories, Suyash Jadhav performed exceptionally well at the Asian Para Games 2018. The nation feels extremely proud!
author: narendramodi

text: Mrunali Prakash Pande was remarkable in the Women's Team Rapid and Standard VI- B2/B3 events in Chess at the Asian Para Games 2018, bagging a Silver and a Bronze respectively. Every Indian is proud of the young athlete.
author: narendramodi

text: Sakina Khatun is an inspiration for every sports lover. Through her skill and perseverance, she won the Silver Medal in the Women's Upto 50.00 KG category Powerlifting event at Asian Para Games 2018. Congratulations Sakina and more power to you!
author: narendramodi

text: Raju Prema Kanishsri won a Silver and a Bronze in Women's Team Standard and Rapid events in Chess. She was steadfast in her game, ensuring that India’s Chess team shines at the Asian Para Games 2018.
author: narendramodi

text: Parmjeet Kumar brought home the Bronze Medal in the Men's Upto 49.00 KG category Powerlifting event at Asian Para Games 2018. He is an inspiration to all young aspiring sportspersons. Keep making us proud, Parmjeet.
author: narendramodi

text: Our Chess team performed exceptionally well at the Asian Para Games 2018. Megha Chakraborty’s brilliant performance ensured that India wins a Silver in the Women's Team Rapid VI- B2/B3 event as well as a Bronze in the Women's Team Standard VI - B2/B3 event.
author: narendramodi

text: Prachurya Kumar Pradhan and Mohammed Salih P K have won the Silver Medal at the Asian Para Games 2018's Men's Team Rapid Chess event. Congratulations to both, and best wishes for the future.
author: narendramodi

text: Para shooter Manish Narwal has been at the forefront of Indian shooting, winning many accolades. This time too he clinched a Gold in the Men's 10m Air Pistol event as well as a Silver in the Mixed 50m Free Pistol at the Asian Para Games 2018.
author: narendramodi

text: Ashwin Makwana, Soundarya Kumar Pradhan and Kishan Gangolli won the Silver Medal at #AsianParaGames2018 in Men's Team Rapid Chess. India is proud of the team and we all wish them more such achievements in future!
author: narendramodi

text: Kishan Gangolli has delighted the nation by winning the Gold Medal in Men's Individual Rapid Chess at Asian Para Games 2018. Kishan was also part of the Silver-winning team. We are extremely proud of you, Kishan. Wishing you a bright future.
author: narendramodi

text: Kanickai Irudayaraj Jennitha Anto was in great form throughout the Asian Para Games 2018. She finished with a Gold, 2 Silvers and a Bronze. As a five-time world Chess champion, her focus and determination are inspirational.
author: narendramodi

text: Harvinder Singh's masterful archery skills and his relentless hardwork have brought India a Gold Medal in the Men's Individual Recurve Open event at Asian Para Games 2018. Congrats Harvinder! We are proud of you!
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted that Devanshi Satija won a Silver and Bronze in the Women's 100m Butterfly and Freestyle events, making India proud at the Asian Para Games 2018.
author: narendramodi

text: In the Men's C4 Individual Pursuit 4000m event at the Asian Para Games 2018, Gurlal Singh made India proud by winning the Bronze Medal. This wonderful effort will inspire more youngsters to take up cycling and excel in it. I wish you continued success, Gurlal.
author: narendramodi

text: In the Men's Upto 49.00 KG category Powerlifting event at Asian Para Games 2018, Farman Basha won a Silver Medal for India. Farman's hardwork and talent shone on the international stage and made us all proud. Congratulations to him and wishes for a bright future!
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulations to Suhas Lalinakere Yathiraj for the Bronze Medal in Men's Badminton team event. India is proud of him.
author: narendramodi

text:
Making India proud!

Virender was full of joy on winning a medal for India! 

Had a lively interaction with him. He shared his experiences from the Asian Para Games, where he won a Silver in the Shot put, F 57 event.
author: narendramodi

text: Interacted with Vinay Kumar Lal and appreciated him for his wonderful performance at the Asian Para Games 2018. He won a Bronze medal in the men's 400M T44,T62/64 event. His passion towards sports is commendable.
author: narendramodi

text: Vijay Kumar is a stupendously talented athlete. His Silver Medal in the Long Jump, T42 category will inspire several athletes in India. Congratulations to him!
author: narendramodi

text: Radha V is a star! She brought home two medals, a Silver in the 1500m and Bronze in the 400m events. Her commitment towards sports is commendable. We had a wonderful interaction.
author: narendramodi

text: Meet my young friend Varun Singh Bhati, who won a Silver medal in the Men's High Jump T42/63 category at the Asian Para Games 2018 held in Indonesia. With his extraordinary performance, he has won hearts of people across the country. Many congratulations to him!
author: narendramodi

text: I congratulate Punaram Tijan Gawar for being a pillar of strength for her team during the Women's Team Rapid and Standard VI- B2/B3 events in Chess. Nation is joyous on her winning a Silver and a Bronze medal at the Asian Para Games 2018.
author: narendramodi

text: It was a delight to meet Padma Shri and Arjuna Awardee Mariyappan Thangavelu. He has won a Bronze medal in the Men's High Jump T42/63 category at Asian Para Games 2018. India is proud of his outstanding accomplishment. Many congratulations to him!
author: narendramodi

text: In the Men's Upto 80.00 KG category Powerlifting event at Asian Para Games 2018, Sudhir won a Bronze Medal for his wonderful effort. Congratulations Sudhir and all the best for a bright future!
author: narendramodi

text: Making India proud at the Asian Para Games 2018, Swapnil Patil put forth a phenomenal performance in Swimming. He won a Silver in the Men’s 100M Backstroke event and a Bronze each in the Men's 100 M and 400M Freestyle events. Delighted and proud.
author: narendramodi

text: Para shooter Singhraj’s Bronze in the Mixed 50M Free Pistol event at the Asian Para Games2018, is a matter of immense joy for all of us. May he continue to reach new heights of success.
author: narendramodi

text: Interacted with Pardeep, who, with his excellent performance, gave India a Silver Medal in the Men's Discus throw F43/44, F62/64 event at the Asian Para Games 2018 in Indonesia. Congratulations to him for this wonderful accomplishment.
author: narendramodi

text: It was a proud moment for India when @RampalChahar secured the Silver in Men's High Jump T45/46/47 category at the Asian Para Games 2018. His dedication and passion for sports are laudable. Keep winning many more laurels for the country!
author: narendramodi

text: At the Asian Para Games 2018, Raj Kumar won the Bronze Medal as a part of the Men's Badminton team. Proud of him!
author: narendramodi

text: Tek Chand is a phenomenal sportsman. He brought smiles on the faces of 130 crore Indians when by winning the Bronze in the Shot put event, F46 category. We are proud of him.
author: narendramodi

text: It was a proud moment for the nation when Tarun won the Gold Medal in Men's Singles Badminton at the Asian Para Games 2018. Tarun, through his resolve and determination, is a role model for thousands of youth who aspire to make a mark in the world of sports.
author: narendramodi

text: Due to an unfortunate accident, Sundar Singh Gurjar injured his left hand but he did not lose his courage, skill and passion towards sports. This young athlete brought home a Silver in the Discus event and Bronze in Javelin. Congratulations to him!
author: narendramodi

text: Glad to have met the energetic Arjuna Awardee Sandeep Singh Maan and lauded his passion for sports. He has made the nation proud by securing a Bronze in the men's 400M T45/46/47 category at the Asian Para Games 2018 held in Jakarta.
author: narendramodi

text: Rakshitha Raju is the pride of India! She won a well-deserved Gold in the 1500m race in the Asian Para Games. Her success is the result of immense hardwork and dedication over the years.
author: narendramodi

text: Pramod Bhagat is an inspiration. While he won the Gold Medal in Men's Singles Badminton, he was also a part of the Bronze-winning team in Men's Doubles at Asian Para Games 2018. Outstanding as an individual and as a team-player! Congratulations Pramod.
author: narendramodi

text: Matching ever-increasing standards of competition for years and consistently making a mark, @DeepaAthlete is a sportsperson that young India looks up to. She won Bronze Medals in Women's Discus throw and Women's Javelin throw events at the Asian Para Games 2018. Congratulations!
author: narendramodi

text:
Parul Parmar won a Gold for India at the Asian Para Games 2018. 

Through her unmatched skill and determination, she won the Medal in Women's Singles Badminton. Keep making us proud, Parul!
author: narendramodi

text: Nitesh Kumar won India the Bronze Medal at the Asian Para Games 2018 Men's Doubles Badminton. I congratulate Nitesh and wish him a bright future ahead. We are proud of him.
author: narendramodi

text: Nidhi Mishra has made India proud by bringing laurels home. She won the Bronze Medal in the Women’s Discus throw event at the Asian Para Games 2018. She is an inspiration for all of us.
author: narendramodi

text: The formidable Neeraj Yadav brings home the cherished Gold in the Javelin throw event, F55 category. Wishing him the very best for his future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text: Meet my friend Narayan Thakur. He clinched the Gold medal in Men's 100M T35 event at the Asian ParaGames 2018 held in Indonesia. The entire country is proud of this achievement. Wishing him the very best for his future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text: In the Women's Javelin throw event at the Asian Para Games2018, Ramya Nagaranai has made the nation proud by winning the Silver Medal. Congratulations and best wishes for more and more such successes. Keep making us proud, Ramya!
author: narendramodi

text: One of the stars of the Indian contingent of the 2018 Asian Para Games in Jakarta was Monu Ghanghas. Monu won two medals, a medal each in Shot put (Bronze) and Discus throw (Silver). He has been rigorously practising and achieving remarkable success.
author: narendramodi

text: Mohd. Yasser won a Silver in Discus throw at the 2018 Asian Para Games. Yasser has been passionate about sports since a very young age. As a child, he met with an accident but such is his will-power that he continued playing, practising and won medals. Happy to have met him.
author: narendramodi

text: Nagar Krishna put in an excellent effort at the Asian Para Games 2018 Men's Singles Badminton by winning the Bronze Medal. I congratulate him for his achievement and wish him a bright future.
author: narendramodi

text: Athletes like Jayanti Behera motivate many youngsters to pursue sports. Her life journey is extremely inspiring. She is blessed not only with skill but also speed! Congratulations to her on winning a Silver in the 400m event and Bronze in the 200m event at the Asian Para Games.
author: narendramodi

text: Ekta Bhyan started playing sports on a regular basis in order to get physically fit, in the wake of an accident in 2003. Since then, there has been no looking back and she kept winning various medals. Proud of her on winning a Gold in Club Throw. Best wishes to her.
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulations to Dharambir for the Silver medal in Men's Club Throw F51 event at the Asian Para Games 2018. His commitment towards sports is truly laudable. It was great to interact with him today. May he continue to bring many more laurels in the coming years.
author: narendramodi

text: Chirag Baretha was a part of the Indian team that won the Bronze Medal in Badminton. Wishing this inspirational sportsperson great success in the future too. We are proud of you!
author: narendramodi

text: Kudos to Avnil Kumar for his brilliant performance at the Asian Para Games 2018. With his strong determination, he secured a Bronze medal in the Men's 400m T13 category. Glad to have met him today.
author: narendramodi

text:
The excellent effort by Surendran Pillai Aneesh Kumar at the Asian Para Games 2018 in Indonesia won the country a Bronze medal in Men's Discus Throw F43/44, F62/64 category. 

India is proud of his achievement and I hope he scales new heights of glory in the times to come.
author: narendramodi

text: Great meeting the talented Anandan Gunasekaran who won a Silver and a Bronze in Men's 400m and 200m respectively at the Asian Para Games 2018 in Jakarta. My best wishes for all his future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text: Amit Kumar is a champion. His stellar performance at the Asian Para Games 2018 has won the country a Gold in men's Club Throw F51 category. Many congratulations to him and best wishes for his future endeavours. @AmitParalympian
author: narendramodi

text: India is proud of Anand Kumar Boregowda for bringing home the Bronze Medal in Men's Doubles badminton at the Asian Para Games 2018. Congratulations Anand!
author: narendramodi

text: It was a delight to interact with the medal winners of the Asian Para Games held in Jakarta recently.
author: narendramodi

text: 侯伟对“Vaishnava Jana To”的精彩表演。在本视频中，大家可以看到中国北京各个地方。#Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
A wonderful rendition of ‘Vaishnava Jana To’ by Hou Wei. In this video, you can see various locations in Beijing, China. #Gandhi150
 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gnQP56m_ucM&feature=youtu.be …
author: narendramodi

text: An iconic song, sung at Canada's iconic temple of democracy.  Watch Canadian singer Adam Duncan perform 'Vaishnava Jana To' at the magnificent Parliament of Canada in Ottawa. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Sharing ‘Vaishnava Jana To’ from Cameroon. Africa has a special place in Bapu’s life. Not only did he live in South Africa for years, his thoughts and ideals inspired several African nations in their struggle for freedom and equality. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Kövér László házelnök felavatta Mága Jennifer, híres magyar énekes videóját. A videót a Budai Várban, Hősök terén, Magyar Parlamentnél és Lánchídnál forgatták. Örülünk, hogy Gandhiji tanításai hatással vannak Magyarországra. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
‘Vaishnava Jana To’ reverberating in Hungary! 

Jennifer Maga, prominent Hungarian singer sings the song, with the video shot across Buda Castle, Heroes Square, Parliament and Chain Bridge. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Dengan 75% hutan, Brunei menghidupkan mesej Bapa Gandhi untuk memelihara alam sekitar. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Lagu kegemaran Bapa Gandhi,  Vaishnava Jana To, dinyanyikan oleh Fakhrul Razi, penyanyi kesayangan Brunei, berlatarbelakangkan tempat ikonik Brunei – Kampong Ayer & Jambatan RIPAS. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Sharing Bapu’s favourite song, ‘Vaishnava Jana To’ sung by Fakhrul Razi, Brunei’s beloved singer. The video also takes you through some of the iconic spots of Brunei. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_e-PQUNGAJo&feature=youtu.be …
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to Odisha CM Shri Naveen Patnaik Ji on his birthday. Naveen Ji is one of India’s senior-most leaders who has been serving the people of Odisha for many years. May he lead a long and healthy life. @Naveen_Odisha
author: narendramodi

text:
एकवेणी जपाकर्णपूरा नग्ना खरास्थिता।
लम्बोष्ठी कर्णिकाकर्णी तैलाभ्यक्तशरीरिणी।। वामपादोल्लसल्लोहलताकण्टकभूषणा।
वर्धनमूर्धध्वजा कृष्णा कालरात्रिर्भयङ्करी॥

We bow to Maa Kalaratri and seek her blessings for everyone’s good health and happiness.
author: narendramodi

text: A memorable rendition of ‘Vaishnava Jana To’ by Baraka Merzaia, an Algerian singer. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Kgotlhaditswe ke go bona Shanti Lo a opela Bhajan Vaishnav Jan fa pela ga dihikantswe tsa dikgosi tse tharo. Re leboga Batswana mo go tsayeng karolo mo segopotsong sa dingwaga tse di lekgolo le masome a matlhano a  matsalo a ga Mahatma Gandhi #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
The friendly people of Botswana greatly respect Bapu's thoughts. Here is Shanti Lo singing ‘Vaishnava Jana To.’ #Gandhi150
 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qx8AwnxtTNw&feature=youtu.be …
author: narendramodi

text: La admiración por Bapu se refleja en esta interpretación que utiliza instrumentos musicales tradicionales con paisajes venerados de fondo. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: WARA, famoso grupo andino Boliviano, difunde un mensaje de humanidad con la canción devocional favorita de Mahatma Gandhi, Vaishnav Jan To. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Bolivia´s famous Andean music group WARA sings Mahatma Gandhi’s favourite song. 

Deep love for Bapu is reflected in the rendition, using local traditional musical instruments and wonderful backgrounds. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lcomnJWlD04&feature=youtu.be …
author: narendramodi

text:
ཟེར་མི་འདི་ས་གནས་ཀུན་གསལ་འཕོ་འགྲོང་ལུ་སྤྱན་འབུལ་ཞུ་ཐོག་གུས་བཏུད་ཞུ་ནི།འབྲུག་མི་དབང་མངའ་བདག་རིན་པོ་ཆེ་ཕྱོགས་ཀྱི་གསུང་མི་ན་ང་བཅས་ལུ་མ་ཧཱཏ་མ་འགན་དི་བཟུམ་ས་ཡ་འབད་དགོཔ་ཡོད་རུང་རྒྱལ་རབས་ཀྱི་ང་བཅས་ལུ་གཅིག་ལས་མ་བྱིན་མེ་ཟེར་གསུང་ཡོད།
#Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
འབྲུག་རྒྱལ་ཁབ་ཀྱི་འཛམ་གླིང་རྒྱལ་ཁབ་ཚུ་དང་ཆ་མ་ཧཱཊ་མ་འགན་དི་མི་ལོ་༡༥༠འཁོར་བའི་འདུས་སྟོན་ལུ་འབྲུག་པའི་སྐད་འཐེན་མི་བུམོ་དབྱང་ཕྱེན་འབྲུག་པ་གྱི་འཐེན་ཡོད་མི་འགན་དི་ཁོ་རའི་མགུར་མ་དགའ་ཤོས་བཱཡེཤ་ནུབ་ཇན་ཏུ་
#Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: From the serene Buddha Point in Bhutan, Yanchen Drukpa sings Bapu’s favourite song. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Videospot krase velicanstvena zdanja Parlamenta Srbije, Hrama Svetog Save, Kalemegdanske tvrdjave i srpskih fresaka. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Gandijeve misli i dalje odjekuju u Srbiji. Hvala operskoj pevacici #JadrankaJovanovic na izvedbi pesme Vaishnav Jan To koja prelepo odslikava Gandijeve ideale. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Bapu's thoughts reverberate across Serbia. I thank veteran opera singer Jadranka Jovanovic for singing 'Vaishnava Jana To'. The locations covered include the Parliament Building, Saint Sava Temple, Kalemegdan fortress and frescoes. #Gandhi150

صدحت أسوار قلعة عراد بغناء نور

Great to see Mr. Tofiq Aliyev ‘Mukesh’ of Azerbaijan singing ‘Vaishnava Jana To’ at Ateshgah and Martyrs Monuments in Baku. #Gandhi150
