text: Here is Heather Lee, a singer based in Australia singing a song Bapu loved. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Հայաստանի Ձայնը2013-ի հաղթող Մերի Մնջոյանը Masha Mnjoyan երգում է «Վաիշնավ ջան տո» հայերենով։ Երգը հիթ է։ Ֆոնին երևում են Խոր Վիրապի վանքը և Արարատ լեռը՝ բիբլիական Նոյի ջրհեղեղից հանգրվանը։ Հնչում են հայկական ժողգործիքներ՝ դուդուկ և բլուլ. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Excellently sung by Masha Mnjoyan! Do not miss the scenic background of the popular Khor Virap monastery and ‘Mt. Ararat’ in Armenia. Local musical instruments Duduk and Blul have been used as well. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O928Nl-ydno&feature=youtu.be …
author: narendramodi

text: Filmado en lugares iconico como la Floralis Genérica, el Planetario y el Puente de la Mujer, Buenos Aires, Argentina. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: A 150 años del natalicio de Mahatma Gandhi, la artista argentina Carolina Chrem presenta el bhajan Vaishnava Jana To, un mensaje de paz para la Argentina y el mundo. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Do hear ‘Vaishnava Jana To’ by Argentine singer Carolina Chrem. 

Bapu’s favourite song has been filmed at iconic places like the Floralis Genérica, the Planetarium and Women's Bridge, Buenos Aires. #Gandhi150 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G28uit-qPVI&feature=youtu.be …
author: narendramodi

text: بركة مرزاية، كونها مغنية شابة جدا ، رغم صغر سنها استطاعت اندماج اغنية ماهاتما لبيئتها الثقافية المحلية بشكل جيد. أطيب تهاني لها وأطيب التمنيات لمستقبل مشرق.
author: narendramodi

text:
La très jeune chanteuse, Merzaia Baraka a si bien adapté le Bhajan de Mahatma au milieu culturel local. Mes plus sincères félicitations à elle et mes meilleurs vœux pour un avenir radieux. #Gandhi150
 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cO7CQGfmycY&feature=youtu.be …
author: narendramodi

text: An exceptional teacher, a wonderful motivator, an outstanding scientist and a great President, Dr. Kalam lives in the hearts and minds of every Indian. Remembering him on his Jayanti.
author: narendramodi

text: Birthday wishes to @drramansingh Ji. Under his exemplary leadership for the last 15 years, Chhattisgarh has witnessed notable transformations in several sectors. His policies have benefitted the state’s youth tremendously. I pray for Raman Singh ji’s good health and long life.
author: narendramodi

text: Greetings to my colleague Shri Mukhtar Abbas Naqvi Ji on his birthday. Naqvi Ji has been working tirelessly towards fulfilling our vision of ‘Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas.’ He has also worked assiduously for the BJP organisation. May he lead a long and healthy life. @naqvimukhtar
author: narendramodi

text: Maa Katyayani, give us the strength to always work towards empowering the poor and marginalised. With your blessings, may good always prevail, may there be justice for all.
author: narendramodi

text:
सिंहासनगता नित्यं पद्माश्रितकरद्वया।

शुभदास्तु सदा देवी स्कन्दमाता यशस्विनी॥

Today, we pray to Skandamata. 

May she enrich our society with wisdom and knowledge. May the spirit of prosperity be enhanced as well.
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted to meet Ms. Rajalaxmi Manda, who undertook a bullet rally from Tamil Nadu to Delhi. I appreciate her enthusiasm and congratulate her on her feat. @Legalrightscou
author: narendramodi

text:
Touched to see this. 

The spirit of this Garba has been brought to life by these daughters!

Hope everyone's having a blessed Navratri.
author: narendramodi

text:
सुरासम्पूर्णकलशं रुधिराप्लुतमेव च।

दधाना हस्तपद्माभ्यां कूष्माण्डा शुभदास्तु मे॥  

Maa Kushmanda, may your divine blessings further the spirit of happiness and harmony in society. Sharing a Stuti.
author: narendramodi

text: The philosophy of 'Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas' ensures the dignity and well-being of all Indians, particularly the poor and marginalised.
author: narendramodi

text: For us, human rights & their protection are not merely phrases. They are articles of faith, which we are continuously upholding. Whenever basic human rights have been denied, like during Emergency, the people of India fought tirelessly & ensured democracy & human rights prevail.
author: narendramodi

text: Congratulations to the NHRC for completing 25 years in service of the nation. We are proud of their exemplary role in safeguarding human rights and furthering the dignity of crores of Indians.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a programme to mark 25 years of NHRC. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text:
For Karyakartas of the Jana Sangh and BJP, no words can do justice to Rajmata Vijaya Raje Scindia's monumental efforts to build these parties.

She resisted the Emergency tooth and nail, overcoming all forms of intimidation, bullying and dirty tricks of those in power then.
author: narendramodi

text: We remember Rajmata Vijaya Raje Scindia on her Jayanti. She devoted her entire life to public service. Formidable, compassionate, always accessible to people and blessed with a futuristic vision for the nation, she is a source of inspiration for several people.
author: narendramodi

text:
ॐ देवीचन्द्रघण्टायै नमः॥ 
या देवी सर्वभू‍तेषु चन्द्रघण्टारूपेण संस्थिता। 
नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमो नमः॥

May Maa Chandraghanta bless everyone with good heath and wellbeing, and may all suffering be eradicated from our society.
author: narendramodi

text:
Spoke to Shri @ncbn Ji and Shri @Naveen_Odisha Ji regarding the situation arising due to cyclone related conditions in parts of Andhra Pradesh and Odisha. Assured all possible help from the Centre. 

I pray for the safety and well-being of those affected by the cyclone.
author: narendramodi

text: Saddened by the demise of Shri GD Agarwal Ji. His passion towards learning, education, saving the environment, particularly Ganga cleaning will always be remembered. My condolences.
author: narendramodi

text: Speaking at the inauguration of the Centre for the Fourth Industrial Revolution.
author: narendramodi

text: Birthday greetings to one of India’s most popular actors, Shri Amitabh Bachchan Ji. His contribution to Indian cinema and television has endeared him to crores of Indians. Praying for his long and healthy life. @SrBachchan
author: narendramodi

text: Tributes to Nanaji Deshmukh on his Jayanti. He worked tirelessly towards upliftment of our villages and for the welfare of our hardworking farmers. His organisational skills were also greatly admired.
author: narendramodi

text:
India remembers the great Loknayak JP on his Jayanti. His unflinching commitment to protect our democratic fabric will never be forgotten. 

We also remember his notable efforts towards India's freedom struggle and working for the welfare of the marginalised.
author: narendramodi

text:
दधाना करपद्माभ्यामक्षमालाकमण्डलू।

देवी प्रसीदतु मयि ब्रह्मचारिण्यनुत्तमा॥

Maa Brahmacharini, we seek your blessings for our good health and prosperity. 

Today, on the second day of Navratri, sharing a Stuti devoted to Maa Brahmacharini.
author: narendramodi

text:
We, the BJP Karyakartas are blessed that we have in our Party several greats who inspire us. 

Spoke about how the lives of Nanaji Deshmukh and Rajmata Vijaya Raje Scindia motivates each Karyakarta to give his or her best for the Party and work towards nation-building.
author: narendramodi

text:
Leading international rankings show India’s stellar performance in several sectors. 

A Karyakarta from Mysuru asked me what this betterment means for the 130 crore people of India.
author: narendramodi

text:
हम एक ऐसे समाज से हैं, जहां बुजुर्गों के प्रति अगाध सम्मान का भाव है।
 
आगरा में भाजपा के कार्यकर्ताओं के साथ आज की बातचीत के दौरान मैंने वरिष्ठ नागरिकों के लिए किए जा रहे हमारे प्रयासों के बारे में जानकारी दी।
author: narendramodi

text: दमोह के एक परिश्रमी कार्यकर्ता, किशोर सिंह जी जानना चाहते थे कि पिछले चार सालों में किस तरह भारतीय संस्कृति का गौरव दुनिया भर में बढ़ा है।
author: narendramodi

text:
करौली-धौलपुर से मुन्ना खान जी ने मुझसे पांच राज्यों में आने वाले चुनावों के बारे में पूछा।

जानिए मैंने क्या कहा...
author: narendramodi

text: Watch the interaction with @BJP4India Karyakartas from five Lok Sabha seats.
author: narendramodi

text: Looking forward to interacting with @BJP4India Karyakartas from Agra, Damoh, Karauli-Dholpur, Mysuru and Raipur Lok Sabha seats at 4:30 this evening. You can watch the interaction on the 'Narendra Modi Mobile App.'
author: narendramodi

text:
वन्दे वाञ्छितलाभाय चन्द्रार्ध कृतशेखराम् ।

वृषारूढाम् शूलधराम् शैलपुत्रीम् यशस्विनीम् ॥

We bow today, to the daughter of the mountains, Maa Shailaputri. 

An Avatar of Maa Durga, she is also closely associated with nature. She personifies simplicity.
author: narendramodi

text:
नवरात्रि के पावन पर्व पर हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं। 

शक्ति की देवी मां दुर्गा सबके जीवन में सुख, शांति और समृद्धि लेकर आएं। 

जय मां जगदम्बा!
author: narendramodi

text:
रोहतक के सांपला में हुई जनसभा की कुछ झलकियां। 

यहां मैंने देश के परिश्रमी किसानों की समृद्धि के लिए केंद्र सरकार के प्रयासों की विस्तार से चर्चा की। 

मुझे ख़ुशी है कि सरकार की योजनाएं हरियाणा के लोगों के जीवन में सकारात्मक परिवर्तन ला रही हैं।
author: narendramodi

text: मुझे दीनबंधु छोटूराम जी के जीवन को समर्पित म्यूजियम को देखने का भी अवसर मिला। वे जीवन भर शिक्षा, कृषि, सिंचाई, महिला सशक्तिकरण जैसे अनेक क्षेत्रों में अपना योगदान देते रहे।
author: narendramodi

text:
आज रोहतक के सांपला में मुझे दीनबंधु छोटूराम जी की प्रतिमा का अनावरण करने का सौभाग्य मिला। 

यह हरियाणा की सबसे बड़ी प्रतिमाओं में से एक है, जो देश भर के लोगों खासकर किसानों का ध्यान आकर्षित करेगी। 

किसानों के उत्थान के लिए छोटूराम जी ने व्यापक रूप से कार्य किया था।
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy to meet Hon. @AndrewScheer, Canada's Leader of the Opposition. 

Stressed the significance of strong India-Canada relations and wished him a pleasant stay in India.
author: narendramodi

text:
Please thank your cousin and the entire team for their efforts. 

Amazing to see the vigour and enthusiasm towards Swachh Bharat.
author: narendramodi

text: Glad you feel so about Uttarakhand's development journey.
author: narendramodi

text: Several states are hosting investment summits, making active efforts to seek investment...which is excellent for India's youth.
author: narendramodi

text: चौधरी छोटूराम जी की प्रतिमा का अनावरण करने के बाद रोहतक में एक विशाल जनसभा को संबोधित कर रहा हूं।
author: narendramodi

text: Joined the reception on the occasion of Air Force Day.
author: narendramodi

text:
Delighted to interact with young police officers of the 2017 IPS batch. 

My best wishes to them, for their careers ahead. http://nm-4.com/77z6
author: narendramodi

text: A grateful nation salutes our valorous air warriors and their families on Air Force Day. They keep our skies safe and are at the forefront of serving humanity in times of disasters. Proud of the Indian Air Force!
author: narendramodi

text: Here are some glimpses from the #DestinationUttarakhand Summit.
author: narendramodi

text: The opportunities in agriculture, organic farming and food processing are immense in Devbhumi Uttarakhand.
author: narendramodi

text:
I appreciate the Uttarakhand Government for their work in furthering connectivity across the state. 

This augurs well for Uttarakhand, which is blessed with nature, culture and has a big potential in tourism, particularly in adventure.
author: narendramodi

text: Achieving progress, powered by a strong potential, sound policy and stupendous performance.
author: narendramodi

text:
India is progressing at a scale and speed that is unparalleled. 

We are tirelessly working towards providing housing, continuous electricity, clean fuel, quality healthcare and banking to every Indian.
author: narendramodi

text:
Glad to see investors from all over the world converge in Uttarakhand for the investment summit, which will enhance the development journey of the state. 

This is a commendable effort by the State Government to showcase the vast economic opportunities Uttarakhand offers.
author: narendramodi

text: Come and invest in Uttarakhand. Addressing the investment summit in Dehradun.
author: narendramodi

text:
BJP stands committed to fulfilling the aspirations of the people of Mizoram and Telangana. 

I appeal to the citizens of these states to give us an opportunity to serve them in the state so that we can fulfil aspirations of the youth, farmers and poor. @BJP4Mizoram @BJP4Telangana
author: narendramodi

text:
In Chhattisgarh, MP and Rajasthan, BJP has been running successful Governments that have enhanced prosperity and inclusive growth. 

I urge the people of these states to bless BJP once again so that we can work tirelessly to build a New India. @BJP4CGState @BJP4MP @BJP4Rajasthan
author: narendramodi

text:
Best wishes to the @BJP4India Karyakartas in Chhattisgarh, Madhya Pradesh, Mizoram, Rajasthan and Telangana for the upcoming Assembly elections.

I am sure they will work tirelessly among people and spread the development agenda of the Party across all sections of society.
author: narendramodi

text:
भारत को अपनी नारी शक्ति पर गर्व है।

केंद्र सरकार ने ऐसे अनेक कदम उठाए हैं, जिनसे महिला सशक्तिकरण को बल मिलेगा -
author: narendramodi

text:
Lakhs of families in Rajasthan were living without electricity, as if they are living in the 18th century. 

I compliment Vasundhara Ji for the manner in which she and her team electrified villages and brought a positive difference in the lives of many. @VasundharaBJP
author: narendramodi

text:
When I had to decide where to mark the Parakram Parv, I decided to come to Jodhpur, in the brave land of Rajasthan. 

We are proud of our Army but the Congress questions surgical strikes and insults the armed forces!
author: narendramodi

text:
राजस्थान कांग्रेस के नेता विधानसभा नहीं आते, ना ही राज्य के गरीबों की बात करते हैं।

उनको सिर्फ एक परिवार की सेवा करनी है।

हमें राजस्थान की जनता की सेवा करनी है।
author: narendramodi

text: अपने अन्नदाताओं के आशीर्वाद से एनडीए सरकार ने एमएसपी को लेकर ऐतिहासिक निर्णय लिया है। इससे हमारे कर्मठ किसानों की समृद्धि को बल मिलेगा।
author: narendramodi

text:
I congratulate the Rajasthan Government for their efforts towards making a state-of-the-art riverfront on the banks of the Dravyavati River. 

Under Vasundhara Ji, Rajasthan has made commendable strides in the tourism sector. @VasundharaBJP
author: narendramodi

text:
When Vasundhara Ji took office in 2013, there was inertia in the growth trajectory of the state. 

During her tenure, she has ushered pioneering and futuristic reforms that have transformed lakhs of lives across Rajasthan. @VasundharaBJP
author: narendramodi

text:
अजमेर में विशाल जनसभा की कुछ तस्वीरें। 

पिछले चार वर्षों में केंद्र और राजस्थान सरकार ने राज्य के लोगों के कल्याण के लिए कई कदम उठाए हैं। @BJP4Rajasthan
author: narendramodi

text: वीरों की भूमि राजस्थान के अजमेर में एक विशाल जनसभा संबोधित कर रहा हूं। देखिए...
author: narendramodi

text:
Innovation is a vital element of India-Russia cooperation. 

President Putin and I had a wonderful interaction with children from the Sirius Educational Foundation based in Russia. 

These young minds showcased their innovations, which were extremely impressive.
author: narendramodi

text:
Time tested friends working towards a new era of stronger cooperation. 

India and Russia have signed important agreements and MoUs on sectors such as space technology, railways, MSME and fertilisers. 
http://nm-4.com/p0z6
author: narendramodi

text:
President Putin has played a vital role in further enhancing the friendship between India and Russia.

We had fruitful talks today, covering various aspects of the Special and Privileged Strategic Partnership between our nations. @KremlinRussia_E
author: narendramodi

text: Meeting people is a source of great strength. There is so much to learn from the 130 crore people of India.
author: narendramodi

text:
Not only in Tripura, but also across the Northeast we are seeing tremendous support and affection. 

The Government is making tremendous efforts for the region's transformation.
author: narendramodi

text: Yes you must!
author: narendramodi

text: Here is my speech at the business summit with President Putin.
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing a joint press meet with President Putin. Watch. @KremlinRussia_E
author: narendramodi

text:
Welcome to India, President Putin. 

Looking forward to our deliberations, which will further enhance India-Russia friendship. @KremlinRussia_E
author: narendramodi

text: Добро пожаловать в Индию, президент Путин! Желаю Вам плодотворного пребывания в Индии. С нетерпением жду наших переговоров, которые несомненно укрепят дружбу между Индией и Россией. @KremlinRussia
author: narendramodi

text:
Excellent performance by @BJP4Tripura. 

The people of Tripura have shown their strong faith in the work of the BJP Government. 

Congratulations to CM Biplab Deb, the local unit and the hardworking Karyakartas for the outstanding results. @BjpBiplab
author: narendramodi

text:
Visiting Sikkim just got easier! 

What are you waiting for? 

A beautiful state with warm hospitality awaits you. #IncredibleIndia
author: narendramodi

text: Had a wonderful interaction with a group of mountaineering enthusiasts who are embarking on an expedition to spread awareness on Ganga cleaning. The group was led by the noted mountaineer and our pride, Ms. Bachendri Pal. http://nm-4.com/bsz6
author: narendramodi

text: Excellent! Glad that your team is spreading awareness and initiating action towards curing leprosy. May it inspire others to work in this area too. My best wishes.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to see the IT sector coming together to brainstorm on vital issues.
author: narendramodi

text: I am, like every other Indian, extremely proud of my roots and I also think the thoughts that have originated in our land have the potential to make our world a better place.
author: narendramodi

text:
The world has to work on mitigating climate change and ensuring climate justice. 

After all, these issues affect the future of our planet.
author: narendramodi

text: Happy to know. Keep working hard. My best wishes.
author: narendramodi

text:
A clean environment will further human empowerment.

In my op-ed today, I write about how, inspired by our historical values, 130 crore Indians are proactively working towards a cleaner and greener planet.
author: narendramodi

text: प्रकृति से सौहार्दपूर्ण रिश्ता भारतीय परंपरा का एक अटूट हिस्सा रहा है। किस प्रकार भारतीय मूल्यों से प्रेरित होकर 130 करोड़ देशवासी स्वच्छ और हरित धरती के लिए सक्रियता से कार्य कर रहे हैं, इसी विषय पर पढ़िए मेरा आलेख।
author: narendramodi

text: At the core of our vision of ‘Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas’ is ensuring our nation develops, and our environment becomes cleaner and greener.
author: narendramodi

text: Yes, we are working to mitigate climate change but at the same time, we are also talking about climate justice.
author: narendramodi

text:
Care towards the climate must be a part of culture. Otherwise, we run the risk of making ourselves prone to frequent calamities.  

Indian culture offers effective lessons in caring for the environment.
author: narendramodi

text:
I thank the @UN for honouring me with the ‘Champions of the Earth Award.’ 

This award is for the 130 crore people of India and India’s value systems, which accord topmost priority towards living in harmony with nature and caring for our surroundings.
author: narendramodi

text: Good effort and extensive research!
author: narendramodi

text:
Thanks @bhupendrachaube. 

The media fraternity has added valuable strength to the movement to clean India. The effort is ongoing, with lot of ground covered and a fair amount of work to do as well. Am sure we will succeed. 

Together, 130 crore Indians will fulfil Bapu’s dream.
author: narendramodi

text: Glad you liked it.
author: narendramodi

text: I like your enthusiasm towards 'Run for Unity.' Best wishes.
author: narendramodi

text: Thanks Prateek. The award is for India and Indian values, which teaches each one of us to respect nature.
author: narendramodi

text: I congratulate Justice Ranjan Gogoi Ji on taking oath as the Chief Justice of India. His experience, wisdom, insight and legal knowledge will benefit the country greatly. My best wishes for a fruitful tenure.
author: narendramodi

text: These important meetings will pave the way for stronger global efforts towards a cleaner and greener planet, something that Mahatma Gandhi always spoke about. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: India is proud to host the first Assembly of the International Solar Alliance, the second IORA Renewable Energy Ministerial Meeting and the 2nd Global RE-Invest (Renewable Energy Investors’ Meet and Expo).
author: narendramodi

text: Paid tributes to Bapu at Delhi's Gandhi Smriti. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Maharashtra has a rich history of respect towards nature. 

Glad that you are continuing this tradition by strengthening the Swachh Bharat Mission. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
A wonderful way to spread awareness on cleanliness and sanitation. 

I am confident your efforts will boost the endeavours to build the Swachh Bharat that Bapu dreamt of. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Excellent! Your active participation will be a source of inspiration for the people of Tripura. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Happy to see this. 

Cleanliness will further the growth of the tourism sector in Arunachal Pradesh. This augurs well for the state. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted that you are leading by example, Biren Ji.  #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Very good effort, which will contribute towards a cleaner and greener Himachal Pradesh. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: At the First Assembly of the International Solar Alliance. Watch my speech.
author: narendramodi

text:
Had a wonderful meeting with Secretary-General of the @UN, Mr. @antonioguterres. We discussed a wide range of issues pertaining to global peace and prosperity. 

We are extremely grateful to him for coming to India for the Mahatma Gandhi International Sanitation Convention.
author: narendramodi

text:
The stupendous efforts of the @JagranNews team adds vital strength to the Swachh Bharat Mission. 

I congratulate their entire team for the valuable contribution.
author: narendramodi

text: Great effort, Ankita.
author: narendramodi

text: I compliment the @IndiaToday family for their notable efforts to strengthen the movement to clean India. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you for spreading awareness on the issue of cleanliness, Suresh.
author: narendramodi

text: Narayanasamy Ji, kudos to you for leading from the front and inspiring others to strengthen the movement to clean India.
author: narendramodi

text: Good! Take your family and friends too.
author: narendramodi

text:
Congratulations to the people of Punjab! 

Once the people of Punjab decide to do something, no force can stop them and I am glad the state is working towards further strengthening the Swachh Bharat Mission. My best wishes. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Rajkot is special. I have visited this city several times when I did organisational work for my Party. 

Years later, it was from Rajkot that I won my first ever election.
author: narendramodi

text: Thank you for the kind words.
author: narendramodi

text:
Thank you @iamsrk, for lending vital support for the Swachh Bharat Mission. 

I am sure your words will motivate citizens to work towards Swachhata.
author: narendramodi

text:
Please convey my blessings to young Belaku. 

I pray for her happiness and good health.
author: narendramodi

text:
Please tell your daughter I said hello. 

I wish her the very best for her future endeavours.
author: narendramodi

text: I congratulate team @ndtv for their notable efforts to further awareness on Swachhata. They have brought people from all walks of life on their platform to further discussions on ways to make India cleaner.
author: narendramodi

text:
A Swachh Bharat was Bapu's dream. 

We are all doing our best to turn it into a reality. 

130 crore Indians have taken the lead in this movement. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: बहुत अच्छा प्रयास है। मेरी शुभकामनाएं।
author: narendramodi

text: I congratulate all those who have been conferred various awards for their outstanding contribution to the Swachh Bharat Mission. Their efforts inspire several Indians. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: The 4 P’s that will improve global sanitation and help us achieve the Sustainable Development Goals. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: With the blessings of 130 crore Indians, the country has made remarkable strides in cleanliness and sanitation. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
The issues of cleanliness and sanitation were extremely close to Bapu’s heart. 

He wrote about rural sanitation in his ‘Constructive Programme’ as well. It is high time India comes together to fulfill Bapu’s dream. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: The Mahatma Gandhi International Sanitation Convention is a milestone programme, which has brought together stakeholders from all over the world, adding strength to the movement towards global sanitation. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Glimpses from the Mahatma Gandhi International Sanitation Convention in Delhi. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Bapu unites the world! 

Among the highlights of today’s programme was the excellent rendition of Bapu’s favourite 'Vaishnav Jan To' by artists from 124 nations. 

This is a must hear. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Addressing the Mahatma Gandhi International Sanitation Convention. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Lal Bahadur Shastri Ji epitomised strength and simplicity. He led India at a crucial time and worked hard to make our nation more prosperous. 

Today, on his Jayanti I paid tributes to Shastri Ji at Vijay Ghat.
author: narendramodi

text:
The noble thoughts of Mahatma Gandhi have given strength to millions across the world. He was a stalwart who lived for others and to make our world a better place. 

Paid tributes to Bapu at Rajghat this morning. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
The 150th birth anniversary of respected Bapu is a wonderful opportunity to come together and fulfill his dreams. 

Sharing my op-ed on Bapu and his inspiring ideals. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: An insightful op-ed by Singapore’s Prime Minister, Mr. @leehsienloong on how India and Singapore are united in the pursuit of building a cleaner and better tomorrow for the coming generations. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
सौम्य व्यक्तित्व, कुशल नेतृत्व एवं बुलंद हौसले के प्रतीक लाल बहादुर शास्त्री जी को उनकी जयंती पर विनम्र श्रद्धांजलि। 

जय जवान-जय किसान!
author: narendramodi

text:
गांधी जयंती पर राष्ट्रपिता को शत्-शत् नमन। 

आज से हम पूज्य बापू के 150वें जयंती वर्ष में प्रवेश कर रहे हैं। उनके सपनों को पूर्ण करने का हम सभी के पास यह एक बहुत बड़ा अवसर है। #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Tomorrow, I will also inaugurate the first Assembly of the International Solar Alliance. 

The programmes I will attend tomorrow are linked to sanitation and renewable energy, subjects closely associated with Bapu’s emphasis on cleanliness and a clean environment. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text:
Tomorrow is a special day. We mark the start of the 150th birth anniversary celebrations of our beloved Bapu. 

On Gandhi Jayanti, I will attend the closing session of the Mahatma Gandhi International Sanitation Convention. #Gandhi150
author: narendramodi

text: Had extensive deliberations with President Shavkat Mirziyoyev. We discussed ways to further strengthen India’s relations with Uzbekistan. Sharing my remarks at the joint press meet today. @president_uz https://www.facebook.com/PMOIndia/videos/249554549043139/ …
author: narendramodi

text: Best wishes to Rashtrapati Ji on his birthday. India has benefitted greatly from his wisdom and perspectives on various subjects. He has connected wonderfully with every section of our society. I pray for his long and healthy life. @rashtrapatibhvn
author: narendramodi

text:
Inaugurated the Mahatma Gandhi Museum in Rajkot. The Museum is at the Alfred High School, which is associated with the early years of Gandhi Ji. 

The next time you visit Rajkot, do visit this museum.
author: narendramodi

text: Delighted to be in Rajkot. Addressing a public meeting. Watch.
author: narendramodi

text: Providing next-generation infrastructure to young India.
author: narendramodi

text:
Among the most special parts of today’s programme in Anjar was the inauguration of the LNG terminal. It is wonderful to see Gujarat becoming a LNG hub. 

Also spoke about the vitality of the energy sector for national progress.
author: narendramodi

text: Kutch is a land blessed with tremendous beauty and is home to talented youngsters. One must visit this district to see the transformation in the last two decades. Today, in Anjar, I inaugurated and laid foundation stones for projects worth Rs. 6000 crore. https://www.facebook.com/PMOIndia/videos/306382826829281/ …
author: narendramodi

text: Pictures from Amul's Chocolate Plant at Anand, Gujarat. @Amul_Coop
author: narendramodi

text:
For every Indian, 31st October is a special day, when we pay tributes to the great Sardar Patel.

I urge you all to think about how to mark Sardar Patel’s Jayanti including the ‘Run for Unity’ which has been gaining popularity over the last few years. #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text:
Value addition enhances prosperity among farmers. 

Urged our hardworking farmers to focus on value addition and explained the benefits of doing so.
author: narendramodi

text:
Gujarat and the cooperative sector have a strong link, thanks to the work of Sardar Patel. 

Sardar Patel’s association with Amul is well known but long before that, as the head of the municipality of Ahmedabad he worked extensively on cooperative housing.
author: narendramodi

text:
As a brand, Amul is both admired and respected not only in India but also internationally. 

It is synonymous with quality, and has empowered several people associated with it.
author: narendramodi

text:
Delighted to be in Anand, Gujarat, where development projects worth over Rs. 1100 crore were inaugurated or their foundation stones were laid. 

These projects are associated with the dairy, food processing, agriculture and energy sectors. https://www.facebook.com/PMOIndia/videos/316822099109836/ …
author: narendramodi

text:
2nd October is special this year, as it marks the start of Gandhi Ji’s 150th birth anniversary celebrations. 

Spoke on Bapu, a 'Constructive Programme' he penned in the 40's and, how inspired by his ideals we can enhance prosperity in the lives of many Indians. #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text: A Divyang brother from Rajasthan called me, expressing joy on the Swachh Bharat Mission. I will always remember his kind words and blessings #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi

text:
This October, the National Human Rights Commission completes 25 years. 

Spoke about the rich contribution of NHRC in protecting the rights and dignity of the people. Also spoke about how the our value systems give immense importance to safeguarding human rights. #MannKiBaat
author: narendramodi
